story:
Right now, the European societies that we connect with are stuck in isolation with public spaces closed under lockdown, creating a daunting situation in which to make new work and engage with each other.

In this time of need, the problem of lack of spirituality continues to grow, with many people unable to buy anything but food. But there is a shining ray of hope – poetry. Poetry has always been with people in times of need, hunger and isolation. It has inspired and encouraged people over the ages. We must not forget about it. We need poetry to help us stay alive and remember that everything passes.

And that is why the Eurasian Creative Guild created a project — The Poetic Almanac “Voices of Friends” — to spread awareness of others at this time.

The Almanac will bring together poets from different cultural communities, including the people of both Europe and Eurasia. It also provides a showcase for creative people to present their own poetry, and for participants to learn about poets from other places.

This unique international project is the only one of its kind for the past 60 years. In each page, the poems will take readers to a different world. It mixes both the greatest poems of all time, with new works written especially.

100 pages of the Almanac are devoted to classic poems. But what are the classics that should be included? It is up to you to decide.

To participate in the selection, you need to fill out an online application, after which our administrator will contact you. Or you can entrust this to us, and then our publishing house will independently choose  Eurasian poets and publish their poems.

We are seeking support to cover the costs of publishing this book ourselves. All funds will go toward paying for printing, design, artwork, marketing and shipping. We have set the funding rates in such a way that you are, in effect, pre-paying for the book.

The Almanac will be divided into 365 calendar days, where each day and each page is given to a particular poet. You have the opportunity to put your own work on a Memorable Day, or select the anniversary of a renowned national poet. The collection will make a great gift for a celebration, anniversary, birthday, and can be both very personal and work at the public a state-level. Each participant can choose up to 6 calendar days (pages).

  • All funders will be named on a thank-you page in the finished book.
  • All funders who pledge 25 pounds or more will be mentioned as a sponsor and will receive E-Book.
  • All funders who pledge 50 pounds or more will be mentioned as a sponsor and will receive electronic and hard copies of the book with free delivery.
  • All funders who pledge 75 pounds or more will be mentioned as sponsors, will receive electronic and hard copies of the book with free delivery, and a thank-you note from the chief editor and compiler — poet John Fardon

 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Поэзия – лучик света в темноте кризиса

Главные проблемы человечества на данный момент: самоизоляция, которая сузила круг новых возможностей и попытки людей взаимодействовать друг с другом вживую, и экономический кризис, оказывающий повсеместное пагубное влияние на качество жизни людей. Поэтому перед каждым из нас встает задача, целью которых стала не жизнь, а выживание.

В подобное время нельзя забывать – чтобы с нами не происходило, мы не перестаем быть людьми, у которых невозможно отнять культурное наследие и потребность самореализации. Именно поэтому мы должны сплотиться на пути к развитию и духовности, чтобы не забывать, кто мы и зачем мы здесь.

В моменты, когда человечество переживало войны, голод и изоляцию, у людей всегда был лучик света, который неизменно поддерживал их во времена нужды, помогая им обрести силу воли и веру в победу. Этим лучиком света была поэзия.

Британская организация – Евразийская Творческая Гильдия (Лондон) – возрадила проект – поэтический альманах "Голоса друзей", созданный для поддержки и распространения культурного наследия евразийских народов.

Идея создать сборник  в 1960 году, основоположником которого является Советский писатель - Константин Симонов. После его реализации в 1973 году проектом никто не занимался, и именно поэтому сборник можно считать уникальным – поскольку он единственный в своем роде за долгие года. И на его страницах будут стихотворения не только классики, но и современных евразийских поэтов.

100 страниц Альманаха пойдут исключительно на публикацию стихотворений классиков. Но какие именно классики будут размещены на страницах альманаха? Решать исключительно именно Вам.

Для этого Вам необходимо заполнить онлайн заявку участника, после которой наш администратор свяжется с Вами. Или Вы можете доверить это нам, и тогда наше издательство самостоятельно опубликует одного из Евразийских классиков.

Все средства пойдут на оплату печати, дизайна, создания иллюстраций, маркетинга и доставки альманаха. Мы установили ставки финансирования таким образом, чтобы они покрывали стоимость книги.

Также данный сборник уникален тем, что он будет издан в формате альманаха (ежедневник — календарь) и будет разделен на 365 календарных дней, где каждому дню и поэту будет выделена 1 страница.

Все спонсоры будут перечислены на странице благодарности в готовой книге.

  • Все спонсоры, которые поддержат проект 25 фунтами и более, будут отмечены как спонсоры под стихотворением/страницы и получат электронную копию книги.
  • Все спонсоры, которые поддержат проект 50 фунтами и более, будут отмечены как спонсоры, получат электронную и печатную копии книги с доставкой в любую точку мира.
  • Все спонсоры, которые поддержат проект 75 фунтами и более, будут отмечены как спонсоры, получат электронную и печатную копии книги с доставкой в любую точку мира и письмо благодарности от главного редактора и составителя – Джона Фарндона.

После Вы сможете приобрести сборник на Amazon.

И Гильдия желает Вам не терять стремления к росту, несмотря на трудные времена. Мы и наше наследие - то, что всегда будет на нашей стороне. И сейчас важно ни в коем случае не отказываться от них.

story:
Early this year, PS Media ran our first campaign to fund a 2000 book run of Stretched Skin by Stelarc. That campaign fell a bit short of our funding goal but the PS Media Team is committed to delivering our intriguing, thought provoking, and beautifully illustrated look at this pioneering performance and installation artist to your hands.

After the first campaign ended, the team got together and discussed ways to get more people onboard. We decided to decrease the number of books printed from 2000 to 1000, thus making every copy that lands in the hands of our readers that much more valuable and exclusive. As with Stelarc’s Obsolete Body (1984), there is no guarantee that there will ever be a second edition of this book.

The PS Media Team believes so strongly in this project that the entire team has volunteered to work for free until the book is published and then receive payment only if the project turns a profit. We believe that Stretched Skin will be a great addition to collections and hope that it will inspire aspiring artists from the shelves of university libraries and we need your help to make our ambition a reality! At the time of this writing there are only 550 copies available. Order now to make sure that you get yours! Please help us to spread the word!  

Background

For over 40 years, Stelarc has been pushing the physical, conceptual, and technological boundaries of the body. His work has inspired and awed people the world over, and given many a new perspective on what the body means, where it begins and, indeed, ends. His first book Obsolete Body was published in 1984 as a compilation of Stelarc's suspension performances, it is now a very rare and expensive book to come by. But Obsolete Body, while the source of many people's inspiration, does not tell the whole story or contain a complete record of Stelarc's suspension performances. After its publication, Stelarc continued and expanded his work, and those performances have never been seen in print.



Aquí puedes leer el texto en Español: Stretched Skin – un libro de Stelarc.

When PS Media approached Stelarc to suggest that we could run a new edition of Obsolete Body, his immediate response was that it would be more interesting to publish a new book that contains a complete presentation of his suspension performances, as well as new articles and a different selection of images. We agreed immediately! It is with great pride and joy that we can now announce that PS Media will publish Stelarc's new book: Stretched Skin—Obsolete, Uncertain and Indifferent Body.

Stretched Skin will focus on Stelarc's suspension performances—from the very first in 1976 to the most recent in in 2012, including the collaborations with Håvve Fjell and Wings of Desire in 2012 and 2013. The book will also contain some of Stelarc's other performances; where they have direct relevance to, or lead up to, the suspension series.

Stretched Skin will be a work of art in itself. It is a book on art by an artist, with layout and design by our award winning team. PS Media takes great pride in publishing high quality books. Our choice of printer and materials is made with careful consideration to professional and ethical standards, so that our customers receive a high quality work that they will be proud to own and display in the years to come.  

Who are PS Media

PS Media was established to publish documentation on the work of Pain Solution and Wings of Desire. As it has become an established part of the Pain Solution enterprise, ambitions have grown and we are broadening our scope to include future publications within the realm of Body Modification, Body Art, Sideshow, and Body Suspension. Our aim is to keep our focus on our own communities first and let our reach spread organically from there. As an independent and passionate publisher with little capital, we rely on support from our community to help us create works that we and our readers want to own.

Håvve Fjell is the founder of PS Media and Pain Solution, the renowned performance troupe in which he has been the driving force, performing all over the world, for 25 years. Håvve is a pioneer in the European Suspension community and has contributed to the education of body suspension practitioners on five continents.

Helene Fjell is the co-founder of PS Media and award winning photographer. Without her photography, there would not have been a viable starting point for our publications. While not all of the future publications will be based on her photos, Helene provides quality assurance for all of our photos—both in publications and for promotion.

June Ailin Bonsaksen is PS Media’s backbone. As our production manager, June keeps everything together and make sure that order prevails. In addition to keeping our metaphorical wheels on the rails, June is the administrative engine at the heart of Pain Solution where she manages websites, merchandise, book orders, volunteer crews, Wings of Desire suspension events and PS Media projects with style and grace.

Alan Louis Belardinelli is an American expatriate living in Oslo who has long and varied experience working with communications. Alan edited our previous books: Wings of Desire: Learning to Fly and To Bleed or Not To Bleed, and has a knack for leaving the author’s voice as intact as possible while making sure that grammar is being reasonably respected and that sense is still being made.

Trine + Kim Design Studio have been working with Pain Solution since 2007 using their exceptional talent and creativity to carve out a distinct visual profile for the company. Since their start in 1999, they have worked tirelessly producing work for some of Norway’s most notable bands, artists, theaters, galleries, and publishers. 

Marte Maritdatter is the newest member of PS Media, hired as campaign coordinator for this pre-sale campaign. Marte has been a performing artist in Pain Solution since 2007, where her tasks besides presenting staggering stunts on stage, are anything from accounting to producing events. She is also a competent seamstress, creating costumes, props and merchandise.

Perks!

The perks will naturally focus on the book itself. In this campaign, you will get great discounts compared to the retail price after the campaign ends. Plus, we will send out all the perks without any added shipping cost! How is this an offer you can refuse?

In addition to signed and numbered copies of Stretched Skin you can get your hands on our previous publications by PS Media at reduced rates! Remember; you can get more than one Perk! All Perks will be shipped by December 2017.

Why we need you

We need you because you need us! It’s a give and get relationship, where you give us what we need so you can get what you want! In other words, supporting our campaign allows us to produce this beautiful book.

How you can help us

There are many ways to help us out besides the obvious financial support! Spreading the word is crucial. We need all the help we can get reaching out to all the right people. We are over the moon excited about this book—maybe you are too? Let's let the world know it! Share the campaign, write a blog post, or leave us a comment here!

Book release

Stretched Skin will be released on November 18th 2017 at the 3rd International Body Suspension Symposium in Berlin

The Symposium will have a full program of lectures, classes, exhibitions, and performances over three days. Saturday, November 18th will be mainly devoted to Stelarc—featuring an open lecture, the official book release, and a performance collaboration by Stelarc and Håvve Fjell.

story:
The Sinclair ZX Spectrum 48K was my introduction to computing - at the tender age of 13, Santa Claus brought me Sir Clive's latest machine for Christmas and I can honestly say it was love at first sight.  

When pocket money allowed, I adjourned my Speccy with gifts - mostly with the latest games and sometimes even new hardware to extend the machines capabilities.  

I read Newsfield's Crash magazine, a magazine that I craved each month to find out what was going on in the world of Spectrum gaming and to see what awesome cover the infamous Oli Frey had conjured up that month.  

Those years with the Spectrum as my friend are ones I look back on with enormous fondness and and to me was my golden era of computing.  

The video for the campaign is the same as original, so does not map on 100% to this re-print campaign.

This Kickstarter is to raise the funds needed to run a further print run of the very popular Volume 1 of the ZX Spectrum in Pixels series.  

Volume 1 has been sold out for over a year, and I receive daily questions on whether there will be another print run. By going to Kickstarter I can gauge interest and the campaign will be a great way to let as many Spectrum fans I can know that a re-print is under consideration.  

The book, The Story of the ZX Spectrum in Pixels, is 236 pages in length with the 'Sinclair' logo on the front cover of the paper back version being embossed making the book a desirable addition to any gaming fan or book collector.

For the first time Volume 1 will also be available in hardback format with the cover spot varnished - checkout the campaign perks if this is the version you would like.  

The book will be predominantly a visual journey charting the best games on the ZX Spectrum from 1982 onwards within double page spreads.

Each spread has a large iconic image of the game and be accompanied by artwork from the inlay, the game's advertisement where available and further game screens showing the loading screen, menu etc.

We will also be talking to and interviewing 10-15 programmers, artists and musicians to get their view on the Spectrum and how it helped launch their careers into gaming.

And to cap it all off, have captured new imagery of the Spectrum and many of the Spectrum's peripherals.

With the close relationship I have with Roger Kean and Oliver Frey, the book will also contain some great imagery from Crash magazine.

Limited run (15) of Mire Mare game with shiny blue cassette tapes - only 15 for this campaign. Boxed in an Ultimate type box, with badge, poster and double sided instruction card.

 

 

 

Signed cards...

 

 

Early Bird - first 200 will get a copy of 'The Little Books of ZX Spectrum Games' free!

 

 

 

Fusion Retro Books are responsible for producing high quality retro books that follow two distinct series paths. The history series comprises of 'The History of Ocean Software' and 'The Story of US Gold' - books that intricately chart the life of the two great companies from their very beginning to the their demise.

 

 

 

Name : Indie Retro News 
Website : http://www.indieretronews.com

 

Name : Retro Games Collector 
Website : www.retrogamescollector.com

And on Twitter: @Lord_Arse

The Sinclair ZX Spectrum 48K was my introduction to computing - at the tender age of 13, Santa Claus brought me Sir Clive's latest machine for Christmas and I can honestly say it was love at first sight.  
When pocket money allowed, I adjourned my Speccy with gifts - mostly with the latest games and sometimes even new hardware to extend the machines capabilities.  
I read Newsfield's Crash magazine, a magazine that I craved each month to find out what was going on in the world of Spectrum gaming and to see what awesome cover the infamous Oli Frey had conjured up that month.  
Those years with the Spectrum as my friend are ones I look back on with enormous fondness and and to me was my golden era of computing.

story:
Summary

Welcome!

My name is Patricia Loofbourrow, and I'm the author of The King of Hearts: Part 4 of the Red Dog Conspiracy! I would like your help to produce the audiobook for The King of Hearts, a professionally narrated eight-hour work which audio lovers will enjoy for decades to come.

What We Need & What You Get

What we need:

$1700 (estimated) for professional audio narration and audio editing. The exact amount depends on the finished audio hours.

$160 for Indiegogo and Stripe fees, which allows us to bring this to you today.

$140 for shipping your perks and any unexpected costs (for example, if the audio recording goes longer than expected).

Total: $2000

I'm a full time author and my husband is retired. Like me, you may not have an extra $1700 sitting around. But I bet you have $1 USD! And that's all you need to help with this campaign. Yes, you.  :)

Of course, if one of my perks tempts your eye, please claim it! It's here waiting for you.

The book is in production by professional voice actor Machelle Williams right now! If this campaign does not reach its goal, the funds collected will go towards the audiobook. If it goes over, the money will go towards future audiobooks in this 13-part series (yay!).

What you get:

Go to the Perks section to check out all our perks!

The first fifty supporters at any level get a set of high-resolution mobile and desktop wallpapers from graphic and concept artists Artie Cabrera, Rebekah Marie, and Patricia Loofbourrow!

(45 remaining)

 

Stretch goals:

$2500 - map posters! I'll set up actual real life wall posters for the city of Bridges, the Spadros quadrant, Market Center, and the Merca Federal Union that you can hang in your house. Once this goal is hit, EVERY supporter will get a coupon code for 20% off any map you like!

$3000 - I set up The King of Hearts audio MP3 CD! I've had several requests (like at every show I do) for these, but they're super expensive to set up a minimum 50 piece run. Once this goal is hit, EVERY supporter will get a coupon code for 20% off the audio MP3 CD!

$4000 - Double the fun! What would you like me to do when we get here? Go to the Comments section and chime in!

$5000 - I'll be able to set up the audio MP3 CDs for all four audiobooks!  Once this goal is hit, EVERY supporter will get a coupon code for 20% off the set of audio MP3 CDs!

 

Track record

The King of Hearts is the fourth audiobook in the 13-part Red Dog Conspiracy series, all narrated by public speaker and professional voice actor Machelle Williams. These audiobooks are currently available for sale on Audible, Google Play, Apple, and more.

With your help, we can make this and future audiobooks in the series available as well.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

The audiobook is being created right now! All the perks are ready to go.

The only real risk is of the audiobook taking longer to create than anticipated (for example, if Machelle loses her voice or something!). I'll keep you in the loop about everything.

I am putting my trust in your generosity, so the financial risk is all mine.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Don't want to use Indiegogo? No credit or debit card? Is $1 USD too much for you to spare? Currency exchange rates can be a killer. Here are some other ways you can help:

  • Share this campaign! Indiegogo has provided lots of sharing buttons for you. Or you can just cut and paste the link wherever your heart desires! This will help me so very much - without you having to spend a dime.
  • You can preorder the audiobook! If you have PayPal, I have a way for you to get The King of Hearts audiobook (and some perks, if you're quick about it) without a credit card. Once you've checked out that link (so you know what you're getting), if you don't have a credit card, simply contact me with your order and your PayPal email address and I can invoice you.
  • On my contact page (if you scroll down) is a button to donate via PayPal, if you prefer. Please mark the donation with "The King of Hearts audiobook" so I know what the money is for.
  • Join the Red Dog Conspiracy on Patreon! Active Patrons get all my digital works, behind the scenes posts, and much more.

Thank you so much for your support, no matter how you choose to support us!

Patty

story:
Let's support Argemiro García print his book:

Argemiro García Marín is a social leader from Barrancabermeja, Colombia. All his life, he has worked for the social development of low-income workers in his community. He wrote a book entitled ‘Salpicón de un empírico' (Cocktail of an empiricist), but he doesn’t have resources to print it. He wants to print 1.000 books. He would use the income from the sales of the books to cover his daily expenses and to print more copies. He also requires a computer with internet, so he can talk to the people that support him. Argemiro is 72 years old and suffers COPD. He will be grateful for your support and he will give you a digital copy of his book if you help. 

About the book:

Argemiro tells us through his book part of the history of the city of Barrancabermeja and of the epic foundation and development of one the neighborhoods for low-income workers he founded. This neighborhoods has a Community Action Board and currently hosts 350 families with insufficient sources of income.

Apoyemos a Argemiro García a imprimir su libro:

Argemiro García Marín es un líder social de Barrancabermeja, Colombia, que toda su vida trabajó por el desarrollo social de las personas humildes. Escribió un libro que se llama ‘Salpicón de un empírico’, pero no tiene recursos para imprimirlo. Se requiere imprimir 1.000 libros. Con la venta del libro espera poder cubrir los gastos básicos y dejar un recurso para seguir imprimiendo su libro. Requiere de un computador y pagar un año de internet para poder comunicarse con las personas que lo quieren apoyar. No maneja el internet, pero quiere hacerlo. Argemiro tiene 72 años y padece de EPOC. Él le agradecerá el apoyo que le dé y le dará una copia de su libro por correo electrónico.

Sobre el libro:

Argemiro nos cuenta a través de sus artículos parte de la historia de la ciudad de Barrancabermeja y en particular la epopeya de la fundación y el desarrollo de uno de sus barrios: “La nueva esperanza”, barrio que él fundó, en el cual fue presidente de la Junta de Acción Comunal por muchos años y en el que vive en la actualidad, junto con 350 familias de ingresos insuficientes.

story:
It's never been a better time to be an author, considering the easy access to ebooks and online bookshops. But many authors try self publishing, which might see them paying large sums of money to be published with little support. Or, to get their work out with virtually no outlay, they skip the editing process and publish work that wasn't quite ready.

I don't believe in asking authors to pay to publish their work. But I do believe that they deserve fair compensation, alongside help to get that work as good as it can be before it is released into the wild. 

All authors will be considered by Rillington Press, whether it's their first or their ninety-first book. They will have as much support as they need throughout, access to experienced editors and designers at fair prices and, most importantly, a competitive royalty paid at regular intervals. 

But - until we're selling a few books, there are a number of costs that will need to be met. And that's why you're reading this.

First year costs that need your support include:

  • Freelance fees. Proofreading, typesetting, ebook creation and some covers will be done in-house. Copy editing and some graphic design will be outsourced to trusted contacts.
  • ISBNs. Books need ISBNs and it is more cost effective to buy a batch upfront than to buy them individually. 
  • Printing of paperback books. The print-on-demand model can be used very effectively to keep costs down but early copies still need to be paid for before there is a steady cash flow. Additionally, if the books are to go into retail outlets (and that's a decision that will ultimately be made by each author), a traditional print run will be needed. 
  • Proof copies. Essential before allowing a print run to start.
  • Author copies. Freebies to the author to keep, sell or give away as they choose. 
  • Promotion. Of course, a great deal of promotion happens on social media and that's free, but that's rarely enough to make a big and fast impact for a new title. Plus, Rillington Press itself needs to be marketed.
  • General overheads such as web hosting.

To get going, the first release from Rillington Press will be a new edition of The Lodger, written by Marie Adelaide Belloc Lowndes in 1913 - a fine example of an early thriller, based on Jack the Ripper's activities - with an original introduction to Mrs Belloc Lowndes and the times she lived in.

'But that's not by a new author!' you may say. No, it isn't. But as well as finding new authors, I want to share what I consider classics: books that aren't in any of the top-ten-lists-of-books-you-need-to-read. 

Longer term, I would like to add audio books to the catalogue. If this campaign is successful, funds will help to achieve that.

So, what do you get out of this?

Everyone who is kind enough to contribute will be listed on the Rillington Press website as a permanent reminder their generosity, but there are a few gifts available, too. 

Even if you can't contribute, you can still help. 

Please let all of your bookworm friends know about this campaign! There are some handy social sharing buttons up there ↑

The Lodger is set for release towards the end of March 2019 and will be available in paperback and ebook formats. I'll update you as the date gets closer!

 

Thank you,
Annie

story:
L.I.F.E. ~ The Reproduction Process Of Purpose

Have you ever had a dream or day dream that just seemed so real you could almost feel yourself in that place? You know that dream where all your five senses seem to come alive in that moment. Well what if I told you your dreams, goals and desires weren't just meant to stay in that imaginary dream cloud, but they were meant to awake that voice inside you to, "GET...UP!" This books soul purpose is to teach people how to go from dream inception to a reality you can touch, feel, see and be! After all every single person on the planet has a dream or desire to have, do or be something, but few know how to give birth to it and make it their reality. Well guess what! I cracked the code and this book will lay the “how-to” road-map! 

(This is a mock-up image of what the book will look like)

Please share this campaign with as many people as you can and I have some amazing gifts for you in return!


Why I Need Your Support:

Your support funds will go to the following:

  • The Book is finished, but now it's time to go through the editing process. To make sure the book has the feeling it's intended, I have chosen Create Space, (An Amazon Company) to do my editing and  Marketing. This will insure quality along with passion is felt with every page turned.
  • I want to Market this book through different social media outlets, press releases and different news and media outlets as well. 
  • I also want to raise funds for airfare for a bunch of mini-book-tours all over the country this year, from New York to DC, Atlanta to Los Angela's, San Francisco and back home to Seattle. Based on fares for recent flights I’ve taken, $7500 is my best guess for overall expenses.

The Impact

I remember hearing a powerful analogy from the great Motivational Speaker Les Brown and it goes like this: The perfect scenario for anyone to die, would be with all their family and friends around their bedside sending them off in love. But imagine for a minute that at the side of your death bed are the faces of your dreams never pursued, talents and gifts never used and Purpose never fulfilled and they are staring at you with large angry eyes and they say, “We came to YOU and only you could have given us life!!! And now…we must die with you….forever…” My question for you, is if you were to die today, what dreams, what gifts, what talents, what ideas would you end up taking with you?

I find it completely fascinating that every single person on this earth has their own set of finger prints. No one has the same finger print as you, which means no one can leave the exact same mark as you. Think about that for a minute... You are a custom original, never to be duplicated! So why spend even a second of your precious life wishing you had someone else’s? You were meant to leave your mark on this world in some way. This book will give you the confidants, conviction, motivation and inspiration to start living your dreams NOW!


A Little About Me......

Some of you are already friends and family. But for those who don’t know me, my name is Josh Croskey and I am a Life Coach, Motivational Speaker, Entrepreneur and life long pursuer of Purpose Living! I am someone that came from very humble beginnings, where dreaming big was better left in the keepsake box of your mind for no one to know or hear, because around my neighborhood greatness or living out your dreams was a far off planet. Until I grew up, broke my silent thinking and shouted, "I have a dream that needs to get out!!!" And I pursued....
Fast forward to 2016 and I am the owner of several websites and businesses across multiple different business verticals and oh yeah all I have is a high school diploma, no college degree. One this I do have though is intense passion to live out my personal greatness. And I want nothing more than this for every person I meet! My journey has had many squiggly turns and my testimony is genuine and meant to help better someone else's life.
Most importantly I am a husband to the most amazing women to walk the earth, (my opinion) and father to the greatest 7 children a man can ask for. You heard that correct 7 kids!!!


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Share, share share, and share some more! This message needs to touch millions!
  • Donate whatever you can! Whether $5 - $1,000 it will all help tremendously! So thank you in advance and ill see you at The End of the campain! ;-)

No one has the same finger print as you, which means no one can leave the exact same mark as you. Think about that for a minute... You are a custom original, never to be duplicated! So why spend even a second of your precious life wishing you had someone else’s? You were meant to leave your mark on this world in some way. This book will give you the confidants, conviction, motivation and inspiration to start living your dreams NOW!

A Little About Me......

Some of you are already friends and family. But for those who don’t know me, my name is Josh Croskey and I am a Life Coach, Motivational Speaker, Entrepreneur and life long pursuer of Purpose Living! I am someone that came from very humble beginnings, where dreaming big was better left in the keepsake box of your mind for no one to know or hear, because around my neighborhood greatness or living out your dreams was a far off planet. Until I grew up, broke my silent thinking and shouted, "I have a dream that needs to get out!!!" And I pursued.... Fast forward to 2016 and I am the owner of several websites and businesses across multiple different business verticals and oh yeah all I have is a high school diploma, no college degree. One this I do have though is intense passion to live out my personal greatness. And I want nothing more than this for every person I meet! My journey has had many squiggly turns and my testimony is genuine and meant to help better someone else's life.Most importantly I am a husband to the most amazing women to walk the earth, (my opinion) and father to the greatest 7 children a man can ask for. You heard that correct 7 kids!!!


  
Other Ways You Can Help

 


Share, share share, and share some more! This message needs to touch millions!

Donate whatever you can! Whether $5 - $1,000 it will all help tremendously! So thank you in advance and ill see you at The End of the campain! ;-)

story:
Wer. 

Siempre había querido cambiar al mundo, dejar un legado en éste planeta. Mi proyecto de vida nació de la voluntad y el querer desafiar a todos aquellos que hacían las cosas igual, monótonas, distópicas, Tal vez los sueños son utopías, sin embargo son posibles.

La campaña consiste en la recaudación de fondos de los colaboradores como de mi parte para la realización del proyecto, Cine Wer es el concepto de un cine barato y accesible para todo aquel que entre en él, siguiendo la misma idea con el bar y el restaurante. El precio normal de un cine comercial en Guatemala es entre GTQ90 y GTQ25, con un cargo extra por la comida en ellos que sube de precio hasta un %150 por arriba de un precio normal. Cine Wer, serán festivales de cine desde los inicios del arte cinematográfico hasta nuestros tiempos, cine del buen cine, cine para crear conciencia, cine para evolucionar a un precio entre GTQ15, el precio de las bebidas en el bar será variado pero siempre accesible al igual que el restaurante.

Tu ayuda no solo logrará el cumplimiento de éste desafiante proyecto, sino hacer del cine y su belleza algo accesible para todos sin la necesidad de ahorrar pagos completos para invitar a la familia, conocer y hacer de nuestra mente algo más amplio, de desafiar a esos empresarios que controlan los precios a su antojo y hacen millones del deseo de los demás sin inculcar nada.

La meta son USD$500,000 se utilizarán en la compra del lugar, una antigua casa en estilo Art Decó que se encuentra frente al Antiguo e Histórico Cine Colón de la zona 1 de la Ciudad de Guatemala como también para su restauración y construcción en el interior para el cine en sí mismo, así como la ambientación al estilo 1920 y 1930 en su interior, en el bar y en el restaurante, la compra del equipo para la proyección de las películas y demás para el bar y el restaurante.

La recompensa para los colaboradores es entrada gratis al cine en la duración promedio de un festival (dos semanas), cerveza o tarro gratis por una semana en el bar más un plato en el restaurante.

El impacto

Tenemos en nuestras manos el proyecto y la realización del mismo, No solo desafiaremos a la industria del cine en Guatemala, quienes tienen controlados los precios de todo dentro de ellos, desafiaremos en sí a la industria del todo al demostrar que se puede hacer algo bien y excelente a un precio accesible para todo el mundo. Cine Wer, es el cine, bar y restaurante para todos y todas. Tu ayuda es la diferencia. Desafiemos juntos a la industria.

Riesgos y desafíos

Industria, indumentaria, precios. Desafiar a la industria en un país como éste, es como desafiar al ladrón que se roba todo lo tuyo, o terminas muerto o terminas desgraciado, no solo verán como hunden el proyecto, harán que sus proveedores suban precios para que nosotros hagamos lo mismo que ellos. Sin embargo, el compromiso es y siempre será un cine, un bar y un restaurante accesible para todo el que quiera entrar en él. El compromiso y la promesa es con la gente no con la industria. La indumentaria, y todo lo que necesitamos para proyectar cine, servir y demás será algo difícil para conseguir tener algo de calidad, pero no imposible. Los precios serán siempre los mismos, desde el inicio de la campaña hasta mi muerte. 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Algunas personas no pueden colaborar, pero eso no significa que no puedan ayudar: 

Si no puedes ayudar monetariamente, me ayudaría mucho que generaras eco mediante las redes sociales, pronto abriré una fanpage para que puedas compartir. Vamos por un mundo barato, donde todo es posible.

Recuerda que puedes utilizar herramientas de indiegogo.com para compartir. Eso es todo y muchas gracias.

La meta es flexible, lleguemos a la meta o no utilizaremos los fondos para la recuperación del espacio, su restauración y la realización del proyecto.

Y eso es todo.

story:
Since our relaunch in April 2020, Outside Groove has dug deep beneath the surface of the oval-track racing world to deliver the finest stories in motorsports journalism. The Outside Groove has shined the worldwide spotlight on the Saturday-night heroes of your local short track as much as - if not more than - the national touring stars.

If you wish to read more unbiased reporting from an independent source, please support the cause. Your support goes directly to those who produce the content you enjoy.

Our goal may seem bold, but we wish to expand our coverage for 2021 so that more under-served areas of our sport receive attention.

If a fifth of our monthly visitors contributed $10, we would easily reach our goal.

Thank you for your consideration,

Outside Groove award-winning writers and photographers

story:
American Psychos

Serial killers fascinate and horrify at the same time, and the FBI estimates there are between 25 and 50 active serial killers at any given time in the USA. A terrifying thought, but all too real. This current campaign's ultimate purpose is to produce an anthology of original serial killer fiction by authors well-versed in horror, crime and thriller genres. Inspired by the most disturbingly violent and graphic crime thriller novels of our time, including Bret Easton Ellis's American Psycho and Shane Steven's By Reason of Insanity, our goal is to make American Psychos a brutal, suspenseful, nightmare-inducing hard ride into hell.

Contributors will make it possible for Red Room to offer top dollar for top quality tales. We will be reaching out to some of the most renowned writers and with your help we can make it happen. We also have an open submission period from June through October, and all writers are welcome to submit their stories. If we reach our goal, accepted authors from the open submission will receive an additional $50 bonus!  View the guidelines on the Red Room Press website.

Producing a top-notch anthology takes thousands of dollars and all funds will be used to pay the contributors, the designers, typesetter, and audiobook narrators.

The book will be available in trade-paperback format, ePub, and Mobi. An audiobook will also be produced if sufficient funds are raised. The book is slated for publication in early 2018.

Crowd-funding a book is akin to pre-ordering that book. However, we do hope you’ll take advantage of some of our other great perks and rewards. We’re really excited about American Psychos, and believe it is a unique idea whose time has come. We hope you’ll support its publication.

Who We Are

Red Room Press (an imprint of Comet Press) is an independent publisher of extreme horror fiction, thrillers and crime fiction. Executive Editor/Publisher Cheryl Mullenax has been at the helm for its entire ten years in the business and has published works by such authors as George R.R. Martin, Jack Ketchum, Ramsey Campbell, Barbie Wilde, Alessandro Manzetti, Graham Masterton, Joe R. Lansdale and Ed Lee. With co-editor Randy Chandler, Cheryl edits the popular Year's Best Hardcore Horror series.

Perks

Digital copies will be delivered via download links and available in mobi, epub, and PDF. Backers will receive American Psychos digital copies at least two weeks prior to the publication date. Perks other than American Psychos will be delivered within 60 days after our campaign ends. Besides print and digital copies of American Psychos, other perks include:

Red Room, a special edition magazine of hardcore dark crime and extreme horror, full color and fully illustrated, featuring fiction by Jack Ketchum (RIP), Meg Elison, Tim Waggoner, David James Keaton, Larry Hinkle, Tom Barlow, Nick Manzolillo, Josh Scott Wilson, and Gil Valle. The magazine was released just a few months before Jack Ketchum's untimely demise.

Year's Best Hardcore Horror: Our bestselling annual collection of the year's best extreme horror fiction by authors that breaks boundaries and trashes taboos. Going strong into our fourth year!

Plus various anthologies that Red Room Press and Comet Press have produced in the past decade including:

  • Necro Files: Two Decades of Extreme Horror includes authors George R.R. Martin, Bentley Little, Edward Lee, many more.
  • The Death Panel: Dark crime antho includes authors Tom Piccirilli (RIP), Simon Wood, Scott Nicholson, and many more.
  • Vile Things: Extreme horror antho includes authors Ramsey Campbell, Graham Masterton, CJ Henderson (RIP).
  • Sick Things: Extreme creature horror antho includes authors John Shirley and Simon Wood.
  • Stiff Things: Splatterporn antho includes authors Brandon Ford, Kristopher Triana, Eric LaRocca.

PLUS:  The editor is sacrificing her highly treasured, personalized signed copy of Stephen King's Song of Susannah  for this project. The book was signed in person at Barnes and Noble in the mid 2000s in NYC. Now that is dedication!

 

Risks & Challenges

If we don't meet our goal, we still intend to go through with this project. However, it will be much more difficult to reach out to top writers and pay them top rates. In our ten years of publishing we have followed through with every anthology project.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand there are some who can't contribute, but you can still help us out by spreading the word and using the Indiegogo share tools!

Visit Red Room Press on the web at:

redroompress.com
facebook.com/redroompress
twitter.com/redroombooks

story:
If you're ready to explore the magical world of pixies and discover the beauty of navigating emotions than I invite you to come play with Scarlet, Della and Molly pixie.

My dream, is to help all the little pixies out there understand and handle big feelings and have emotional empowerment, is just as important to me as parenting my 6-year-old little girl, who is my co-founder and the inspiration for my business, Scarlett.

I have been reading parenting books for many years but am always left looking for a kinder and more connective way to teach my little girl. Like any other parent, I want to do the best for my child, and I realised that by helping Scarlett understand emotions, fear, and empathy now, I would help her as an adult. I started reading my stories to her and she loved them, so I thought it was time I share them.

I don’t have a writing background; I haven’t been working as a blogger or journalist, I’m ‘just’ a mum. My love of writing started when I was seven years old, when I used to write plays and then perform them at school. I loved that time in my childhood; I loved being creative.

However, when I was a little bit older, the word dyslexia came into my life and my writing stopped.  I was schooled in the eighties when ‘if you couldn’t learn it was your fault, not the outdated teaching style’.

Let me leap ahead to last year; I met this wonderful, spiritual teacher who told me that I needed to start writing again, and to write about the pixies I had created, linking their tales to my past hurts and things I had learned. 

She told me to look out for butterflies and that when I see them then I will know I am on the right path. So the next day, ever so excited, I pulled up my chair and sat by my open patio doors, and I started to write. From out of nowhere a flurry of butterflies were flying towards me it was such a delicious sight. I knew after that magical experience that I had to write this book.

 

 

About the book.......

Please help us publish this book

'Finding my wings' is a book that consists of three short stories, told by each pixie- Scarlet, Molly, and Della, and they tell the reader the challenges that they experience to get their pixie wings and fly to Pixie land.  Each pixie tells their story through an interview with me, the chief pixie.

I’ve created this book for 3– 6 years old, to be read at bedtime, which is my favourite time with Scarlett.

 

First story

Introducing Scarlet Pixie

Storyline

Scarlet Pixie is organising a birthday party for her friend, Raven the Horse, and when she goes to visit her friends to collect everything she needs for the party – banner, cake and birthday presents — her friends are struggling with emotions (anger, sadness, and excitement). She uses her superpowers to help her friends and gives them emotional empowerment an in return she gets her wings.

Quotes from the story

“Goodbye sadness, let’s blow it away — one, two, three," said Scarlet Pixie.

“I went running into his house and found that it was hoggeldy poggeldy”  said Scarlet Pixie

which means everything is upside down in Pixie language

 

Second Story

Introducing Molly Pixie

Storyline

Molly Pixie is curious and is looking for her wings because she wants to go to Pixie land. So she visits her insect friends, bee, dragonfly and butterfly, hoping that they might have the answer. She has to be thoughtful, brave and kind to all her friends in return she gets her wings and superpower, 

Quote from the story

“I was still licking my fingers and, with my mouth full, I said in a curious manner, ‘I have a question for you, Ragon. Where did you get your beautiful wings from, as I am looking for my wings?” said Molly Pixie

 

Third Story

Introducing Della Pixie

Storyline

Della lives in a box alone and is frightened, afraid of her own shadow, but decides to be brave and go to Pixie land. However, leaving the box is a little harder than she thought when she meets some park animals.

Della has to handle fear; she does this by singing a song when she is afraid, she makes lots of mistakes along the way, but finally, she faces her fear and in return gets her superpowers and her wings.

Quote from the story

Then I looked down in my puddle of tears and I noticed that my dress was no longer black and white striped it was yellow striped and there was a beautiful big bow on the dress.

 

Pixie secret Shhh don't tell the little pixies, but every time a pixie does something thoughtful for her friends her dress changes in the book, but only you can see it.

My Team

I am so lucky to work with a wonderful mother, Hayley Vine (popandbangillustrations) who is an inspirational illustrator and has turned the vision in my head into the characters you see before you. We are still putting the final touches on the pixie illustrations and I am so excited to see the next images.

I also have a fantastic team (Iam Harvey and Mike Burton)  who created the most amazing video and photographs. Who understand my vision for Finding my wings.

I want to thank the wonderful parenting authors and personal development authors who I have read for many years and have helped me create this wonderful book.

Joanne, my spiritual angel.- without you, I would never have found my true 'JOY'

My Goal

You are free to choose but, by helping, you will turn my dream into a reality, your funds will go towards printing/ publishing/illustrations for the book along with marketing and advertising and spreading the pixie word.

This dream is so important to me; if just one child reads one of my books and understands anger, and is not frightened by it, or can embrace fear as part of life, then my job is done. My job was to write these stories from love and then share them. I strongly believe in the pay-it-forward technique and that if one child learns something she will share it with another.

Please spread the pixie word for me, the more noise, the better my campaign will do, and the closer I will be to turning my dream into my reality.

I hope you enjoy reading my book, as much as I loved every minute writing it.

Joanne, my spiritual angel.- without you, I would never have found my true 'JOY'
My Goal
You are free to choose but, by helping, you will turn my dream into a reality, your funds will go towards printing/ publishing/illustrations for the book along with marketing and advertising and spreading the pixie word.
This dream is so important to me; if just one child reads one of my books and understands anger, and is not frightened by it, or can embrace fear as part of life, then my job is done. My job was to write these stories from love and then share them. I strongly believe in the pay-it-forward technique and that if one child learns something she will share it with another.
Please spread the pixie word for me, the more noise, the better my campaign will do, and the closer I will be to turning my dream into my reality.
I hope you enjoy reading my book, as much as I loved every minute writing it.

story:
The dream of reaching out to the world, conquering the universe always obsesses  human beings. The Apollo missions were an amazing achievement of ingenuity, passion, bravery and commitment to achieve the seemingly impossible dream of landing a man on the moon and returning him safely to Earth.    

It took years to plan and thousands of people to accomplish this task. As a result, on July 16th, 1969 the massive Saturn V rocket lifted off from NASA's Kennedy Space Center carrying three astronauts on their mission to the moon.

 

In 2019, the 50th anniversary of the Apollo 11 project, looking back 50 years to 1969, we respect all the Men and Women at NASA and supporting sites around the world who were able to achieve this incredible feat without nowadays technology.

To remind descendants, to arouse the passion of science, and the desire to reach out to the world are the main objectives of this campaign.

In honor of this achievement we have set out to produce the highest quality reproduction:

1/ The story of the Apollo project

We will compose all of the milestones, details of the Apollo project to bring a story, a true documentary of human journey into the space.

On July 20th, 1969 two American astronauts ( Neil Armstrong, Buzz Aldrin ) became the first men to step on the moon. It was a dream and a challenge set forth by one man, President John F. Kennedy, when he declared in May of 1961 : 

 

 

We will bring you the journey from the first brick to the final success of Apollo 11.

Everything will be coming true and clear about the work of passion, blood, tears and enthusiasm of everyone in the project. All bursted when the final success of Apollo 11 came. A story of cooperation, morale, sacrifice for the common purpose of human beings. You will be immersed in the re-imagined space of the Apollo project. We want it to inspire you in your life since maybe you are the one who will take the humanity to discover this vast universe.

 

450 pages of books are edited and carefully selected, bringing you into the world of Apollo missions.

 

2/ The Story Of The Apollo Project For Kid

Special editions for children. The story of the Apollo project journey has been edited to be understood easily and friendly to children, encouraging curiosity and love for science, giving children the motivation to develop their passions.

 

 Our specialists are very caring for this publication. We want to inspire our children, and make them cosmic citizens

 

3/ The Apollo 11 Mission Control

  The Apollo 11 Final Flight Manual used by Mission Control, Flight Controllers, Astronauts and supporting personnels around the globe throughout the Apollo 11 mission.

 

We set out one goal which is to recreate the Apollo 11 Final Flight Manual in the most accurate way. 

We start from the beginning to reproduce every single page, using accurate fonts, colors, spacing and papers, as well as re-draw all vector graphics based on very high resolution scans of the original Apollo 11 Final Flight Plan.

All texts have been reproduced using the same font as the original Flight Manual. We are using the same line spacing and every letter appears in the exact same position on the page as the original Apollo 11 Flight Manual.

 

It all strives to bring a true vision of what has happened, what the previous generation did and reminded us of responsibility for the future.

 

4/ The Apollo 11  Project Lunar Landing Chart

The Original 1967 NASA Apollo 11 Lunar Landing Chart Restored, Recolored, and Reissued.

 

This reissue of The Apollo 11 Lunar Landing Chart will measure 1' x 3' ( 12" x 36"/30cm x 92cm ). It will be printed on 80lb glossy cover stock with a UV coating and feature a 1/4" border - in black - so it will be easy to frame. The title block will also feature foil stamping to really commemorate the occasion. This is a standard panorama frame size as well, so pre-made frames can easily be purchased.

This chart is a wonderful paper souvenir of one of the most glorious events in humankind and yet very few people own it. So we hope to change your mind with this project.

A fifty-year-old chart has been given new life.....it deserves this.

 

 

5/ Human Mission To Mars

 

Mission to conquer Mars will start soon. This is the right time for us to celebrate the past and look forward to the future. Therefore, our team has composed the most valuable documents about the projects which brings us to Mars and their progress.

 

With the most intuitive images and information, you will not regret having possession of this kit and using it to talk to your children. Maybe your kids will become the person bringing human out of the earth.

 

THE STICKER SET FOR ALL BACKER

One 4" circular sticker features the original artwork from the Apollo 11 mission patch. The astronauts wanted the image on the patch to be symbolic so they chose a bald eagle with its "landing gear" extended. The eagle is the proud symbol of the United States but it was also the name of the lunar module. To symbolize the peaceful nature of the mission, the eagle carries an olive branch - the symbol of peace.

 

The Highest Quality Document

All tables and diagrams have been recreated using vector artwork, this allows us to infinitely scale and create the highest quality printed document.

 

Everything will be reproduced in minute details including fold out charts as per the original documents

The materials we compiled will be in great quality. Everything is made to be precise and detailed so that everyone has the best experience, inspired life and creativity.

 

Each page document will be shipped in your choice of binder. We have a finished prototype artwork, a confirmed manufacturer for the binders as well as a printer who is able to produce the document to our exact specifications.

 

Each page will also be printed on reinforced paper to eliminate stretching or tearing.

 

We need your kindly help to fund an exclusive production run, so please get back us by today.

 

 

All NASA logos and works are owned by NASA.

 We maintain NASA as the source of the Campaign

 

When I can receive my order?

Our team has started working since the campaign kicked off, the printout will get ready soon.

Actual shipping dates will vary depending on your country, your location, and when you’ve placed your order. We will keep you up to date on every step of the process.

In order to deliver safely and efficiently, the orders will be dispatched by different courier companies, depending on the destination regions. Consequently we may ship out in a slightly different order from the initial buying sequence.

Change of address?   

At the end of the campaign, we will send out a survey confirming where you would like receive the delivery.

story:
Misconceptions

Russia is not all cold. I come from the South, from the mountains. On the southern slopes they grow oranges and tea. You’ve heard about those places: Georgia, Abkhazia. At my place on the northern side of the range it’s a bit cooler, but it’s still the South, the Caucasus.

In 2002 I moved to Canada. That is another life; another dimension in the world of worlds. After violence and war Canada felt like rehabilitation, like a model paradise. Here I had to shed some misconceptions. For example, I saw a poster on the subway in Toronto about an exhibition of Iroquois art. I was surprised, because the Iroquois were the baddies, but the poster didn’t show that. And it clicked: my impression of the Iroquois came from Fenimore Cooper, whom I read when I was little. The Iroquois sided with the French in his novels, so that’s why they were villains, because they were on the other side of the fence in a book of fiction. And in any case by now that fence was gone; the glorious poster was the evidence. Just like that, in the blink of an eye, a whole chunk of knowledge was updated.

Many years later, after careful consideration, I realize I have something really unique to offer to the public. So here I am, on Indiegogo, hoping to raise funds from the public for the financing of my book. 

Experiment in Literary Investigation – that’s the subtitle of Solzhenitsyn’s famous book “The Gulag Archipelago”. I borrow this subtitle for use in the same way: the compilation and analysis of personal and trustworthy observations. That turns out to be a genre. It must be conceptually close to the American genre of gonzo-journalism, where the author is a participant in the reported events, as in Hunter S. Thompson’s books. So I’m borrowing some things from these writers, as well as Bulgakov, Capote, Márquez, Salinger.

The book’s main themes are individual, culture and identity, in short. The following text introduces the author, expands on some of the themes and tries, all in all, to persuade you to support this campaign.

 

The Author 

Educated in the field of linguistics, a programmer and a graphic designer by trade, I also make unpopular music and untimely art. (That’s not a value judgement, rather a statement of the results’ utter utilitarian uselessness). For me there is no precarious contradiction here – all those occupations have something in common: knowledge translation. For example, as a programmer I translate human needs for a machine and machine capabilities to the humans. A graphic designer, I translate my ideal (philosophically speaking) vision of the world into my work: identities, logotypes, websites – things that add to our sensory lives. Sensations I translate into art. This is what I really do under the surface of routines: I am a translator, converter of information.

Here are three reasons why supporting this book is objectively a good and useful action.

 

Historicity

As far as my story goes, you’ve probably heard about my city, maybe on the news, in a segment about a war in Chechnya, or the Beslan hostage tragedy, or some of those 2,000+ terrorist attacks that were carried out in Russia since 1990 (says Wiki). Likely you’ve forgotten, as I would, and everybody does. That’s why eyewitness accounts are important. We have a better chance of not repeating our mistakes while we remember them.

Enough mistakes were made there under very catastrophic circumstances, in the environment that went from neutral to hostile. I am talking about the time of the disintegration of the Soviet State and the long spell of anarchy that followed. That time has left a scar across the largest country in the world. Previously such a wound that affected every person was WWII.

That wound, that post-Soviet anarchy that Putin switched off (why his popularity will not fall below the election minimum) has found some reflection in our human record. For example, in the Russian villains characters in the movies. Very little of that has to do with the periphery like the Caucasus, let alone a small distinct region there. 

In academia it’s the reports from the various human rights organizations. I read their reports and use their stats (hats off!), but their interests and mine are in two different dimensions. They are interested in the processes at the satellite view level – nothing wrong with that – when my view is from ‘here is my breakfast’ level. 

My material lends itself elegantly to literary expression, but I don’t think I can pull off fiction. So I decided to be honest, in the sense of trying to tell the truth to the best of my ability and to the extent of my courage. It is a quest both personal and documentary. And here is the rub: life in a city like mine in the Caucasus in the 90s is not well-documented. It means that there is a space for my book.

 

Fairness

Caucasians are ancient tribes... Now wait a minute, what tribes? This kind of thing used to amuse me: a tall blonde Norseman called a Caucasian. In the West the white people are called “Caucasian” after that same Caucasus, out of a peculiar taste of J. F. Blumenbach for Georgian skulls. He was a founding anthropologist two hundred years ago. In Russian the word specifically refers to the individuals of the Caucasian ethnicities, they mostly look Middle Eastern or Mediterranean.

So, those are the Caucasians, ancient tribes, they were always there. They carried their cultures through centuries of living between two seas – in the path for armies, in the way of merchants – and are fiercely proud of it. Their sagas root all the way in the Neolithic. In the past. The past has been studied well-enough. Archaeology and myth comprise much of geographically relevant literature.

But how exactly did those cultures go through those same periods – socialism and anarchy? You may have heard about the traditional hospitality and generosity in the Caucasus. But what do you know about the Caucasian racism, sexism, violence, rapes?

Those evil facts of life, inescapable like the hot thick air before a thunderstorm, endless like a polar night with wolves outside – individual terror doesn’t get into stats. I heard the survivors back then, telling me their stories tête-à-tête – in corridors during long waits, smoking on the stairs, on the phone. People talked with me, and sometimes, after a conversation or two, shared their pains. I do not intend to betray their trust. But for the sake of their suffering they are owed a validation. They deserve their existence to be acknowledged. I think it has to be done, and I’m doing it in the book. 

 

Utility

It took me a decade to begin to understand the Canadian reality, see its dynamics, and feel it for my own. In those transitional years I saw many misconceptions and found some curious trends in how they were constructed and in which one of the three lives.

My three lives. High socialism. Anarcho-capitalism. Advanced democracy. Different planets with different priority of gravities, shon at by the same stars, at different angles. I use the extraordinary and systemic differences between those realities for analytical triangulation of sorts. Just like human eyes, modern telescopes can be used in pairs and clusters for more precise observation. That’s the way I use my three matrices in the book. If we examine a common phenomenon from two or more deep and rich points of view we add a dimension, a perspective to it, and see its true nature, its (possibly human) condition more precisely.

I use this method to examine, among other things, the shared problems, many of which I’ve seen in concentration. My Western life provides the reality into which I translate the realities of the past so you could really get it. Maybe we can prevent some things from happening, if we understand them better.

Maybe we can manage the known problems better if we know more about them. I hope that my observations may contribute to the public discourse on real, painful issues: drug addiction, alcoholism, bullying. If this book shifts something somewhere and helps one person rise above those evils – this whole project will not be in vain.

 

Conclusion

I’m grateful for your consideration.

One more thing: I am afraid that my choice of examples may misrepresent the book as a comparative study in misery. That is not so. I am far enough removed from my own memories to examine them objectively. Good and the beauty are there. But I would rather stop giving out spoilers. 

 

Money Talk

I am finishing my pile of material, looking forward to editing: rewriting, structuring, styling. Then typesetting, layout, all that design and then release. If this campaign is not successful, none of that will happen in years, likely ever, because it hasn’t happened in years past. If the campaign succeeds I’ll just work on the book until it’s done. Unless who knows what. I heard somewhere that startups usually take twice the time and three times the money over what founders expect.

This is exactly what Indiegogo is for, isn’t it, to distribute the risk? Almost like a form of insurance for projects that promise a net benefit to the society. I estimate the risk of five  months, plus a small warchest/error-fund and various expenses at 20,000 CAD (~15k USD) and I can’t carry this risk alone. I’ll carry other risks: misjudging the required time, underestimating costs, risking all my future campaigns on this first try. But what I hope to get out of this campaign is captive audience, because maybe people who care enough to contribute might also be inclined to read this book, or pass it on to somebody who will.

 

20,000 CAD = 21,739 CAD (≈16,722 USD)

If this campaign succeeds the result will be an ebook. Every contribution is significant for our goal, every contributor will get an electronic version of the book.

The goal doesn’t include the 8% of Indiegogo’s and bank’s fees, so if we factor those in we get 21,739 CAD (≈ 16,722 USD).

In case I fail to raise the money, whatever I do raise will be used for some book-related purposes anyway, everything will depend on how much is lacking. 

My material is ripening, like grapes. There will be a moment really soon when it will have to be harvested and processed. That’s why I’m here counting on your help.

The $21,739 is the optimal goal, the goal to shoot for. Please do what you can and support this campaign now.

story:
We are super excited to announce the publication of our second book!

Sarah Awa’s book Hunter’s Moon is scheduled to be released on January 1st. However, pre-orders will be available starting December 25th. Pre-orders are a chance to get the book at a discount and to help the book come out of the publishing gate at a higher ranking on Amazon. 

Here’s the back-cover summary of the book and a peek at the front cover:

After a wild animal attack, Melanie Caldwell ends up sick and disoriented. She and her friends think she’s suffering from infection and just needs to go to the doctor. Then she’s kidnapped on the day of the next full moon, and discovers in the worst way that monsters are real . . . and that she has become one of them.

All Melanie wanted was to get a boyfriend and graduate college. Now she has to somehow deal with agonizing monthly transformations, a secret organization stalking her, friends and enemies trying to discover her secret, and hunters looming on the horizon.

If only she knew whom to trust. . . .

 

 

What We Need to Publish

Through our Indiegogo campaign, which will begin December 18th and end December 31st, we’ll be raising funds to print physical copies of the book. We’ve sourced our printing through the printers we have researched that offer us the best bang for the buck. But, even so, copies of books still add up. Each copy we print costs us about $5 for just the printing. We plan on ordering about 500 books for our first run of printing. That means each book costs an initial $2,500. 

Risks & Challenges

Sometimes I wonder why...why bother starting Thinklings Books or any company? It's such a hard endeavor! What'd we get ourselves into? We're small fish in a great big ocean. Heck, we're fish eggs right now. Caviar. … Caviar. High quality, costly, of great value. And trying to help other writers who are small but valuable too. That thought helps me just keep swimming.

Other Ways You Can Help

1. Book Reviews

Honest reviews are super hard to come by, especially for first-time authors, but are one of the best ways to boost sales.

I know, also, that people get extra nervous about writing reviews. I’m sure it has something to do with those awful page-long book reports we had to do in school, but this isn’t going to be graded and doesn’t need to be nearly as long. You don’t even have to summarize the book; that’s what the book’s summary is for. Did you like the book because you liked how the main character talked? Say that. If you thought it was really good, but you were hoping for a certain ending and that didn’t happen? Write that.

Honest, short, to-the-point. 

2. Share Their Social Media Posts

It’s hard for many writers to continually post about themselves. Writers mostly tend to be a quiet, self-deprecating lot. With our Platform in a Box, we teach them some types of simple posts they can make about their books, but it’s even more helpful if you can share these posts.

No need to add anything to it if you don’t want to. A simple share to page, or retweet, is fine. If you want to go the extra mile, like the Thinklings Books page on Facebook and share our posts about the author.

3. Book Launch Party

​If you are really up for some party planning and have that pizzazz, then working with a local library, bookstore, or other venue to plan a fabulous book signing / launch party is a wonderful gift for the writer in your life. If you have terrific party-planning skills but don’t know anything about book launches, just send an email to contact@thinklingsbooks.com. I’ll be more than willing to help you brainstorm.

Authors can, of course, plan their own party; but it does seem more legit to bookstores if someone else does it . . . even if you are just the person of contact, fill out the permission forms, and then disappear into the night. 

Even if you aren’t the planning or form-filling type, you can still make sure that you show up for the book signings or launch party. Having a friendly face in the crowd makes even the most boisterous, confident author feel more at ease.

4. Low-Tech Sharing

Even if you don’t like computers, social media, or the internet, you can still talk up the book on the physical streets. Your author can give you bookmarks, posters, or flyers to put in schools, libraries, bookstores, or community centers. You can even use mankind’s oldest (and arguably greatest) technology: the spoken word. Tell your book club. Tell your mother. Tell your friend who likes to read.

Here are a few additional low-tech options:

-Put the book in one of those little free library boxes. 

-Leave the book on a table in a coffee shop.

-Gift the book to readers in your life.

-Give the book, if applicable, to local school libraries.

-Form your own book club and use your author’s book as the first book.

-Leave a flyer wherever you see people reading books.


5. Putting Books on Consignment at Bookstores

The author can, again, put their book on consignment at a local bookstore, but it looks better if someone else does this. Most local bookstores have a form you can fill out, and you can give them a couple of copies of the book. You can ask your author, or email us at contact@thinklingsbooks.com, for wholesale copies of the book to give to bookstores.

When the bookstores sell the book, they keep a certain amount of the profit and will hand the rest over to you. Usually these consignment contracts have a specific amount of time that they will have your book available. If the book doesn’t sell all of its copies before the end, you will need to come back and pick them up.

This is an especially good strategy if you are having a book signing at the local bookstore. Most of the copies will be sold right around the time of the book signing. If your author is well known in the community, you may be able to negotiate for a really good placement for the book. But, even if she is not well known, many local bookstores do have a special place for local authors to be displayed, and often quite prominently. 

If you need help negotiating this area, shoot Thinklings Books an email, and we’ll be happy to help you out. We’re here to make everyone’s job easier.

6. Requesting at Libraries

Did you know that you can request books to be at your local library? Some libraries will have the book available after just one request. Others require a few more. On the other hand, libraries also have e-books for borrowing as well. You can check out the author’s book on your Kindle or other e-reader device through the library’s online catalog. This is an easy way for the library to offer a wide array of books without actually buying them. If enough people check out the e-book from the library, they may even decide to have a hard copy available as well.

You can just walk right up to the librarian and ask if they have your author’s book available. You don’t even need to let them know the author is a friend. Just see if they have it available. They will look it up and say one of 3 things: 1) Yes, we have it available. 2) We do not have the hard copy of it, but you can download it via the online catalog. 3) We do not have it available, but you can submit a request; here’s the form or the link to the form. 

Easy peasy. 

7. Writing Reviews on Goodreads

In addition to leaving reviews on Amazon, you can also use Goodreads, which is a social media platform for readers. You just need to follow the same advice I gave above for Amazon. In fact, you can leave the same review you left on Amazon.

8. Leaving Comments on Their Blog

As part of Platform in a Box, authors are given a simple website with a blog. They will once, maybe twice per month, write a post on the blog about their book, give an update on it or themselves, or on something related to their craft.

Checking in once in a while and leaving a simple, authentic comment such as “Can’t wait to see you at the book festival!” is great. Asking the author a question is also great. For example, “Who is your favorite author?”

9. Join The Readers’ Collective

The Readers’ Collective is Thinklings Books’ group of diehard fans and readers. We send out weekly updates on our authors, which will include yours; YouTube videos; artwork; blogs; important links and dates; podcasts; and much more. It’s the easiest way to keep abreast of Thinklings’ offerings and what is going on in your author’s life. 

Being part of the Collective comes with quite a few perks, such as discounts on books, exclusive author interviews and artwork from their books, and sneak peeks at videos and recordings of their books. You never know what goodies might show up in your inbox!

It’s easy to sign up. Just follow this link and put in your email address and you’ll be all set. Make sure you check your spam folder so it doesn’t get junked before you see it.

10. Get Involved with Crowdfunding

Thinklings Books does publishing a little differently. We’re a small press, and we use a structure similar to PBS or NPR. We pay our authors higher royalties, to boot. To borrow from PBS: Without the financial support of readers like you, Thinklings wouldn’t exist. If you want to learn more about how Thinklings operates and is different, we did a three-part blog series on the topic.

In addition to this page, we also have Patreon, which will allow people to support our writers and our creative endeavors on a monthly basis. Patreon might be something many of you have never heard of before, but I think it is super awesome! It’s a website that puts a modern spin on the age-old idea of patronage. Most great artists of the past, from Leonardo da Vinci to Mozart, had patrons. Most of the time, these patrons were extremely wealthy families with money to burn. However, Patreon makes patronage accessible to even the average Joe. With monthly patronage subscriptions as low as $1 per month, even high school students have the ability to support artists of their choice. Like patrons of old, Patreon subscribers get special bonuses from the artists beyond the reach of the general public. We’ll be reading our first chapters on video, providing exclusive artwork related to the books, and giving control of picking video critiques to our Patreon subscribers. Plus a lot more!
