The eBook version of Rolling Around the World will also be added to every $30+ Perk.180+ Backers unlocks the lush, tropical story and photos from the 2012 Morton's List trip to Guatemala for the dawn of B'ak'tun 13 on the Mayan Calendar, and the Find Atlantis Quest, leading to the Bimini dive.270+ Backers unlocks rare, archival stories and photos from the Karmic Gatherings of the mid 2000s in such locations as Michigan, Tennessee, Florida, and Alaska.360+ Backers unlocks deep, esoteric stories of the making of Morton's List from the earliest days, including never before seen art, and many more mysteries revealed. 
Travel Stretch Goals . . .
$13k upgrades the entire travel package to a fully private and all-Sumerian experience with Alwaseilah Tours!$20k sends a second random person* on the private tour - and it could be you!$30k sends a third person* on the private tour - for another chance to join for free!*No cost. Details will be released when this stretch goal is unlocked. 
Join the Trip . . .
$4.5k+ to join Matt on this Quest of a lifetime. Serious inquiries . . . mortonslist@gmail.com 

The Impact of Success
There is no greater reward than coming together to make someone’s wish come true. Matt’s is to walk among the ruins of the most ancient civilizations known to man. Succeeding in this brave venture proves the Inner Circle of Morton’s List supporters is capable of manifesting anything. Building upon our many successful Morton’s List trips across the US and to Guatemala and The Bahamas, Quests to randomly chosen destinations represent a new frontier for Morton's List. When this daring wish succeeds, it opens the door for all to join future Morton's List events and destination Quests. 

Risks & Challenges
Every aspect of this expedition has been thoroughly researched and planned, with the guidance of experienced local tour operators. $9k will fund all crowdfunder rewards and 7 days of all-inclusive travel throughout Iraq. Matt’s touchdown in Baghdad is currently scheduled for Monday, March 8th, 2021 with flexibility to adjust to any international travel restrictions. If the Global Inner Circle cannot raise $9k, we will continue to make every effort to get Matt to Sumeria. We would then ask backers not to request refunds, and instead to forgo medallions, using their high production cost to instead cover trip expenses. If further project cost reduction is required, the book could be released solely as an eBook. Without the expense of these rewards, the total travel cost is about $5.5k. If we cannot raise even that amount, we will automatically refund all donations and move on to other projects.We acknowledge that safety is most people's primary concern, and that the US State Department advises the average US citizen against traveling to Iraq. Matt and those organizing this expedition are experienced and resourceful international travelers, ready to adapt to changing situations on the ground. Itineraries and travel plans remain flexible to account for the global pandemic, and shifting geopolitical realities. Of all the destinations that could have been randomly rolled, Sumeria was chosen by the Morton Boulder. It is now our challenge to make this unlikely destiny real. Give now at the highest level you can, as we grant A Trip to Someplace Fresh through the limitless Karma of the Inner Circle. 

2021 and You
Morton’s List opens the way for many experiences, and this Quest merges adventure, travel, life goals, and the ultimate mysteries of the Anunnaki. We kindly ask that you share this with anyone who might support such a worthwhile goal, and we thank you for any level of support.Karma Always,Morton’s List co-authorsA Trip to Someplace Fresh Contest OrganizersNinja Nate Andren - game designer, Stranger Tale: The Party Game of Amazing MemoriesR. Jesse Deneaux - game designer, Druglord: Lord of Drugs#mortonslist  #sumeriaquest

story:
IN UKRAINIAN, English version below:

“Кожна частинка у природі: листок, крапля, кристал, момент часу пов'язані з цілим та бере участь у досконалості цілого".

Ральф Уальдо Емерсон, американський письменник, лектор та поет.


Коли читачі стають співавторами

Привіт, дорогий друже!

Ми Олександр, Олександра, Олександра, та Лада, автори, перекладачі та редактори науково-фантастичної новели“Монстр: Лезо Темряви”. В той час, як Олександр родом з Молдови (хоч і має трохи української крові), всі інші народились в Україні.

З самого початку мрія про новелу “Монстр: Лезо Темряви” стала реальністю завдяки спільній підтримці багатьох неймовірних та добрих людей з різних країн.  Вперше вона була написана Олександром та випущена у серпні 2014 року в Молдові завдяки фінансовій підтримці читачів, через кампанію зі збору коштів в Інтернеті. Новела була перекладена англійською надзвичайним читачем зі Швеції, Erika Rydergard, а англійська версія опублікована Wolfgang Stricker з Австрії видавництвом “serendii”. Ілюстрації до книжки були створені художниками Kärt Viljalo з Естонії та Catherine Starostenko з України.

Долучившись до спільноти читачів та прихильників “Монстр: Лезо Темряви”, ми, Олександра, Олександра та Лада, вирішили перекласти та опублікувати милозвучною мовою нашої країни, українською. Отже, ми об’єднали зусилля з Олександром та почали готувати українську версію новели.

На сьогоднішній момент, ми закінчили переклад “Монстр: Лезо Темряви” та готуємо книжку до публікації та розповсюдження серед української аудиторії, серед тих, хто з нетерпінням чекає отримати та прочитати її! Ми просимо ТВОЄЇ підтримки, друже.

Якщо ТИ хотів би

+ Допомогти нашій справі та розповсюдити новелу українською мовою;

+ Надати можливість українським читачам зрозуміти та обдумати теперішні та майбутні відносини Людини та Природи рідною мовою;

+ Фігурувати у всіх українських публікаціях “Монстр: Лезо Темряви” як помічник у втіленні мрії;

+ Отримати ексклюзивне перше видання новели українською з персональним підписом від автора;

То ми запрошуємо тебе вибрати додаткові бонуси які хочеш отримати та допомогти “Монстр: Лезо Темряви” бути доступною для українців та, звісно, для тебе!

Новела Людьми для Людей

“Монстр: Лезо Темряви” спеціальна новела створена у форматі “читачами для чатачів”. Вона не має мети стати глобальним бестселлером, що визнана багатьма критиками; навпаки, новела має бути якомога ближчою до читача; і сам читач має життєвоважливий внесок в її успіх. Тому кожне видання цієї новели побудовано та опубліковано за допомогою краудсорсінгу та краудфандінгу, де люди бажають втілити у життя їх зусилля, або фінанси, або і те і інше.

Більш того, “Монстр: Лезо Темряви” це лише перша частина повної науково-фантастичної трилогії “Монстр”, що присвячена дослідженню, як людство взаємодіє з навколишнім середовищем у теперішньому часі і як ця взаємодія може розвиватись у майбутньому. Трилогія покриває аспекти захисту природи, консервації біорозмаїття, етичної людської поведінки, бізнес етики, впливу технологій на вчинки людей, і, звісно ж, романтичні відносини двох людей, що закохуються.

У першій частині трилогії “Монстр” ти познайомишся з головними дійовими особами, Джессі та Джеком, і разом з ними подорожуватимеш до віддаленого тропічного острову, щоб врятувати місцеве плем’я, дізнатися про містичного монстра, що блукає там, та дослідити весь острів. Разом з Джессі та Джеком ти зустрінеш плем’я жертв від природнього лиха, відслідкуєш відбитки містичної природи у глибині тропічних джунглів, полюватимеш разом з досвідченими снайперами та бойовими роботами, будеш досліджувати невідомі малюнки та символи у темряві печери та протягом всього цього насолодишся захопливою красою острівного природного середовища та дізнаєшся про функції його екосистеми. Щоб дізнатись більше про новелу відвідай www.themonster.info.

Науково-фантастичні пригоди у новелі “Монстр: Лезо Темряви” перекладені на мелодійну українську мову та чекають на ТЕБЕ!

Ми винагороджуємо твою підтримку

В обмін та твою цінну підтримку, ми будемо раді запросити тебе у нашу спільноту, а також запропонувати певні переваги, що включають:

+ Повідомлення-подяка з твоїм ім’ям на акаунтах “Монстр” у Фейсбуці, Твітері, Контакті;

+ Персональна подяка від нас;

+ “Монстр” листівка спеціального випуску, що ми надішлемо на твою поштову адресу;

+ Твоє імя серед листа подяки, що буде відображено у кожній друкованій версії;

+ Рання версія електронної книжки “Монстр: Лезо Темряви” українською на твоїй електронній пошті;

+ Паперова версія “Монстр: Лезо Темряви” українською з підписами усіх співавторів, надіслана на твою пошту;

+ Додаткові книжки “Монстр: Лезо Темряви”українською мовою для твоїх друзів та родичів з підписами усіх співавторів.

+ Екслюзивне запрошення на офіційний реліз “Монстр: Лезо Темряви” українською, де ти будеш представлений як головний помічник втілення мрії у реальність!

Будь ласка, обери переваги, які ти хочеш отримати та допоможи принести “Монстр: Лезо Темряви” українською мовою для українців і для тебе.

Заздалегідь дякуємо тобі!

Олександр,Олександра,Олександра таЛада



IN ENGLISH:

“Every particular in nature, a leaf, a drop, a crystal, a moment of time is related to the whole, and partakes of the perfection of the whole.”

Ralph Waldo Emerson, an American essayist, lecturer, and poet


When Readers Become Co-authors

Hello, dear Amazing Friend!

We are Alexander, Aleksandra, Alexandra, and Lada, the authors, translators, and editors of the science fiction novel “The Monster: Blade of Darkness”. While Alexander comes from the Republic of Moldova (although he has some Ukrainian blood), the rest of us were born in Ukraine.

From its very beginning the dream of the novel “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” was realized due to crowdsourced support from many wonderful and kind individuals in different countries. It was originally written by Alexander and released in August 2014 in Moldova on the basis of readers’ support gathered via crowdfunding campaign. The novel was then translated into English by an amazing reader from Sweden, Erika Rydergard, and its English version published by Wolfgang Stricker from Austria through his publishing house “serendii”. And the illustrations for the book were kindly provided by the artists Kärt Viljalo from Estonia and Catherine Starostenko from Ukraine.

After joining the community of readers and supporters of “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” we, Aleksandra, Alexandra, and Lada, decided that it would be great to have it also translated and published in the beautiful language of our home country, Ukrainian. And so we joined forces with Alexander and started preparing the Ukrainian edition of the novel.

Nowadays we have finalized the translation of “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” and are preparing the book for publishing and distribution to the readers in Ukraine, who are already eager to receive and read it. And for this we ask for YOUR support, dear Friend.

If YOU would like to

+ Support our cause and promote the writing of novels in the beautiful Ukrainian language;

+ Give the possibility of Ukrainian readers to learn and reflect on the present and future of Man & Nature relationships in their native language;

+ Be featured in all editions of “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” in Ukrainian as a supporter of such a dream coming true;

+ Receive the exclusive first edition of the novel in Ukrainian with the authors’ personal message for you in it;

Then we invite you to choose the perks you would like to receive and support the bringing of “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” in Ukrainian to Ukrainians and, of course, yourself!

The Novel for the People by the People

“The Monster: Blade of Darkness” is a special novel designed to be provided for the readers by the readers themselves. It is not meant to be a global bestseller acclaimed by numerous critics; instead the novel tries to be as close to the reader as possible; and the reader him-/herself has a vital contribution in its success. Therefore every edition of the novel is prepared and published through crowdsourcing and crowdfunding, where people willing to bring it to life contribute either with their efforts, or with their finances, or both.

Furthermore, “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” is just the first part of the entire Sci-Fi trilogy entitled “The Monster” and dedicated to exploring how mankind interacts with the natural environment in the present time and how this interaction may develop in the future. The trilogy thus touches such themes as protection of the natural environment, biodiversity conservation, ethical human behaviour, business ethics, influence of technology on people’s actions, and last but not least romantic relationships between two people falling in love.

In the first part of “The Monster” trilogy you will get to know the main protagonists, Jessie and Jack, and together with them travel to a remote tropical island in order to save the local tribe and investigate the mystery of the Monster wandering there, as well as of the whole island. Together with Jessie and Jack you will meet a tribe of natural disaster victims, track the footprints of a mysterious creature in the depth of tropical jungle, hunt together with experienced snipers and battle robots, explore the unknown drawings and symbols in the darkness of a cave and during all that enjoy the breathtaking beauty of the island’s natural environment and get to know how its ecosystem functions. For more information about the novel please see www.themonster.info.

The Sci-Fi adventures in the novel “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” translated to the melodious Ukrainian language await YOU!

We Reward Your Support

In exchange for your valuable support, we will be happy to invite you into our community, as well as offer you a number of benefits, including:

+ Gratitude message with you name shared on “The Monster” accounts in Facebook, Twitter, and VKontakte;

+ Personal gratitude note from us for you;

+ “The Monster” special edition postcard sent to your postal address;

+ Your name stated in the Gratitude list of supporters in every book;

+ Early release of the e-book version of “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” in Ukrainian sent to your e-mail address;

+ Paperback version of “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” in Ukrainian sent to your postal address with signatures of all co-authors;

+ Extra books “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” in Ukrainian for your friends and relatives with signatures of all co-authors;

+ Exclusive invitation to the official launch event of “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” in Ukrainian with your presentation as the main supporter of this dream coming true.

Please choose the benefits you would like to receive and contribute to bringing “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” in Ukrainian to Ukrainians and yourself!

We are grateful to you in advance!

Alexander, Aleksandra, Alexandra, and Lada

ENGLISH:
“Every particular in nature, a leaf, a drop, a
crystal, a moment of time is related to the whole, and partakes of the
perfection of the whole.”
Ralph Waldo Emerson, an American essayist, lecturer,
and poetWhen Readers Become Co-authors
Hello,
dear Amazing Friend!
We
are Alexander, Aleksandra, Alexandra, and Lada, the authors,
translators, and editors of the science fiction novel “The Monster: Blade of Darkness”. While
Alexander comes from the Republic of Moldova (although he has some Ukrainian
blood), the rest of us were born in Ukraine.From
its very beginning the dream of the novel “The
Monster: Blade of Darkness” was realized due to crowdsourced support from
many wonderful and kind individuals in different countries. It was originally
written by Alexander and released in August 2014 in Moldova on the basis of
readers’ support gathered via crowdfunding campaign. The novel was then translated
into English by an amazing reader from Sweden, Erika Rydergard, and its
English version published by Wolfgang
Stricker from Austria through his publishing house “serendii”. And the illustrations for
the book were kindly provided by the artists Kärt Viljalo from Estonia and Catherine Starostenko
from Ukraine.After
joining the community of readers and supporters of “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” we, Aleksandra,
Alexandra, and Lada, decided that it would be great to have it also translated
and published in the beautiful language of our home country, Ukrainian. And so
we joined forces with Alexander and started preparing the Ukrainian edition of
the novel.
Nowadays
we have finalized the translation of “The
Monster: Blade of Darkness” and are preparing the book for publishing and
distribution to the readers in Ukraine, who are already eager to receive and
read it. And for this we ask for YOUR support, dear Friend.
If
YOU would like to
+
Support our cause and promote the writing of novels in the beautiful Ukrainian
language;
+
Give the possibility of Ukrainian readers to learn and reflect on the present
and future of Man & Nature relationships in their native language;
+
Be featured in all editions of “The Monster:
Blade of Darkness” in Ukrainian as a supporter of such a dream coming true;
+
Receive the exclusive first edition of the novel in Ukrainian with the authors’
personal message for you in it;
Then
we invite you to choose the perks you would like to receive and support the
bringing of “The Monster: Blade of Darkness”
in Ukrainian to Ukrainians and, of course, yourself!
The Novel for the People by the People
“The Monster: Blade of Darkness” is a
special novel designed to be provided for the readers by the readers
themselves. It is not meant to be a global bestseller acclaimed by numerous
critics; instead the novel tries to be as close to the reader as possible; and
the reader him-/herself has a vital contribution in its success. Therefore
every edition of the novel is prepared and published through crowdsourcing and
crowdfunding, where people willing to bring it to life contribute either with
their efforts, or with their finances, or both.Furthermore,
“The Monster: Blade of Darkness” is just
the first part of the entire Sci-Fi trilogy entitled “The Monster” and dedicated to
exploring how mankind interacts with the natural environment in the present
time and how this interaction may develop in the future. The trilogy thus
touches such themes as protection of the natural environment, biodiversity
conservation, ethical human behaviour, business ethics, influence of technology
on people’s actions, and last but not least romantic relationships between two
people falling in love.
In
the first part of “The Monster”
trilogy you will get to know the main protagonists, Jessie and Jack, and
together with them travel to a remote tropical island in order to save the
local tribe and investigate the mystery of the Monster wandering there, as well
as of the whole island. Together with Jessie and Jack you will meet a tribe of
natural disaster victims, track the footprints of a mysterious creature in the
depth of tropical jungle, hunt together with experienced snipers and battle
robots, explore the unknown drawings and symbols in the darkness of a cave and
during all that enjoy the breathtaking beauty of the island’s natural
environment and get to know how its ecosystem functions. For more information
about the novel please see www.themonster.info.
The
Sci-Fi adventures in the novel “The Monster:
Blade of Darkness” translated to the melodious Ukrainian language await
YOU!
We Reward Your Support
In
exchange for your valuable support, we will be happy to invite you into our
community, as well as offer you a number of benefits, including:
+
Gratitude message with you name shared on “The Monster” accounts in Facebook, Twitter, and VKontakte;
+
Personal gratitude note from us for you;
+ “The Monster” special edition
postcard sent to your postal address;
+
Your name stated in the Gratitude list of supporters in every book;
+
Early release of the e-book version of “The
Monster: Blade of Darkness” in Ukrainian sent to your e-mail address;
+
Paperback version of “The Monster: Blade of
Darkness” in Ukrainian sent to your postal address with signatures of all
co-authors;
+
Extra books “The Monster: Blade of Darkness”
in Ukrainian for your friends and relatives with signatures of all co-authors;
+
Exclusive invitation to the official launch event of “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” in
Ukrainian with your presentation as the main supporter of this dream coming
true.

Please
choose the benefits you would like to receive and contribute to bringing “The Monster: Blade of Darkness” in
Ukrainian to Ukrainians and yourself!
We
are grateful to you in advance!
Alexander, Aleksandra, Alexandra, and Lada

story:
My name is PeterWilliams. Last year I retired from a medical practice of 28 years. 

My retirement has allowed me to pursue a project which has evolved over the past two years. 

My goal is to bring to life a sci-fi story based in present day - 20 years into the future. I have chosen the hero to be of Native American descent for reasons that will be evident in the story. 

I have incorporated many well-known aspects of fiction including battles between good and evil and the call to action of a reluctant hero. My story also includes a battle  with aliens and concludes with a clash with the creator of the universe. 

I believe that the variety of topics will bring subject matter to the surface of public consciousness and will spark discussion/debate, even controversy around these and other topics. 

By helping me reach my campaign goal you will make these ideas become a reality and take social awareness and responsibility around these topics to a new level .

 

My campaign goal is $75,000.

I have consulted with a team of writers with New York Times bestsellers on their resume to assist me.

They estimated the length of this book to be 50,000 - 60,000 words.

Reader's digest estimates the cost to write a book of this length is $36,000.

Publishing cost estimate is $3,500.

The remaining $35,500 is the estimate of promotion including advertising, primarily on social media. This number is an estimate.  It may be too high or too low. In either case, all of the money donated above the $39,500 amount for writing and publishing will go toward promotion. 

Perks include autographed numbered copies of the premier edition of the book and other collectible souvenirs  -  detailed in the perks section. 

I realize that even if my campaign goal is reached my book may not be a success.  Because of the ability to advertise/promote ideas/products to specific interest groups today, I feel that targeted promotion/advertising will maximize my potential for success. Besides specifically advertising on social media, I have started an outreach to tattoo shops and comic distributors as other avenues to promote this project. 

Participation in conventions like Comic Con will also provide valuable exposure/contacts. 

With the above strategies alone I believe I can reach > one million sci-fi fans.

ANY donation is appreciated. 

Even if you can't contribute money, you can help to promote this project by sharing it with friends. 

Indiegogo has many share tools!

story:
Before looking at the prayers of the Prophets and the Patriarchs, there are a few items that need to be brought out for clarity as to what may seem to be differences in the nature of the Old and New Testament prayers.

Many Christians tend to be anti-Old Testament. We Christians don’t live under that covenant, but it is the foundation, so we tend not to read it. It’s outdated. There are numerous parts that are troubling, and the New Testament is kinder. God in the New Testament is a loving God, whereas God in the Old Testament is an angry God.

Confusion over the nature of prayer in the Old Testament is confusion over the nature of God in the Old Testament. There are differences in how things are verbalized between the Old and New Testaments, but does that really show a difference in what things are said? There were people in the Old Testament who wanted their prayer just to be a physical blessing for themselves, but there were a host of people in the Old Testament who longed for the same thing Jesus wanted, well before He was born. 

Did people pray about different things in the Old Testament than in the New Testament? A general consensus would be yes, there is a difference. The difference between the Old and the New Testament, and therefore the prayers of Abraham, Moses, the Prophets…etc is not what is said, but that in the Old Testament the hope was future oriented. God’s kingdom had not come to earth. In the New Testament the timeline of hope changed.  It is still future oriented, in part, but the hope was realized in the empty grave Jesus left behind. In the Old Testament people asked God to smite their enemies. People were only worried about their own kingdoms. In the New Testament, Jesus taught his disciples to pray for their enemies and to pray for God’s kingdom to come to earth.

The Old Testament is violent. It just may be that the violence of the Old Testament has more to do with the violent nature of the writers than the nature of the God they worship.  Christians have committed atrocities in the name of Jesus.  Does that automatically mean Jesus is a violent, blood thirsty Lord?  Of course not.  A person cannot read the prophets without acknowledging that God is a God of love and forgiveness, a God who shows mercy when he doesn’t have to, a God concerned for the needs of the poor and oppressed. The Old Testament God is a God who rescues and protects and saves.

By ignoring differences in composition, we assume differences in message.  In the Gospels, Jesus tells people to love their neighbors. In the Torah, God tells His people not to covet their neighbor’s property. Jesus’ words come down to us through the composition of the gospel.  God’s words to Moses came down through law.  Therefore, Jesus sounds much less legalistic, but is the New Testament actually telling us anything new from the Old Testament? No. In Fact, what we think of as Jesus’ golden rule, “Love the Lord with all your heart, soul and strength and love your neighbor as yourself,” is, in fact, a step up of Deuteronomy and Leviticus. 

There are many issues with this attitude. Men have re-written the Bible over this.  The Old Testament is seldom read by today’s “New Testament” Christians. Their judgment is based on rumor, speculation and hearsay. 

So what does this all have to do with prayer? It means that the longings of the Old and New Testaments are not as different as we think.  Let’s take the time to look at the Prophets and the Patriarchs who wanted to see a day of righteousness and peace come to earth, as Jesus wanted when He said, “Thy Kingdom come, Thy will be done..”

story:
Hi I'm Caroline, author of the Semi-Precious series which I'm currently asking for help for.

I started writing back in 2012 when I sat down in my PJ's and wrote "My room is my safe haven," and since that day my life has changed dramatically so much on a personal level, and I wouldn't have it any other way.

At the start of Jan, I was struggling to juggle life, books and blogs and for some reason, quitting writing seemed like the easier option, because it was the hardest. I didn't do anything drastically though, and waited it out while I thought it through.

In the end, I realised that I couldn't give up my books, which is the catalyst for everything in my life at the moment. I would be losing a part of my identity if I gave up writing. So, I decided to think more in depth about what I was doing and what I had done and I came up to the conclusion I needed to shrink it and make it better - simple...

To shrink, I deactivated my Facebook accounts, twitter and website accounts because I had one for each pen name. Caroline Spencer(adult) C. Spencer-Upton (young adult) Once I'd done that, I created my new identity by combining them Caroline Spencer-Upton you can find book information on there too, but it is work in progress.

After that, I had two options:

1. From this point forward be serious about my work

2. Go backwards to go Forwards.

And I chose 2. What's the point in making all future books great when the first few can only be good? Start as you mean to go on and keep readers coming back. This has gone from a cute hobby, to being my everything and I want my books to stand along side other authors and be considered a great read.

So, Emeralds and Pearls is currently on the chopping board, being re-written, followed by Killer Rubies and then lastly, I will complete my current and final project in the series, Embracing Aqua.

All books are being funded in this campaign, and all three will be getting similar treatment, so let me tell you what I'm here for.

My Plan

Complete the (re)write of the books

After that I will be sending them to www.book-editing-services.com who have quoted me £1400 (after $ to £ conversion) for each book to be edited. They've already completed a sample which I will link here. They've also given me a timescale of 10-14 days.

Once the edits are back, I will book a promotional event through www.indiesage.com. The 1st two books (EaP & KR) will be getting a book blast on release day and they cost £60 (after $ to £ conversion) each. Embracing Aqua will get the deluxe promotion for £160 (after $ to £ conversion) which includes cover reveal, release blast and a 1 week book tour. On top of that I will be putting each book up for a www.netgallery.com review period to obtain more exposure which is again organised by Indie Sage. They cost £45 (after $ to £ conversion) each.

Unlike the 1st time around, I want to own the ISBN's of the paperback books which I will sell through the website store and to obtain ISBN's I need £295 for 10 codes and then I can produce the paperback copies. All three will have 40 printed each at the cost of £204 per title.

+5% fees

Release Plan

I'm hoping that I can have Emeralds and Pearls re-released by May 2016

Followed by Killer Rubies by the end of June 2016

And then Embracing Aqua by the end of July 2016

The Perks

£1: A dedicated page to say thank you to all the amazing people who helped by donating as little as £1

£10: I'm going to throw in each book in eBook format before it is re-released along with your name being printed inside it.

£20: Your name inside each book, an eBook before re-release and I'll also send you a handmade keyring for each book.

£50: Nothing beats a good old book, and I will send you all three before they're re-released. This may not be in 1 swoop, but you'll get them as they arrive to me AND a handmade keyring and bookmark for each book.


Future Plans

Books are my everything. After I have completed the Semi-Precious series, I'll be moving on to my adult series, Only Time Will Tell. Then, I will continue to write various plots that I have up my sleeve. As a self publisher, I class myself as a small business. That business to me is Buck Publishing, my own little venture where I hope to help other new/self published authors if my plans work out. Offering them the same editing a promotion options to boost their books.

Following that, i would love to start a book promo site, where I can get bloggers and such like to promote authors and their work. This will run alongside Buck Publishing and between both I hope to help as many people as possible.

The whole reason I want to sell my books, is to make money - obviously, but it's so I can put that money back in to my venture. It's not about rolling around in it in a mansion. It's about giving back and moving up in the world.

story:
How we got here ?

Hello everybody !

We are two friends with a great passion for the history of the art : Olivia (a professor of geomorphology at the university) and Rosetta (a landscape painter and photographer).

...and here is our incredible story ....

For 500 years, the landscape of the most famous art work in the world, the Mona Lisa by Leonardo da Vinci, has been considered a mystery. 

But one day, in the valleys around Urbino, in the region of central Italy where the Renaissance was born, we realized to be literally walking inside that painting. At a first glance, we almost couldn’t believe our eyes, but in the following years it all revealed to be incredibly true !



With this book our main purpose is to make the reader live our same experience of this sensational discovery. It was a great emotion, you can be sure of that !

The book discloses, by means of scientific methodologies, even the tiniest details of the territory that the Maestro Leonardo da Vinci painted behind the Mona Lisa, be means of a complex geometrical code that has now been decrypted. 


2006. When it all began : our first work on the mysterious landscapes of the Renaissance's paintings

  

All began in 2006 with a similar work, when we noticed some resemblances between the hills near the country-house of Rosetta and the  landscape represented in some Renaissance art work. Following that intuition, we began our hard work and in 2008 we published the book “The invisible landscape” which disclosed the details of the landscape behind the subjects painted by Piero della Francesca in his masterpieces. 

That book was a great success and helped us start a longer and deeper research work about the landscapes of this territory,  the birthplace of the Renaissance.
In that year we established the cultural association "Montefeltro Vedute Rinascimentali" ("Montefeltro's Renaissance Views") whose main purpose is to promote this territory as the birthplace of many Renaissance paintings.


2014. Today's project :  the book “The secret landscape of Mona Lisa : the Dukedom of Urbino.”

The Mona Lisa is the most visited painting in the world. Every year 9 million people see it in the Louvre Museum, in Paris. A lot of eyes are put on it, but there's very little knowledge about its content, nowadays.

Indeed, for 500 years, the landscape behind the Mona Lisa has been considered a mystery. Art historians have struggled and failed to understand their real location and most of them have concluded that they were imaginary. Until Rosetta Borchia e Olivia Nesci precisely and scientifically identified them in a wide territory across the Italian regions of Marche, Tuscany, Emilia-Romagna and Umbria, that is most of the ancient Dukedom of Urbino. 


The book describes and provides evidence of this revolutionary discovery, by means of images and drawings which compare the details of the painting and the photographs of the existing landscape, decrypting the geometrical code that Leonardo used to compress the territory of the whole Dukedom of Urbino in that tiny painting : the aerial view and the bifocal perspective.

The work lasted five years, during which Rosetta and Olivia searched every little corner of that territory.

Thanks to modern technologies such as the aerial view, drone fly and satellite images analysis, this method represents an innovation for all researchers in the history of art. 

Many codes by Leonardo, such as the Arundel Code (Royal Library of London), were studied by Rosetta and Olivia who identified among them six sketches for the preparation of the Mona Lisa. These drafts hadn't been recognized before. All these drawings by Leonardo confirmed what Rosetta and Olivia had intuited at the beginning of the project about the identification of the secret landscape. 




Our previous book on the same subject.  

In 2012 we published the book “Code P : Illustrated Atlas of the real landscape of the Mona Lisa”, edited by Mondadori Electa. It was available only in Italian.

The book was quickly sold out and the few people who could buy those limited copies appreciated the work, but unfortunately it hasn't been printed anymore, since an agreement between the authors and the editor hasn’t been found. 

The results of that work were presented in 2013 in Paris, at the International Conference of Geomorphology, and the scientific committee approved them.

Citations in Wikipedia of this work already exist.



We strongly believe that we can't stop now and that this sensational discovery must be brought to everyone. We must find the funds to publish again the book, this time in English and without a limited number of copies. People from all the world have to right to know the truth about the Mona Lisa, an art work which represents the mankind.

Here comes the idea of this brand new and much more international project. 

The work will consist of a complete review and updating of the previous book, “Code P”. The format of an Illustrated Atlas will be used again but it will be provided with many new contents : archive documents relevant to the landscape and to the frequentation of Urbino by Leonardo da Vinci ; new lanscapes found on the Arundel Code; the friendship between Leonardo da Vinci and Raffaello when they lived in Rome and in Urbino; also,  a new and even more precise image analysis will be done.

Furthermore,in the same period of our long work, it happened that an Italian professor of history, Roberto Zapperi, published a revolutionary essay  about the real identity of the painted dame, proving that she actually was Pacifica Brandani from Urbino and not the believed Lisa from Firenze. That book tells the fascinating love story between Pacifica  and Giuliano De Medici. This discovery confirms once more our research.

The book will be printed with an excellent quality of graphics on a high quality paper, thus allowing the reader to easily feel himself “walking inside” this monumental and complex painting, as the authors has done during their path toward the discovery of the landscape.


Our history

Rosetta Borchia holds a degree from the Academy of Fine Arts of Urbino and is a painter and a photographer of landscapes. She is also a keen naturalist and a hunter of ancient roses and rare wildflowers, as well as a garden designer. In 2006, after taking some pictures of the Metauro Valley, she discovered that she had captured the same hill that Piero della Francesca had painted right below Federico da Montefeltro’s chin in the Diptych of the Dukes of Urbino.

Olivia Nesci is Associate Professor of Physical Geography at the University of Urbino. Her scientific activity has been conducted in the field of geomorphology. Her best-known works concern the genesis and evolution of the physical landscape of Central-Northern Italy and cultural geomorphology.



The scientific community

Publications and congresses

BORCHIA R. & NESCI O. (2008). "Il paesaggio invisibile. La scoperta dei veri paesaggi di Piero della Francesca" .2008. pp. 140, ANCONA:Il Lavoro Editoriale, ISBN: 978-88-7663-436-9.

NESCI O., BORCHIA R. (2009) - "Il contributo della geomorfologia alla ricostruzione di alcuni paesaggi in opere pittoriche. Un esempio dai quadri di Piero della Francesca”. Atti Convegno Internazionale: I Paesaggi del vino. Cartografia e paesaggi, Boll. Soc. It. Cartografia, 136-137, 203-210

BORCHIA R. & O. NESCI (2012). Codice P. Atlante illustrato del reale paesaggio della Gioconda". pp. 144, Milano:Mondadori Electa, ISBN: 9788837094225

BORCHIA R. & NESCI O. (2012). "The Invisible Landscape. A fascinating hunt for the real landscapes of Piero della Francesca among Montefeltro hills.2012. pp. 86, ANCONA:Il Lavoro Editoriale, ISBN: 9788876636646

NESCI O. & BORCHIA R. (2013) - "The Da Vinci Landscape Code; Exploring the Panorama behind La Gioconda" (oral presentation). IAG Paris 2013, August 27 to 31, Paris.

At the moment, the only perk of the book in the Italian language is the "Edizione Digitale (Italiano)", while all other Perks are relevant to the English version of the book, included the 39$ "Print edition".



We are mentioned in Wikipedia

"A recent research by a geomorphology professor at Urbino University and an artist-photographer revealed astonishing likenesses of the Mona Lisa's landscapes to some views in the Montefeltro region in the Italian provinces of Pesaro, Urbino and Rimini."

Ces derniers suggèrent une correspondance entre les paysages de la Joconde et des vues dans le territoire de Montefeltro, territoire situé dans les provinces Italiennes de Pesaro Urbino et Rimini."

story:
Writers' Group:

I'm Brad Combs, the founder of the Writers' Group on Facebook, one of the largest and fastest growing groups for writers on social media. I've always had a passion for fiction since childhood. But my true love for what writing could do started in elementary school when I discovered the early interactive fiction/text adventure game ZORK on a computer at the local community college. That transformed my life and gave my education the purpose that it needed to to see me through.
Today, I'm well into my career as an artist, writer and teacher. My journeys have taken me far beyond the small farm towns of Illinois all the way to "Bright Light City," Las Vegas, NV. As a creative resources engineer, technician and consultant in Las Vegas I've seen all the highs. But, I've also seen the lows. Like many when they come to Las Vegas with only the clothes on their backs and a dream, I spent nearly a month without a place to call home, sleeping in the cab of my late father's pickup truck. Since those days I've always had a great appreciation for the person living on the streets with even less to protect them from cold of winter and heat of summer. It doesn't take much, a stolen purse, a lot ID, just a series of bad breaks for temporary homelessness to become more of a permanent condition.

In ancient times the notion of a home was slightly different. A person could travel from place to place trading stories and news in exchange for room and board without earning a label "homeless." In fact, this became a career for many. They were called bards and were loved by many cultures. Today, we get our stories and news instantly from technology and the oral tradition is nothing like what it was. Travel writers who are constantly on the go, away from the place they consider their permanent residences, are the types of people who come close to the lifestyle of old. Some, have given up the idea of a sedentary life and are on the road permanently. Although most homeless didn't make the same choice, it's only a matter of changing mindset and intent and they can feel as though they're not homeless but travel writers using the streets to get to where they're going, even if it's only for a short while.

Street Pens is an attempt to reintroduce the opportunity of being a storyteller to those who wander from place to place.

Regardless of why people lose their homes it's almost never their chosen outcome for their current housing status. Few desire to be homeless. So, when it happens it's often an emotional blow that leads to depression and despair. Most in this situation feel hopeless and see no way back into a life where they live in a structure suitable for housing people with respectable living conditions including utilities, heat, and clean running water.

On top of the stigma that comes with being homeless, the logistical quagmire of lifting oneself out of it is a "catch 22." It's difficult to find employment if a person doesn't have an address to put on an job application. Nor do most in this situation have functional means of mobile communication. They can't afford a phone. But without a job, how does one pay rent or a mortgage? It's easy just to give up all hope of ever returning to it.
Sometimes, even people with jobs are without homes for one reason or another.

Volume 1 of Street Pens will focus on the homeless of Las Vegas. People come to the city in search of the big jackpot. While some change their lives with a massive win, most just don't hit that big. Often, in the relentless pursuit of striking it rich, they neglect to care for other areas of their life. Sometimes, if things line up in just the wrong way, it can lead to disaster and the unforeseen result of being without a home, if not worse.

With the help of local communities and individuals like you, we hope that writing can create a path to the better lives that the people of Las Vegas came to the city in search of in the first place. Funds will go to not only writing equipment but also to arrange to have their writing transcribed onto digital media, rewards for participants whose work is selected for the Street Pens publication, to develop the web site and more. To do all this we need to arrange gathering times for our writers and their volunteers who wish to help. We'll arrange to have them schedule a future meeting time and day for subsequent visits.

If you haven't had a chance to discover the work being done for the homeless by the CARE Complex in Downtown Las Vegas, you really should familiarize yourself with the great people, our partners, because they're doing things differently. Here's their web site:  www.carecomplex.org.

Other partners include

Writer's Digest

Risks and challenges

Literacy: Are homeless people literate? Yes they are. However, as part of the strategy of this project we'll partner with various organizations and/or authors to provide used books to homeless shelters in an effort to encourage and increase literacy.

Safety: Going from one encampment of the homeless to the next brings with it its own set of challenges, not least of which is safety. While the impression is that homeless people will resort to nefarious means to get what they need to survive, that's true for just about any of the rest of society. It's not so much the homeless themselves who are the danger. It's the areas they manage to get away with living in. In upper class neighborhoods homeless are usually seen as a nuisance to be dealt with and removed. And they are dealt with. For the same reason, upper class neighborhoods are not neighborhoods where drug dealers and gangs are common. The homeless and the underbelly of society typically coexist in the same areas of town. Visiting the homeless brings one into territory controlled by elements that can at time be unpredictable. This is why we're localizing the first volume of Street Pens to Las Vegas, but immediately using what we learn to nationalize, possibly even globalize, its reach.

Supplies: This is the easy part. A significant part of the purpose of this campaign is to purchase writing pens and paper.

Digital transfer: at subsequent follow up meetings with our volunteers we'll educate participants on how to utilize public access to technology to be able to transcribe their work into digital manuscripts.

Production: the collected works will be judged and compiled and produced into an anthology that will be made available for purchase via Amazon and other online book retailers. The proceeds of net sales of which will go to further the mission of this project into other geographic regions and urban areas.

Documentation of the process: if a budget permits, equipment and manpower will be needed to film and document the process of this project.

Corporate Sponsorship: there are a variety of ways corporations can get involved in this effort. For example, a restaurant chain may want to cater monthly "cook outs" that we'll host in order to bring our writers back in begin collating their work.

story:
It's The Sausage not the Sizzle!

Background - By David Sime

Yes the title is correct, because this book is about Corporate Russia!

I guess my life has been quite Interesting particularly my time In Russia. Russia is a fascinating Country often maligned unnecessarily and then perhaps not. I really would like to share my corporate experiences in Russia along with other contributors in an informative and humorous way. It will be a very enjoyable and informative read advising on how to get the best out of a Russian Company, things that can go wrong and right with some great examples of honey and dirty money traps. Generally great tips on how to get on and over the profit line in corporate Russia.

But I need your help to get it out there.

This book will be a great read for  those  thinking of starting a venture in Russia or just those who are fascinated by the different culture that Russia is........extracts

"We had Invested $155,000 USD, had a 6 man telephone sales team 2 PA's and 4 sales people in the field. Things were looking good. 2 months later I looked at our new business board that resembled a desert and the number of team appointments booked for the week were less in number than fingers on my hand. The office clock hit 6 pm and the office emptied in 3 minutes.. ......WTF!. 

..."I wasn't sure about the situation and the age gap was quite big.For sure I was punching above my weight but maybe she liked the whole sugar daddy thing. Coming in to work on that Wednesday was like any other except the company account was clean out! I had been mugged off. The whole deception was straight out of a honey trap spy novel except it was about me......

This a  book from the front end of modern corporate life in The Russia. In other words tales and tips straight out of the locker room.

Help me produce a book that will reach out to both the international English speaking community as well as those in Russia , Asia and beyond.Sharing the calamities and conundrums experienced by myself and my fellow ex pats.Great anecdotes by me and my colleagues for the reader to enjoy along with  equally compelling ones from my native Russian Co authors Yulia Smirnova and Nadezhda Ageeva, both of whom worked for International firms based in Russia whom came full of confidence and sizzle  that went so very wrong. This is not a book churned out by a law or accountancy firm advising on legal structures and taxation.This is as we say in the Uk  very much front of house.

The Impact

Books assist people in so many different ways. In basic learning, how to do things and understanding of different ways of life and differing cultures. This book offers all these things in an informative way that will help the reader understand more about Russia and its own way of thinking and doing. Understanding brings people closer together. Contributors to the book will help to get a project going that attempts to do this.

What We Need & What You Get 

Costs Breakdown

The funding target covers the entire costs of publication including editorial assistance/revision , proof reading, cover design ,Interior layout design, audio recording, paperback and hard back printing, e book and kindle cost extras, translations, promotional and digital marketing and shipping for this first volume. 

All Contributors will get a copy of the book in their chosen format with additional perks available for higher contributions.

Risk

If we do not raise the entire £12,500 we will use what we do raise and find other funds to complete the project. We are committed to having the book published and will use your generous contributions - whatever amount you give.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.

Please also share my book with as many personal friends as you feel able as well as family members, co-workers and anyone whom you might think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or direct message on social media.

I thank you so much of all of your support!

Generally great tips on how to get on and over the profit line in corporate Russia.But I need your help to get it out there.This book will be a great read for  those  thinking of starting a venture in Russia or just those who are fascinated by the different culture that Russia is........extracts"We had Invested $155,000 USD, had a 6 man telephone sales team 2 PA's and 4 sales people in the field. Things were looking good. 2 months later I looked at our new business board that resembled a desert and the number of team appointments booked for the week were less in number than fingers on my hand. The office clock hit 6 pm and the office emptied in 3 minutes.. ......WTF!. ..."I wasn't sure about the situation and the age gap was quite big.For sure I was punching above my weight but maybe she liked the whole sugar daddy thing. Coming in to work on that Wednesday was like any other except the company account was clean out! I had been mugged off. The whole deception was straight out of a honey trap spy novel except it was about me......This a  book from the front end of modern corporate life in The Russia. In other words tales and tips straight out of the locker room.Help me produce a book that will reach out to both the international English speaking community as well as those in Russia , Asia and beyond.Sharing the calamities and conundrums experienced by myself and my fellow ex pats.Great anecdotes by me and my colleagues for the reader to enjoy along with  equally compelling ones from my native Russian Co authors Yulia Smirnova and Nadezhda Ageeva, both of whom worked for International firms based in Russia whom came full of confidence and sizzle  that went so very wrong. This is not a book churned out by a law or accountancy firm advising on legal structures and taxation.This is as we say in the Uk  very much front of house.The ImpactBooks assist people in so many different ways. In basic learning, how to do things and understanding of different ways of life and differing cultures. This book offers all these things in an informative way that will help the reader understand more about Russia and its own way of thinking and doing. Understanding brings people closer together. Contributors to the book will help to get a project going that attempts to do this.What We Need & What You Get Costs BreakdownThe funding target covers the entire costs of publication including editorial assistance/revision , proof reading, cover design ,Interior layout design, audio recording, paperback and hard back printing, e book and kindle cost extras, translations, promotional and digital marketing and shipping for this first volume. All Contributors will get a copy of the book in their chosen format with additional perks available for higher contributions.RiskIf we do not raise the entire £12,500 we will use what we do raise and find other funds to complete the project. We are committed to having the book published and will use your generous contributions - whatever amount you give.Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:Please share my Pre-sale Campaign on Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn with your friends, family and network. You can easily share my Pre-Sale Campaign Page via Indiegogo at the top of the page.Please also share my book with as many personal friends as you feel able as well as family members, co-workers and anyone whom you might think would enjoy it. Please do this as a text message or direct message on social media.I thank you so much of all of your support!

story:
Hi, my names Davina I am 31 years old and I am from England. I am an Intuitive Balinese massage therapist IICT accredited and 200-hour Vinyasa yoga teacher with yoga alliance .

I am self-development obsessed and I finally have found my purpose which is to serve and help you. Whatever you are going through there is a light at the end of the tunnel I know you probably feel like this suffering, self-hate, anxiety or addiction will never end or thinking how would you know?

Well...

After years of depression, self-doubt, an abusive background, twelve years of Bulimia and playing the role of the victim I couldn't cope anymore. I felt so lost and rejected, lack of love and purpose. I was hungry and I wanted more. I wasn't sure what it was but I knew it was out there. Through my journey and experiences on the road which has been a long one and many different travels and experiences across Spain, Caribbean, Asia, and Australia I have learnt so many things about myself and had so many realizations and continue to do so.

I came back to my true self through the process of learning Self-awareness, Forgiveness, Self-love and Purpose through ashrams, Volunteering, Living in spiritual communities, Vipassana, Life coaching, Traveling, Meditation, Massage and Yoga.

My idols and inspirations Jay Shetty, Tony Robbins, Don Miguel Ruiz, Niel Walsh and  Henricke and Michael from the Krishna village and many more.

It has been a long journey and I am grateful for all the lessons, people and experience that has been a part of my life as without it I wouldn't be who I am today.

Now I am not saying I am perfect or that I know everything as the more I learn the more I know, I know nothing. At times I feel I have got my shit together and I can conquer the world and sooner or later it can crumble and the universe brings me a new realization as a gift and a lesson to learn.

But this is all a part of life and a gift to learn to enjoy and celebrate every moment whatever the situation.

Through the experiences and lessons of my life, I have now written a book with all the tools that I have learnt from the best teachers and my idols that have been a part of my journey and helped me come back to the self.

I believe you have the power to be anything you want. You can create anything you have the power, the choice of the decision to be your true authentic self without attaching to the story or the drama.

For the last year also I have been volunteering in communities  So not working or getting paid but I love what I do and my dream is alive . My belief is that deep down we are all children that are desperate to be loved and want to play. We are all apart of a community and tribe and we can express this through our own authentic way. 

Through self-development and working on ourselves we can come back home to the self and I want to share this book and program with you.

I would love if you can help and make a donation to help and support others with this book and every little helps . 

I would love to get this out there and help as many people as I can and also share what has helped me on my journey. 

For this project, I would like to use the money for ...

Edit and enhance current book: £100

Proofread book: £150

Book cover design and typesetting: £300

Amazon Publication: £150

ISBN number: £89

Rest of money to pay for extra fees and book copies.

For more info and to get an idea of who I am and what I am about you can follow my FB Page

https://www.facebook.com/totheself/ 

instagram - to_the_self

Thanks again for everyone who has made this possible for me to write I feel so blessed and grateful and to all of you who donate and will make this book alive.

story:
My name is Forrest E. Pettengill III and I am a bisexual 44 years old grand uncle to over a dozen grand nieces and nephews, and I want to be a greater example, an advocate for them to look up to:

As I sit here thinking to myself, I'm a fool boy, why don't I express myself in a manner that I meant to speak but would rather reach you through writing.  That is, I will be an advocate for those who cannot speak for themselves.  This is very true regarding my dear friend and past boyfriend, none other, than David St. Amand.  David and I had a decent relationship with it's ups and downs, we had Christmas together, with present we found.  A stereo set for me, wrapped up in a bow, but alas what did I give him, I don't know.  

We once lived together on South Central Street and then we moved out and this tickled our feet.  I bought a large house, 3 stories of hell.  A lot of renovation for a weakling I call me, but David made it special and help one, two, three.  There was a lot of chatter, that we used to do, because of the munchies from marijuana stew.  He also liked his tobacco, who could really care, I used to smoke too until I stopped clear.  The trip to Mexico with our friends, was really a blast, the turtles we rescued all covered with grass.  We released them, they're free to roam the ocean tides, and sorry about the breakup before we left town, you didn't need to come, we said, because you loved me still bound.  But you still reserved your ticket and everything was fine, except for a few days of arguing and digs over dancing with a guy who attracted my legs.  But now that you're gone, I miss you a plenty, I hope that your fine and that you'll forgive me so gently.

My goal with this campaign is to bring awareness to the epidemic of drug overdoses that have sweeped across New England where 'Mr. Dave' lived.  I don't know the details and only can guess that heroin caught him and made him now rest.  I'm looking for 33 individuals who have a story to tell, this story of drug use, a story from hell.  If you got off drugs or tempted still now, I hope that $15 will strengthen us PAL.  I want to be pen-pals so that we may fight this overuse of drugs that we do each night.  I have overcome most of my demons in time, but now I feel tempted to leave my sobriety behind.

Donate one or two dollars to this campaign out of trust that I will make sure that everyone will remember Mr. Dave and not just his lust for everything changes when one disappears, a beer or two here and a beer or two there.  Let's get to the point that everything is messed up, the worst two poisons on the market are legal, cigarettes and alcohol, but this is not all, because everyone gets the others at nightfall.  So whatever happened to Dave, let's not let it happen to you.  Let's donate to a good cause and bring good luck for all year through.  

I hope that we can make it, with me changing tactics, I want to be selfless and caring and all, I want to make sure that you never call and tell me that a friend has passed, a friend that we knew, we knew who did glass.  And if this gets you all teary eyes too, I hope that you listening and not to Mr. Magoo.  This is for David's memorial, a fund that we can start, let's think with our heads and lead with our hearts.  I want to do greater things with my talents here if I can.  Just help me out as gently and kindly for a good man, for David is now cleaning heaven's floors and he needs our help to open God's doors.  So, lift our spirits higher and not binge on narcotic fire but listen to that churches choir and don't make me a liar cuz I know we can do this, a few shares, a few likes....and maybe one person will stay sober this year, to help and join me and together we'll see that only in company of those real friends matters, to me and my drug friends, let's get loose and start chatters.  A bunch of you know, you know who you are, if you've abstained or withstood the tests of time, whether or not you ever get out of line, but tell us your story so I can publish a book for us all to read in good time.  

I expect that we may reach 5 recovering addicts but if you all contact the ones that matter, the ones that you know who will treasure this planned ladder.  I want to reach up to Dave and ask for his help, infuse these guys with your kind face or your whipping lash, well that wasn't nice, cuz you never whipped me, but gets these people on here and make them believe that we can do righteous acts of kindness to better ourselves even if it means that we have to dip into our wells.

This would mean so much for me for anyone of my friends that I considered my drug friends to really show that you care, to show that you cared about David and me, I'm just trying to memorialize Mr. Dave so that I can turn a new leaf and stay away from all the bad things that surround me, oh good grief.  

There are thank yous to receive, pen pals who believe, a book to receive even create a memorializeeee.  All this for one David, all this for Him too, because don't be like me, sitting at home in a zoo, where no one can see me, where I stay locked inside at night - such a troubling site.  I want to change something, something has to change now, it is the time to evolve, but evolve with me how?  

By the good graces of God you are still alive.  I want you to think about one thing I know.  Do you want to be remembered to be remembered as a giver or a receiver?  Because this campaign is about both.  You give and you will receive, so come on folks, just empty your wallet for one time not three.  Not even for forrest, will this turn my head, if we don't reach our goal, I will probably be dead.  Not dead for real but dead for not doing what I had hoped would be a simple task going forward in time.  

One last thing....remember this before you go, do it for Dave, for David will show you 'The Way' up into heaven.   My friend will be waiting for us to arrive, so Rest in Peace Forr Ever Mr. David St. Amand (don't you cry).

story:
What the Heck is a Penclash?

Penclash is a community-oriented website for creating, hosting, and running writing contests.

 

 

 

 

...So What Does That Mean?

That means that Penclash is the place to put your writing skills to the test, while also improving as a author. Invariably, the three most important tasks for any developing writer are writing more, reading more, and getting feedback on what they've written. Penclash gives you the opportunity to do all three through the medium of friendly competition, and gives you the chance to meet and engage with other authors.

 

What Kind of Contests?

That's partly up to you!

Monthly Penclash: A monthly site-wide contest.
The site's main 'official' contest, Monthly Penclash runs, as one would expect, once each month. The nature of the contest will vary, with different prompts, story lengths, and criteria each month. Placement in these competitions will be tracked on a site-wide leaderboard. These competitions will be anonymously judged by their participants, which means you'll be getting feedback—and encouragement—from each other.

User-Created Contests: Fun with friends.
Users can also create their own contests using Penclash. With a wide variety of options to choose from, you'll be able to create just about any kind of writing contest you can think of—and then let Penclash manage submissions for you.

It's not just for individuals, either—if you're a publication looking for material, a publisher looking for talent, or a business looking for promotion, this is the place to do it.

Workshops: Organized competition.
Workshops are user-created, self-contained groups with their own forums and leaderboards. Workshops can be organized around any given topic, and can run their own local contests—members-only.

Penclash also offers the Library, where you can search and read through an organized list of every contest entry on the site. Looking for a quick read? We've got you covered.

Other planned features include:

  • Dark mode
  • Integrations with popular fiction hosting sites, including cross-login
  • A powerful and exhaustive BBCode-based formatting system, with WYSIWYG editing support
  • Highly personalized reading and writing environments—control font, text size, foreground/background colour, layout style, fullscreen, and more
  • Anonymous entry
  • Two-factor authentication
  • And more!

Who Are You, Exactly?

I'm an aspiring author and professional web developer.  I've been writing fiction since 2012, working on a novel since 2015, and making websites for over half a decade.

What do You Need All This Money For?

Good question! Penclash is currently about 30% complete, and while I'd like to keep working on it for free, I don't have the funds to work on it full-time anymore. That's where your contributions come in!

Besides paying my rent, your money will also go towards covering initial server and development costs, legal fees, and a small portion will be set aside for marketing. Any funds we receive over our goal will be put towards improving Penclash going forwards—and a few special surprises for its users.

When Will it be Done?

I expect to have Penclash finished and ready for use by late 2019/early 2020. Once it's ready, we'll enter a closed beta stage for our backers, which should last only a few months as we iron out any issues. After that, it'll be unleashed onto the world at large, likely around early-to-mid-2020.

What Happens if You Don't Reach Your Goal?

If there is sufficient interest, Penclash still gets made—it'll just take longer. If there isn't, then all pledges will be immediately refunded, and it's back to the drawing board.

But I'm just a Starving Author. How Can I Help?

Spread the word! Share this page with your friends, your social media subscribers, and anywhere else you can. In this early stage, exposure is just as important as funding.

story:
Who am I?

I'm Steve Coates, a screenwriter and novelist based in Melbourne, Australia. One of my screenplays was recently made into the internationally released film 'John Doe: Vigilante' starring Jamie Bamber (Battlestar Galactica, Law & Order: UK). If you haven't seen it yet, you should check it out. See the trailer here.

I love telling stories, and I have a new one I'd like to share with the world.

Amazing Grace. 

A kick ass female warrior, trained in rural Japan by the last true Ninja, she is as deadly as she is beautiful.

Who is Grace Takana?



If Grace isn't melting your heart she's smashing you in the face with a vicious roundhouse kick. Orphaned at age six when she survived a brutal attack on her family, she was taken in by the last remaining true Ninja and taught everything she needed to know in order to exact revenge on the organisation that killed her parents.

The story I'm telling in 'Amazing Grace' takes place 27 years later when Grace's daughter, Amy (or claim the perk and name Amy yourself!) is taken and held to ransom. In a strange twist the kidnappers don't want money, to get Amy back Grace must follow their trail of bizarre clues. Each clue takes Grace into life threatening situations where she must kill in order to rescue innocent people. But saving people comes at a cost, so does killing bad guys, and it isn't long before there's a price on her head and every killer in town is hot on her trail.

Can Grace survive long enough to save her daughter?

I believe the time is past due to bring Grace into the world. If you feel so inclined please check out the first two chapters of 'Amazing Grace'  here and if you like what you read and want to find out how the story ends then you can pre-order your full copy of the ebook for $3 (a 50% saving,  RRP will be $5.99 upon release) by selecting the pre-order perk below. Or even better avail yourself of one of the added perks and become a character in the book, or even in the entire series!

'Amazing Grace' is the first in a planned series of books, imagine claiming the naming perk for one of the ongoing characters, then think about the book series becoming a television series or a feature film franchise, your name up in lights, forever!



Risks & Challenges

I'm Steve Coates, a screenwriter and novelist based in Melbourne, Australia. If you haven't seen it yet, you should check it out. See the trailer here.
I love telling stories, and I have a new one I'd like to share with the world.
Amazing Grace. 
A kick ass female warrior, trained in rural Japan by the last true Ninja, she is as deadly as she is beautiful.   Who is Grace Takana?

 
If Grace isn't melting your heart she's smashing you in the face with a vicious roundhouse kick. Orphaned at age six when she survived a brutal attack on her family, she was taken in by the last remaining true Ninja and taught everything she needed to know in order to exact revenge on the organisation that killed her parents.The story I'm telling in 'Amazing Grace' takes place 27 years later when Grace's daughter, Amy (or claim the perk and name Amy yourself!) is taken and held to ransom. In a strange twist the kidnappers don't want money, to get Amy back Grace must follow their trail of bizarre clues. Each clue takes Grace into life threatening situations where she must kill in order to rescue innocent people. But saving people comes at a cost, so does killing bad guys, and it isn't long before there's a price on her head and every killer in town is hot on her trail.Can Grace survive long enough to save her daughter?

story:
Short Summary

My name's Constanza Mayer and I'm the author of "The Battle of the Erathiel: Across the Enchanted Sea". I've been writing for as long as I can remember and as an Indie author I am looking for some support (of any kind, really) to get book 2 out there. Let me tell you a bit about my Epic Fantasy series and plans for this crazy, long story.

As I mentioned before, this series narrates the story of a group of elves, the Erathiel, and their few human and dwarven allies who abandon their home and cross the Enchanted Sea in search of a new home. They miraculously reach a harbor with nothing in sight, except for a desert, and begin their journey to find a more hospitable location. However, they run into a violent group of lizardfolk who attack them and soon let them know that there is one, a great wizard, who does not welcome them to "his" land: Delufer.

Later in their journey, when they make friends with the peaceful Orach who live in harmony up in the mountains, they discover how cruel Delufer can be and what his plan is for the free people of Dôr Annon. The Erathiel decide to take a stand, join forces with the Orach and teach them the ways of war so that evil does not destroy this land, too. Outnumbered, the Orach suggest they travel south to speak with the Beither, fellow allies, and warriors, to join them in their stand against Delufer. This is where book 2 begins (which is already written, I just need to get it edited and checked).

I created a world that is inspired by South America. For example, when they arrive at a desert, I thought of the Atacama Desert to inspire me; when they meet the Orach in the mountains, I thought of the Incas and the beautiful Macchu Picchu; and as they travel south I've thought of the lovely Chilean landscape and it's magnificent Cordillera de Los Andes to guide the company. Furthermore, the mysterious Amazons and the people who live inside will be something you will see in book 2, and especially in book 3.

I'm passionate about the idea of a fantasy series that's inspired by diversity, by Latin American culture, and also by many others (as you will discover in book 3). A big melting pot in a Fantasy context is what I hope to create, along with topics which I find are important and crucial to our time, such as racism, discrimination, immigration, war, taking care of our environment, animal cruelty, LGBTQ+ community, and how our society does not need to destroy others to thrive.

"The Battle of the Erathiel" is a story of adventure, friendship, tolerance, and peace. It touches classical themes like good versus evil, the importance of working together, and the idea that good triumphs over evil (although it is not the case 100% of the time, sadly). 

I hope that you can help me on this mission to get this book out there, in its best version possible, and to send a message of hope, a story much like our own but in a fantasy world.

​

What We Need & What You Get

Let's get down to the nitty-gritty (as Nacho Libre would say): where will your money go? Well, it'll go straight into my bank account BUT after that, I will use it to pay for all the copywriting and editing that my book needs before I publish it and make it available for your all :D

Believe it or not, editorial services are very expensive and when you're an Indie author, you don't have many options. I am currently editing it myself, but it even after I finish editing all of it, it could not compare to the work that a professional editor and copywriter can achieve. Also, I would like to set up a professional author page and choose a compelling cover for my book.

I truly believe my readers, well, all readers, deserve the best we can offer them, so that is what I'm aiming for. 

What will you get out of helping me? Well, a free copy of the first book, perhaps a free copy of the first and the second, a signed copy, added to the people I acknowledge and thank in my book. Also, we can Skype, talk about fantasy or anything related to my book :D and if you're very lucky, you can purchase the option to be an "extra" in my book (however, I cannot guarantee your character will live xD) and get a mention in my book.

Other Ways You Can Help

You don't NEED to donate to help :D (although of course, it helps xD) but you can always help by sharing this campaign, telling your friends about it, purchasing a copy of my first book (printed or ebook), by leaving words of encouragement, or even offering editorial services if you happen to know about all that :D 

So, feel free to share through social media, word of mouth, follow me on Instagram if you wish (@constanza.mayer) or even on Facebook on my author page. Thanks so much for your time and I appreciate your help.

If you want to know more about the Erathiel and their story, ask away. It's very long.
