story:
Short Summary:

Epochs of Eternity, Book One: The Secret Journey is an epic adventure set in an age thousands of years after the cataclysmic fall of our civilization.

It is an illustrated novel, the first book in the Epochs of Eternity series, which unites science fiction with high fantasy, gritty realism with ancient legends, history with mythology, science with magic.

In this exotic new world of gods, kings, monsters, and men, the destinies of five unique individuals become intertwined in a secret journey of discovery, peril, love, and war.

The fate of all rests in the actions of a scarred princess, a veteran archaeologist, an enslaved concubine, the hero of an empire, and a bastard prince.

Welcome to Epochs of Eternity.

 

Free 8-Chapter Preview of "Epochs of Eternity, Book One: The Secret Journey" (.pdf):

http://www.thanzek.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/...

 

What We Need & What You Get:

As you can see, this 500+ page adult fantasy novel will have many illustrations (one per chapter). My goal is to finish the writing and complete the illustrations, then publish, print and ship and book to each person who supports this campaign.

Writing and drawing is the easy part (it just requires time on my part,) but the printing and shipping is why I need your support to help fund this campaign. That's why I'm asking for $20,000 and your patience to complete an incredible story which combines elements from modern classics like The Lord of the Rings and Game of Thrones with ancient epics such as Gilgamesh and Genesis.

 

The Perks:

There are 4 perks for this campaign:

1. $10 for the digital e-book in .pdf form (with NO chapter illustrations for novel purists)

2. $15 for the digital e-book in .pdf form (with full-colored chapter illustrations for art fans)

3. $25 for a physical 9x6 paperback copy of the novel (with NO chapter illustrations, and the .pdf from Perk #1)

4. $30 for a physical 9x6 paperback copy of the novel (with full-colored chapter illustrations, and the .pdf from Perk #2)

 

The Impact:

This is my first novel, part 1 of 2, which I'm writing and illustrating for the sheer love of storytelling and art. I would do it for free, to be honest, but the reality of publishing, printing, and shipping necessitated the creation of this campaign.

 

Risks & Challenges:

The goal of $20,000 is to cover the production of (hopefully) 1000 perfect-bound softcovers. However, if the full goal is not reached, each perk has been calculated to ensure that the backer who chose said perk will be able to fund the production of their copy, provided the minimum threshold is reached for printing.

The risks themselves are minimal, since most of the novel has been written already. Essentially, the "E-book (no illustrations)" perk is all but ready, whereas the rest require more time to complete (the chapter illustrations, printing, etc.) I would prefer to have all the perks ready to go before sending out the no-art version of the .pdf to backers of the "E-book (no illustrations)" perk, but that may change as explained below.

Completion of the illustrations (which I am doing 100% of the layout, art, and colors) will take at least several months with my current schedule, so I ask for your patience and understanding. If a minimum amount of funding is not reached, however, it will not be feasible for me to complete the chapter illustrations and all backers of the "E-book (with illustrations)" perk and the "Book (with illustrations)" perk will receive the "no illustrations" version of their chosen perk, which can then be delivered months earlier than expected.

 

Other Ways You Can Help:

This campaign will be running for a few months, so if you are not able to support it at this time through monetary means, please help spread the word about how awesome Epochs of Eternity could be with enough support!

Thank you all so much for the opportunity to share my dream project with the world.

story:
What is Inknexus?

At its core Inknexus is a story board where someone begins a tale, and then after posting other members can carry on from where the last left off.
A completed story features six members each writing a piece roughly 400-600 words long to create a unique story that can be read in the space of a lunch break or on the train to work.

Each story has its own comments section, can be rated and uses our Color Band System to inform readers of a stories content before it’s even opened.

Inknexus is divided in to 7 category based story boards, along with an open board where members are not restricted and can post any length or feature as many or few writers as they like from poetry to full novels. There is also a discussion board where members can ask questions, get to know the community and collaborate on a specific project.

What else does it do?

Inknexus has a powerful framework with an easy to navigate directory of all our members. Once singed up every member has a profile listing all their stories, the ability to add friends and send private messages, follow their favorite members and subscribe to a story to easily keep track of a piece still being developed. The platform will be community driven and take much of its future direction from the user.

The platform features a blog centered on the relationship between readers and authors, along with useful information and guest posts.

Indie Focused

While Inknexus is open to everyone it was specifically created with the Indie Author in mind, giving them a platform to showcase a taste of their work and reach new readers and old fans in a unique way without the reader having to lay down a cent.

Authors have extended profiles and can sign up and post stories that other members can work with them on, essentially sharing the page with their favorites or giving a voice to new up and coming talent.

The platform features a section for all registered author’s new releases, including full descriptions, useful information, teasers and unique interviews you won’t find anywhere else.

Our promise

To keep it free for all Inknexus will feature non-intrusive advertising and in addition we promise to pledge 25% of our revenue back in to the community.

Inknexus will feature regular competitions for both readers and posted stories, focusing on helping those just starting out to get their work published and in to the hands of the public.

What We Need & What You Get

Unlike many projects here, as of right now Inknexus is fully functional and will be launched on the 31st July 2017, but to really get it to where we want it to be it needs some extra love. So we’re raising funds to:

  • Optimize the site for mobile devices
  • Add additional security features
  • Include user experience improvements like additional story formatting, extra member profile features and improved functionality and layout
  • Acquire quality recording equipment and software to turn the platform's blog in to a vlog that will also be posted on youtube

If we manage to go beyond our funding goal of $2000 we will use any extra funds to get additional content, continue to add new features and implement many ideas still in the works.

Every cent of the funding we do not spend will be used in our first competitions.

Your contributions will go a long way to making the platform a pleasant and engaging experience for all!

Rewards

$5 Contributor

You will receive the title of Honorary Member on Inknexus, given in recognition of your contribution to the birth of Inknexus.

$10 Contributor

You will receive the Honorary Member title on Inkneus, as well as an E-copy of Autumn's Eyes by J. L. Sutton.

$20 Contributor

You will receive the Honorary Member title on Inkneus, as well as a personalized special edition E-copy of Autumn's Eyes by J. L. Sutton featuring extra content and concept artwork. This copy will never be reproduced outside of this crowdfunding project.

Want to help?

We appreciate every contribution, and even if you don't contribute you can still help Inknexus:

  • Get the word out there!
  • If you like our platform you can check out the splash page at www.inknexus.com for more information and if you qualify for early access.

Thank you for your time.

story:
Hi, my name is John Brisson, and I am a modern investigative journalist on the case of The Finders operation. I am currently writing a book, The Finders Operation, that will hopefully be out by the beginning of 2021. 

 

What is The Finders Operation?

 

The Finders is a United States Central Intelligence Agency run operation. Some would also say it is a cult that operated from the 1960s to today. The man in charge of The Finders was Marion D. Pettie. Marion D. Pettie was an intelligence asset for the CIA. Marion D. Pettie was former military and had numerous relationships with interesting people, including Charles Marsh, Joseph Chang, Barbara Marx Hubbard, Henry "Hap" Arnold, George S. Patton, J. Edgar Hoover, Harry S. Truman, Dwight D. Eisenhower, and Lyndon B. Johnson! The Finders Operation with direction from the CIA was involved with directly influencing and controlling the American counterculture revolution, intelligence gathering, trafficking, and more! 

The Finders Operation became national news because of the arrest of two men, Douglas Edward Ammerman and James Michael Holwell, in Tallahassee, Florida, on February 4, 1987. The gentlemen were members of The Finders. The police were contacted by concerned citizen Cindy Peterson who called the police because the gentlemen were seen with six children in Myers Park who were “poorly dressed, bruised, dirty and behaving like wild animals." The six children were taken into custody by the Tallahassee police department. That one phone call from a concerned citizen set off years of reporting, allegations, investigations by multiple agencies, and court battles.  

Allegations of international human trafficking, molestation, direct connections to intelligence agencies, brownstone operations, mind control, Satanic rituals, and more developed from the Tallahassee arrests. Multiple investigations occurred in Washington D.C., Virginia, and Florida by various local, state, and United States governmental agencies. The investigations were eventually shut down by the highest levels of our United States government. The story mostly disappeared from all forms of media as well after the case was told to stop being investigated. Is there any truth to the conspiracy of The Finders Operation? 

 

What Will The Finders Operation Book Cover?

 

The Finders Operation will cover the entire history of the operation since the birth of Marion Pettie until today.   

Who was Marion Pettie?   

Who were the members of The Finders Operation?   

Was Marion Pettie really a significant influence on the counterculture?   

Was Ramon J. Martinez a hero?  

Is there any truth to the numerous accusations made about The Finders?  

Were The Finders involved with the CIA?  

Is The Finders Operation still operational today? 

The Finders Operation will feature information that has never been publicly seen. I interviewed numerous people who interacted with the operation, were in the operation, or investigated the operation. The completed book should be around 300-400 pages, fully sourced with footnotes and an appendix. 

 

Who am I?

 

My Name is John Brisson. I operate the We've Read the Documents YouTube channel. I am an investigative journalist who has done numerous shows detailing my work and knowledge of The Finders Operation. For example, I have interviewed on the record one of the investigators of The Finders Operation, Henry Clements, on my channel. 

I have also been on the following channels/shows/websites discussing my work on The Finders:

William Ramsey Investigates 

The Conscious Resistance – Shout out to Derrick Broze, another esteemed modern Finders investigator. 

The Unknown Observer - Shout out to Kevin, another esteemed modern Finders investigator. 

Mr. Metokur 

Skeptiko 

Grimerica 

Emily Moyer 

This Strange Life 

All Out War 

Cavdef.org 

And More!

story:
Short Summary

Hi, I’m Kristina Savova, a forensic psychologist and the author of the ten books of the series "I'm Not a Book". When my son had difficulties learning and speaking because of hyperactivity and attention deficit, I struggled to find all sorts of fun and creative ways of communicating, playing, learning and teaching, while trying to explain and resolve the inner struggles and poor sociability he experienced every day. It's not easy or happy for a five-year-old boy, to acknowledge that none of the children from his class will run to him in the morning, shouting his name just to let him know they are excited to see him and that they want to play. Obviously, that broke my heart, but I realized that the children or the parents have enough knowledge to deal with situations like this. And this is how this project came around. I wanted to do something special, not just for my child but for all the children that experience difficulties, to help them cope with those in a world that can embrace us and love us the same way, no matter how different we are.  

The words in these books are real, playful, and mysterious. They intend to embrace autism, anxiety, parent separation, death, and any persistent difficulty a child experiences. Each book will have one difficulty. Behind these words, I hid coping mechanisms to be found in every clue. These words are for every parent talking to their kids. They’re for every kid that hasn't got a friend. These books are for teachers, parents, and kids to learn about love, kindness, and how they’re connected to the world around them. These books are for anyone who holds someone near and dear to their heart. 

What We Need & What You Get

In order for these ten books to launch, I need your help! You can pre-order the book and earn other incredible, exclusive perks by contributing to the campaign. I am printing an 8.25x8.25, high-quality hardcover book to ensure the best product for you. These funds will go towards:

- the printing and shipment of the first run of books

- illustrator expenses 

- shipping and packaging of all rewards

-e-book conversion & design

The Impact

I believe we can make a difference by just smiling at a person who walks past us, in a coffee shop, at the grocery store, or even on a subway. But when we think of children, the future of our world, and generations, we think of love. We think of ways to make them grow mostly by being children and by feeling happy. This way no matter how many obstacles they may find on their paths, they will always be able to achieve their goals with less pain, loneliness, or struggle. And never give up.

I would like through the books to sensibilize and recall, every mother or father, grandmother or grandfather, sister or brother, neighbors, teachers, or the entire community, the importance of embracing these kids, showing them love, understanding, and help them through with a simple smile. 

Risks & Challenges

As I introduced myself earlier, I'm a psychologist and a writer with wide arms and enthusiasm, but a book or books can be a challenge regarding the entire process of writing a book until it is available on the shelves or in the hands of our readers. From experience, many things can go wrong, but I realize that if you choose a reliable illustrator, editor, and a secure printing and transportation company, the risk reduces drastically. The challenge is that every single intervenient has a budget that is not affordable to anyone that has the knowledge to share and a desire to give love and smiles.  

Other Ways You Can Help 

If you're not looking to contribute right now, I could still use the support! Please consider sharing this campaign on your social media or letting friends and family know about it so they can soon add this heartwarming book to their collection.  

If you have a media contact, please send them my way; or if you simply have words of encouragement, drop me a line: author@kristinasavova.com

story:
Overview

Science has revealed to us epic cataclysms, thunderous dinosaurs, colossal extinctions, evolutionary arms races, dauntless explorations, breathtaking glimpses of the Universe, and tools to envision the future. You may already know about evolution, exponential growth, and the impacts climate change will have on future generations. There are countless who do not.

Let's excite people about science by displaying our discoveries on coffee tables in a beautiful, engaging way.

What People are Saying

Researchers, scientists, and teachers from around the world who have reviewed the early draft and illustrations have written:

“This is an exceptionally cool book, and one that I would most certainly want on my table at home. You have done a great deal of scholarly research to get the dates right, and it was fun looking things over.” — Tom Franke, Ph.D., Science Teacher, Hopkins High School

“I think your book project is really worthwhile and the artwork is stunning. I frequently teach biology classes for non-science majors who have no concept of the vast timescales of the evolution of the galaxy and of the earth and its lifeforms. If one can truly appreciate the timescale of these events (which is not easy) it puts the current pace of anthropogenic mass extinctions and climate change in dramatic perspective.” — Bruce Rannala, Ph.D., College of Biological Sciences, University of California, Davis

“Excellent illustrations and text both. I think you nailed the scope well for intelligent non-specialists and undergrads. Well done.” — James Albert, Ph.D., Department of Biology, University of Louisiana at Lafayett

“What a great idea for a book. The illustrations are great and the content is concise and well communicated.” — Ben Pearce, Ph.D. Candidate, Department of Physics and Astronomy, McMaster University

“Firstly great work so far, its a big undertaking and you are doing a magnificent job.” — Grant Cox, Ph.D., School of Physical Sciences, University of Adelaide

Other scientists have written:

  • “I had a quick glance and your book looks beautiful. The artwork and layout are gorgeous.” — Steve Brusatte, Ph.D., School of GeoSciences, University of Edinburgh
  • “What a cool project! Loved it. I can’t wait to see the final version!” — Tanai Londono, Ph.D., Faculty of Natural Sciences, Imperial College London
  • “Firstly, this looks really nice. I love the illustrations.” — David Naafs, Ph.D., University of Bristol
  • “The text is very nice and the overall volume also.” — Pavel Kroupa, Ph.D., Stellar Populations and Dynamics Research Group, University of Bonn
  • “The whole project looks beautiful!” — Rich Pancost, Ph.D., Professor of Biogeochemistry, University of Bristol
  • “I think it’s terrific! Really nicely done.” — Simon Darroch, Ph.D., Department of Earth and Environmental Sciences, Vanderbilt University
  • “I looked at the draft and it really does look nice.” — Jayant Murthy, Ph.D., Indian Institute of Astrophysics
  • “In general it reads very well.” — Vardan Adibekyan, Ph.D., Institute of Astrophysics and Space Sciences
  • “Looks like a cool project!” — Joost Frieling, Ph.D., Marine Palynology and Paleoceanography, Utrecht University

What We Need

The following picture provides an overview of how the funds will be used:

Contributing

A contribution of over $2 is the simplest way to help; use the BACK IT button to donate.

Perks

Perks are ways to contribute to the project and get something in return: from a beautiful and basic layflat coffee table photobook to a hand-crafted version on reclaimed pine paper, or even a digital version.

Funds

At the very least, the goal is to reimburse illustrators for their efforts; if we don't reach the target amount, any funds up to $11,500 will go directly to the artists.

Where We're At

The first draft of the prose has been sent to and reviewed by scientists who have studied the depicted events. Several scientific illustrations are complete, with many more due by the end of May. Two illustrations are unassigned. Remaining tasks to get the project out the door:

  • Incorporate pending illustrations upon completion
  • Revise first draft with feedback from scientists
  • Determine the target audience and price point for the book
  • Hire a professional editor to proofread the reviewed draft
  • Create web site and host for the finished digital version
  • Produce a layflat coffee table book per publisher to check quality

Finished Illustrations

Illustrators who have finished their contributions include:

  • Roen Kelly - Inflation Theory
  • Leigh Nelson - First Galaxies
  • Shawna Snyder - Zero Age Main Sequence
  • Joanne Neubauer - Prolonged Bombardment
  • Carl Conway - Microbial Mats
  • Sarah Gluschitz - Complex Cells
  • Yun-Kae Kiang - Multicellular Life
  • Scott Rawlins - Sponges
  • Karin Spijker - Vertebrates
  • Bernadette Rawyler - Primates
  • Jamie Gustafson - Ancestral Apes

Pending Illustrations

Illustrators who have pending contributions include:

  • Leslie White - First Stars
  • Erik Crins - Thin Galactic Disc
  • Anna Ferguson - Earth Accretion
  • Ianina Altshuler - Great Oxygenation Event
  • Chase Septer - Great Ordovician Biodiversification Event
  • Mark Mandica - Tetrapods
  • Juliana Spahr - Amniotes
  • Ikumi Kayama - Dinosaurs
  • Jan Campbell - Mammals
  • Reid Psaltis - K—Pg Extinction
  • Rosemary Chalmers - Anthropocene Extinction

Making a Difference

Knowledge is the most powerful tool we have to make a difference to the world. We need more people to understand the implications of their choices. Science should be fun, easily understood, and captivatingly beautiful. Teachers need up-to-date lesson materials.

My hope is that sharing this knowledge will influence people's behavior in proactive, Earth-friendly ways.

Risks and Challenges

The biggest risk is not knowing the initial target market for the book. By earmarking funds for market research we'll be able to find and contact people in the target market.

Every few weeks I'll check in with illustrators about their progress. If no progress has been made, or the illustrator becomes unresponsive, a new illustrator will be assigned.

Unassigned Illustrations

We need illustrators for the following illustrations:

  • First Planets

Ways to Help

If you don't have any money to contribute, ask your friends to share the campaign. Twitter, Facebook, email, smoke signals, you get it. We also need:

  • Copy editors
  • Public education contacts
  • Your thoughts, comments, and ideas!

story:
About Penpee.com

Penpee.com is an online platform to read short stories, write and get paid for short stories.

 

Join 5,200+ Growing members

 

The concept of penpee is for short stories you can start and finish at leisure anywhere-On coffee breaks, during toilet breaks, waiting on a meeting, during short and long travel, in bed waiting to sleep off e.t.c.

It is a simple and straight forward model that gives rewards to writers every time someone new read qualifying pages of their story. This reward is known as credits, converted to cash and can be withdrawn to PayPal and Bank accounts in supporting countries.

Just like Airbnb empowers anyone with a roof to host guests in their home and earn from it, Penpee.com provides a reliable, simple, and unique option for writers by empowering professionals, aspiring authors, helpless amateurs and just about anyone else to showcase their creativity through short stories, build a fan base to share their work and make money for each qualifying pages of their story that is read.

 

 

Membership

We have Free and Premium memberships:

FREE: Membership is FREE. Can write a maximum of 3000 words spanning a maximum of 5 pages and a maximum of 600 words per page. You will earn 45% lifetime revenue on every credit spent reading your stories. You will not appear on the leaderboard contest. Reader’s token required to post a story.


PREMIUM: Membership cost £14.99 every 6 months. Premium writers can post unlimited short stories. Maximum of 12000 words, spanning a maximum of 20 pages with a maximum of 600 words per page. You will earn 70% lifetime revenue on every credits spent reading your stories.

 

The Perks

We would like for as many people as possible to participate in this campaign, so we are turning perks of this crowdfunding into membership on penpee.com but with a more interesting twist.

 

Pledge £500.

Support this campaign for £500 and we will give one year of Premium membership with 50 free credits each for up to 200 members of your organisation, school, institution or business. Our standard annual membership is £24.99 each. That is a great deal.

 

Pledge £300.

Support this campaign for £150 and we will give one year of Premium membership with 50 free credits each for up to 100 members of your organisation, school, institution or business. Our standard annual membership is £24.99 each. That is a great deal.

 

Pledge £150.

Support this campaign for £150 and we will give one year of Premium membership with 50 free credits each for up to 50 members of your organisation, school, institution or business. Our standard annual membership is £24.99 each. That is a great deal.

 

Pledge £60.

Support this campaign for £60 and we will give one year of Premium membership with 100 free credits each for up to 4 nominated members of your family.

 

Pledge £20.

Support this campaign with £20 and we will give you a Premium membership of our site for up to 2 years for free. (Worth £49.98) plus 100 free reading credits.

 

Pledge £10.

Support this campaign with £10 and we will give you a Premium membership of our site for up to 1 year for free. (Worth £24.99) plus 50 free reading credits.

 

Pledge £5.

Support this campaign with £4 and we will give you a Premium membership of our site for up to 6 months for free, plus 50 free reading credits. Standard Premium membership on our site is £14.99

 

Pledge £3.

Support this campaign with £3 and we will give you a premium membership of our site for up to 3 months for free. No free reading credits included. Standard Premium membership on our site is £14.99

 

If we surpass our crowdfunding goal, additional proceeds will be used to further development and assigned to our marketing budget.

Feel free to ask questions and also checkout our website - penpee.com for more answers.

story:
Short Summary

I thought I was a believer for 20+ years but I had a lot of secret struggles I dealt with that made me feel like God was angry with me. This was how I grew up, fearful of my Father. Then I met Jesus. I set out in 2018 to write an impactful devotional with the Finished Work of the Cross in mind, and I achieved that goal when I published "The Song of You" on Amazon in July of 2018. I immediately had a desire to write another one geared towards middle to high school. I decided to wait a while, but I feel now is the time to start work on it.  

What We Need & What You Get

I discovered the last time how expensive it was to get a book published the right way. Between editing costs, cover design, layout, eBook formatting, and marketing the cost was much higher than I was prepared for. So out of the goal set:

  • $1000 is set aside for editing
  • $500 for layout and eBook formatting
  • $500 for copies to distribute as rewards for this campaign
  • $500 for preliminary marketing

If the goal is not fully met the money will still help with all of the above as I will still be releasing the book. 

The Impact

I believe that our youth is attacked by so many things meant to strip them of their true identity, and I believe that this book will help to change their minds about who they are in Christ. 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge for me if to write a devotional concise and relevant enough for today's youth and you in the future. With this in mind I will surround myself with parents, teachers, youth leaders and people generally in the know to ensure that this devotional has the most impact as it can have. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have the money to participate in this fundraising campaign, that's okay. Ways you can help that will mean a lot! 

  • Share this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, or wherever else you may socially interact with people. 
  • You can buy a T-Shirt from my ministry store. http://www.teespring.com/stores/thewarriorscry
  • Buy my first book. bit.ly/thesongofyou
  • Pray for the project.

story:
May  7 , 2019

 

 

The Holy Science of Lord Shiva is a comprehensive journey and thus an exploration of inner awareness through the symbolism explained from ancient allegory into the modern world of science, plasma physics and other such disciplines both old and new. Taking into account syncretism , astrotheology, numerology , music pedagogy, Which are part of the disciplines of the ancient techniques of the trivium and quadrivium as interpretive tools. Though some of the later methodology came through Indo-European standards of the modern world as a rediscovery of the ancient methodology of allegory. 


The Holy Science of Lord Shiva that has been authored and studied over the course of a 17 year period . We all are enlightened in some way or other ,It is our birth right .Through studying and practical application of ancient techniques of the inner journey. The consummate writing and expression that have guided humanity since before modern memory is a treasure not to be wasted through addiction of primary material sense engagement in material philosophy. Many of my colleagues in Various learning institutions, Academics, Sanyasi and Buddhist Monks of higher learning Globally from multiple countries, that are students of self willed evolution through cognitive meditation studies, have urged me to bring my practices and insight to print and recommended that I send this manuscript to publication . They know the level of my aptitude in various subjects and disciplines . They are conﬁdent that I can put the viewpoint sacred Vedanta Trivium , Quadrivium , Puranic literature and Tantra which consists of Mantra , Yantra and Mandala into a modern western interpretation. Understood by the lay person and appreciated by the highly educated of all nationalities and faiths.


In The Holy Science of Lord Shiva, it is argued that Lord Ved Vyasa , the propounder of the Vedas , The Maha Puranas , The Minor Puranas, The Mahabharata and the Srimad Devi Bhagavatam, used an ancient system of Allegory that was named after the fact by Italian philosopher Marcus Campanella, who discovered the system by looking into ancient literature .The Literary allegory used in ancient culture is an exacting science of complete expression that within one verse expresses grammar, rhetoric and logic ,number ,number as space (geometry ) Number as Harmonic / Music and cosmology which in the ancient literature of not just the ancient literature of India , but seems to be a global phenomena .


These allegories are meant to preserve the sacred knowledge of an enlightened society through the coming millenniums. This age was foretold to only bring an age of ignorance that would be based in materialistic philosophy. The preservation of these documents only becomes valuable when we start to as a society become enlightened enough to understand the writings of our fore fathers in a serious manner and put them into practice. Humanity has the chance to start a new renaissance of self love through self willed electromagnetic evolution. In short technology by these standards does not make a civilization civilized. Rather when a human being is evolved through self will they become the ultimate technology.

story:
Long story short

The Syphoner Saga is an addictive ongoing paranormal+horror+romance mashup series about the young, self-deprecating, but lovable Divina LeBeau as she stumbles through one dark cloud after another on her way to adulthood. On the eve of her 18th birthday, a literal pandora's box of secrets is unleashed, bringing about horrors Divina and her "cursed" family have only ever dreamed of. It's the end of the world as she knows it, but it could quite possibly be the end of her life as well.   

Book 1 is completed. Book 2 is in revision. Book 3 is in drafting. The next step is getting this series officially launched, published, printed and into the hands of readers. That's where you come in!

Who am I?

I'm a 30-year-old novelist, writer and poet with the pen name Munzie LeStrange. I've been writing for over half my life and my style resembles if Anne Rice and Jeff Lindsay had a lovechild who happens to be both a hopeless romantic and a critical cynic. 

I write mashup fiction - specifically horror+ [i.e. horror + paranormal romance or horror + sci-fi, etc]. I've focused my writing career on serial novels in the last five years and I have a backlog of four other series' that I plan to complete once The Syphoner Saga is out of production. 

Why Indiegogo?

After taking the leap into indie publishing, I'd crossed my i's and dotted my t's. I did my marketing research, signed up for every "10-steps to your first 10,000 readers" webinars that hit my inbox, and went work building my reader network. I'd developed a pretty good-sized readership excitedly awaiting my upcoming book launch and the interviews and library tour that were to follow. 

After the pandemic halted life as we know it, all the hard work I poured into making my book a success was suddenly irrelevant. Book launch? Cancelled. Interviews? Cancelled. Signing tour? Cancelled. I had nothing to show for my hard work except the book itself. From my beta team, my ARC readers and the few sales I've made so far, the book is exceptional, you can read some reviews here and here. I get emails every week from the few readers who've picked up the book asking when they can expect the rest of the series to be released (tentatively, Book 2: 12/2021, Book 3: 12/2022). 

According to the formula, catchy cover + pristine book + good marketing = successful book.

Catchy cover? Check. Pristine book (edited and proofread)? Check. Marketing strategy? Check. 

Success? Hardly. A great book can only matter if it's being read. Readers can only read books they know about. Despite everything I'm doing, I still can't reach readers. So, I'm trying something different. Crowdfunding.  

First, I tried Kickstarter, and my first-ever campaign (for $2500) was a success - much to my shock and awe. I found out that there were people out in the world, states and countries away that wanted to read what I love to write. I learned a lot through that experience, and I was ecstatic about the success! But, a few days after my Kickstarter campaign ended - much to my dismay - the majority of my backers were dropped! And along with them, more than 70% of my funding. I actually had to come out of pocket to fulfill the benefits I promised my backers.

Rather than wallow - because, let's be honest, who isn't having a difficult time right now? - I did more research about Kickstarter. I compared it with it's main competitor, Indiegogo.

Indiegogo seemed a little more involved with all the helpful articles and access to experts on the platform. I'm still not expecting much traction, because I'm supposed to already have 30% of my goal funded by people who know me before I can expect any kind of success. 

Here's the deal: There are a total of six family members who actually support my writing career: my mother, my grandmother, three cousins and an uncle. Since my move to a much more rural area in January, my attempts at reader outreach are extremely limited. Not only do I have nowhere to go and network, I can't even venture out into the town to find out where my potential readers hang out. Everything is closed - and for good reason, of course - but that still leaves me at a disadvantage no matter what avenue I try.  

At most, I'd like to gain readers even if this campaign falls short of my goal. But, if by some miracle it does reach the goal, my whole series will be published, marketed and distributed, converted into audiobooks and promoted through very reader outlet I can get my hands on. I'll also livestream a virtual launch and signing where readers and supporters can watch their books be autographed in real time just before they're shipped out. 

So,  what is the goal and how does it all break down?

What I Need

To successfully self-publish, market and distribute a book, a minimum of about $6,000 is required. For a trilogy, it's about 3x that amount. On the surface, this might seem inflated, so here's the official breakdown. 

For 1 book
Editing = $1500 ($30/1,000 words [at the cheaper end of the spectrum for this service])
Proofreading = $1000 ($20/1,000 words)
ISBNs = $125 for 1, $295 for 10 

 - note: each format for each book requires it's own ISBN, ex.: 1 ISBN for an ebook, a different ISBN for paperback and another for hardback of the same book. A trilogy would require a minimum of 9 ISBNs.

Email Marketing = $720

[Mailchimp is $20/month
Prolific (an email builder source) is $20/month
Bookfunnel (another email builder source) is $20/month]

Social Marketing = $2400

[$50/month for Amazon
$50/month for Instagram
$50/month for Facebook
$50/month for Twitter]

Influencer Reviews (not required, but highly impactful)

Readers Favorite: $59 (cheapest option
Kirkus: $425 (cheapest option)

Total: a minimum of $5915 [or $6399 including reviews)

Also, keep in mind the following:

  • I'm a digital content creator, so I make my own book covers. 
  • I do all my own formatting
  • I do all my own publicity and marketing (book launches, appearances, event scheduling)
  • If I added the costs of the last 3 bullet points, it could add as much as $5000 to the total

No book is truly professional published (self-published or otherwise) without a marketing investment. No one can read a book if they don't know about it, and the marketing industry is 100% pay to play. It's critical for any author who dreams of making a career as an author.

The total for 3 books breaks down like this:

Editing = $4500 ($30/1,000 words for 3 books, 50k words each)
Proofreading = $3000 ($20/1,000 words for 3 books, 50k words each)
ISBNs = $295 for 10 (3 ISBNs per book, 1 for paperback, 1 for hardback, 1 for ebook)

Email Marketing = $720 (I can market the trilogy the same way I market a single book)

Social Marketing = $2400 (I can market the trilogy the same way I market a single book)

Influencer Reviews = $3063 (for the full trilogy: $891 - OnlineBookClub, $1575 - Kirkus, $597 - ReadersFavorite)

Total for the full trilogy = $13,978

So, it's $14,000 for the series - but since Book 1 is already completed, and I already have the ISBNs needed for the other two books, it would actually be closer to $12,000.

So, why is my goal for this campaign is $18,000? Three things: Audible, Google Ads, Word-of-mouth. This campaign isn't just to launch this series, it's to launch my career in writing.

More and more readers are using platforms like Audible for their book intake. Non-readers are also stepping into the reading world with audiobooks. In some cases, if not for audiobooks, this audience would never think of opening a book. A bigger audience means more potential readers. More readers = a more successful book. 

Along with running regular social media ads and converting my books to audiobooks, I'm also planning to run ads thru Google. This alone will broaden my marketing strategy to reaching readers through Youtube, Gmail, Google Search and more. 

Lastly, the podcasts and the blogs. This is where word of mouth comes into play. While not all bloggers and podcasters charge for promotion, many of the top tier ones do. Much of book promotion is pay-to-play if a writer wants to get any kind of traction going. 

So, to recap, my goal is $18,000 and includes the full production, printing and delivery the of full trilogy, converting the series to audiobooks, funding the marketing strategy needed for ads and promotion, and to getting perks to backers.

Speaking of perks...

What you get

Every backer, no matter what tier, will receive:

  • an eBook of Syphoner: Book 1 of the trilogy
  • a social shoutout on Facebook, IG and Twitter
  • a Syphoner-themed desktop wallpaper (formatted for either desktop, phone or tablet)

Other perks include:

  • Syphoner Swag (mugs, totes, bookmarks)
  • Autographed copies (paperback and hardback)
  • Exclusive backers-only versions of the trilogy
  • A secret perk option for Ultra-fans
  • Much more (check the perks details for specifics)

What happens if I don't reach the entire goal:

If I don't reach the funding goal, the funds will be applied to as many of the steps required for publishing as possible, in order by priority, as follows:

  1. Editing
  2. Proofreading
  3. ISBNs & Publishing
  4. Printing & shipping to backers
  5. Designing, purchasing and sending swag to backers
  6. Marketing
  7. Conversion to audiobooks
  8. An official virtual launch for the series

Your Impact

If you're even considering contributing to this campaign, one of two things must be true:

  1. You're a reader (in any capacity, voracious or occasional)
  2. You support the arts

As a supporter of the arts, your contribution will bring me that much closer to making my dreams of becoming a renowned serial novelist a reality. 

As a reader, you're even more important, in that your support doesn't end here. When you receive The Syphoner Saga, and fall in love with these characters and their stories, you'll hunger for more of my work. You'll recommend my books to your friends and family, and other readers and groups you know. You, important soul, are the reason I write. Without someone who enjoys the art of the written word, someone who loves getting lost inside the world between the pages, I would have no reason to work as hard as I do on my stories. By supporting, you are forever a part of my journey as a writer. When I do achieve the goals I have set for myself, you are who I will look to in appreciation because it all starts here and now. 

Risks & Challenges

Some potential risk might be:

  • Issues with shipping delays due to Covid-19
  • Printing delays, also due to the coronavirus
  • Personal delays/publishing delays

Solutions

My method of resolving any issues always starts with communication. 

Obviously, I can't control the postal system, nor can I control the virus or any book printing company I work with. What I can do is keep you informed every step of the way. 

The same goes for any personal issues that might come up throughout the duration of working through this series. 

If any issues come up, you will receive updates here, via email (if you subscribe to updates), my social media, and my author's site. If everything goes smoothly, you can expect about 5-7 updates here throughout the duration of campaign and some form of communication after at least once a month with updates until all perks have been shipped out and delivered. I'll also update you on any new projects I start (but you are free to unsubscribe at any time). 

Aside from keeping you informed, I can only vow to work my hardest to solve any issues that may arise. I'm pretty creative, so I usually think my way out of seemingly impossible situations. 

So what's the story about?

The Syphoner Saga is a 3-part (maybe 4-part) paranormal-horror-romance series staring protagonist Divina LeBeau. Syphoner is the first book of the series, followed by Phoenixsoul and Cimmerian. 

In Syphoner we meet Divina -- a quirky, sarcastic and genuinely good-natured 17-year-old from Louisiana -- her love interest, Bastien Loukas, and their crazily intertwined families. We also meet Satrina, in a very odd and suspicious way...her funeral. I won't spoil it for you, but through the course of untimely "shifter" puberty (a thing entirely different from it's human counterpart), Divina discovers the truth about her estranged and presumed-dead father who is, in fact, very much alive. And he isn't the only one alive after an alleged certain death. The thing in the mirror, the one that takes over Divina's reflection sometimes, seems to be more than just a haunting spirit. It also doesn't seem to live solely in the mirror. As stated earlier, everyone who contributes will get an ebook copy of Syphoner.  If you're not sure about supporting yet, check out this excerpt from Chapter 3 of the book and see if your interest is piqued. 

I can't give away too much about Phoenixsoul and Cimmerian, but I will say Divina's biggest fears and wildest dreams come to fruition and she must fight against the darkest parts of herself or risk losing everything that truly matters to her. 

Book 2, Phoenixsoul, delves more into the truth about the "family curse" the LeBeau family believes they're under and the history of Divina and her mother Farrah's heritage. 

Divina's is a story filled with dark magic, beautiful and powerful beasts, and unforgettable characters. From dragon-shifters (Draaks) to the mysterious - but auspicious - magic wielding Druids. 

 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you can't contribute, it doesn't mean you can't help.  If you'd still like to support, you can do so. by:

    • Sharing this campaign to your social media (tag me! IG @munzie_lestrange, Twitter @munzielestrange, FB @mzlestrange)
    • Recommend the campaign (or my books!) to your friends, family and any readers you know
    • Subscribe to my email list
    • Follow me on social media here, here and/or here
    • Use Indiegogo's share tools

     

    Thank you for considering supporting my work. Together, I know we can make this campaign a success!

Every backer, no matter what tier, will receive:

an eBook of Syphoner: Book 1 of the trilogy
a social shoutout on Facebook, IG and Twitter
a Syphoner-themed desktop wallpaper (formatted for either desktop, phone or tablet)

Other perks include:

Syphoner Swag (mugs, totes, bookmarks)
Autographed copies (paperback and hardback)
Exclusive backers-only versions of the trilogy
A secret perk option for Ultra-fans
Much more (check the perks details for specifics)

What happens if I don't reach the entire goal:
If I don't reach the funding goal, the funds will be applied to as many of the steps required for publishing as possible, in order by priority, as follows:

Editing
Proofreading
ISBNs & Publishing
Printing & shipping to backers
Designing, purchasing and sending swag to backers
Marketing
Conversion to audiobooks
An official virtual launch for the series


Your Impact
If you're even considering contributing to this campaign, one of two things must be true:

You're a reader (in any capacity, voracious or occasional)
You support the arts

As a supporter of the arts, your contribution will bring me that much closer to making my dreams of becoming a renowned serial novelist a reality. 
As a reader, you're even more important, in that your support doesn't end here. When you receive The Syphoner Saga, and fall in love with these characters and their stories, you'll hunger for more of my work. You'll recommend my books to your friends and family, and other readers and groups you know. You, important soul, are the reason I write. Without someone who enjoys the art of the written word, someone who loves getting lost inside the world between the pages, I would have no reason to work as hard as I do on my stories. By supporting, you are forever a part of my journey as a writer. When I do achieve the goals I have set for myself, you are who I will look to in appreciation because it all starts here and now. 


Risks & Challenges
Some potential risk might be:

Issues with shipping delays due to Covid-19
Printing delays, also due to the coronavirus
Personal delays/publishing delays

Solutions
My method of resolving any issues always starts with communication. 
Obviously, I can't control the postal system, nor can I control the virus or any book printing company I work with. What I can do is keep you informed every step of the way. 
The same goes for any personal issues that might come up throughout the duration of working through this series. 
If any issues come up, you will receive updates here, via email (if you subscribe to updates), my social media, and my author's site. If everything goes smoothly, you can expect about 5-7 updates here throughout the duration of campaign and some form of communication after at least once a month with updates until all perks have been shipped out and delivered. I'll also update you on any new projects I start (but you are free to unsubscribe at any time). 
Aside from keeping you informed, I can only vow to work my hardest to solve any issues that may arise. I'm pretty creative, so I usually think my way out of seemingly impossible situations. 

So what's the story about?
The Syphoner Saga is a 3-part (maybe 4-part) paranormal-horror-romance series staring protagonist Divina LeBeau. Syphoner is the first book of the series, followed by Phoenixsoul and Cimmerian. 
In Syphoner we meet Divina -- a quirky, sarcastic and genuinely good-natured 17-year-old from Louisiana -- her love interest, Bastien Loukas, and their crazily intertwined families. We also meet Satrina, in a very odd and suspicious way...her funeral. I won't spoil it for you, but through the course of untimely "shifter" puberty (a thing entirely different from it's human counterpart), Divina discovers the truth about her estranged and presumed-dead father who is, in fact, very much alive. And he isn't the only one alive after an alleged certain death. The thing in the mirror, the one that takes over Divina's reflection sometimes, seems to be more than just a haunting spirit. It also doesn't seem to live solely in the mirror. As stated earlier, everyone who contributes will get an ebook copy of Syphoner.  If you're not sure about supporting yet, check out this excerpt from Chapter 3 of the book and see if your interest is piqued. 
I can't give away too much about Phoenixsoul and Cimmerian, but I will say Divina's biggest fears and wildest dreams come to fruition and she must fight against the darkest parts of herself or risk losing everything that truly matters to her. 
Book 2, Phoenixsoul, delves more into the truth about the "family curse" the LeBeau family believes they're under and the history of Divina and her mother Farrah's heritage. 
Divina's is a story filled with dark magic, beautiful and powerful beasts, and unforgettable characters. From dragon-shifters (Draaks) to the mysterious - but auspicious - magic wielding Druids. 
 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute, it doesn't mean you can't help.  If you'd still like to support, you can do so. by:

Sharing this campaign to your social media (tag me! IG @munzie_lestrange, Twitter @munzielestrange, FB @mzlestrange)
Recommend the campaign (or my books!) to your friends, family and any readers you know
Subscribe to my email list
Follow me on social media here, here and/or here

Use Indiegogo's share tools

 Thank you for considering supporting my work. Together, I know we can make this campaign a success!

story:
Hi! I’m Professor Neka

After six years of teaching Political Science and African African Studies and serving as an elections official in both South Carolina and Michigan, one thing is clear to me: it’s time to transform political education in America. 

Too many Americans of all ages, races, religions, and backgrounds are uninformed about our government’s history and functions. It is this ignorance that creates the space for conspiracy theories to take hold. Democracy works because citizens hold elected officials accountable. But when citizens lack a basic understanding of how the government is supposed to function, they can be easily manipulated as political corruption grows, and the entire system eventually falls apart. 

The question is, if political education is this important, then WHY haven’t we been prioritizing it in America’s public school system? Is this just another tragic consequence of failing public schools or can more sinister motives be traced back to the elites of decades passed? Read my book, The Political Miseducation of America, to find out! 

 

About the Book

I left my teaching position in 2019 with the goal of finding a way to fix political education. I started by creating an organization called Citizenship 101 to aid with my mission. Then I decided to take the Introduction to American Government course that I had been teaching out of the classroom and share it with the world. 

As I converted each section of my teaching notes into a coherent narrative for my new blog, I watched, just like all of you, as the presidential election left more destruction in its wake than a slow moving train wreck. It was as hostile and divisive as I’ve ever seen America. (Keep in mind that I wasn’t alive in the 1960s.) When I saw the deluge of conspiracy theories that followed, I realized that I needed to do more than just create a blog.

The blog I was working on was a simple collection of 10 long essays on various aspects of American governance. Essentially, they were chapters in an unpublished book. They were full of valuable information, but with no links or illustrations, they didn’t attract much attention online. What I needed to do was compile these sections into an actual book for wider distribution and include a way to alert people to the truth behind the collective ignorance of the American people. In other words, I needed to become the modern-day Paul Revere of political education. 

During my years of teaching, I taught African American Studies as well as Political Science. One of my favorite books to assign in those classes was Carter G. Woodson’s 1933 classic The Miseducation of the Negro. He is remembered as the “Father of Black History Month” because he identified a failure in the American educational system, and he decided to do something about it. He saw that students were not being educated about black history, so he created a way to teach that history outside of the classroom. He used his book as a way to alert people to the problem and rally them around his unique solution. It is that model that I wish to follow. 

 

The Political Miseducation of America is divided in 3 parts:

Part 1 is called Ignorance is Not Bliss and contains chapters 1-6. It examines the statistics surrounding the political knowledge of average Americans and recounts the surprising history of civic education in America. It also explains my proposal for transforming modern political education. 

1. The Seat of the Trouble

2. Political Education Neglected

3. How We Drifted Away from the Truth

4. Hirelings in the Place of Public Servants

5. Higher Strivings in the Service of the Country

6. The New Program

Part 2 is called Citizenship 101: The American Government Course for Everyone and contains chapters 7-16. It is equivalent to the Introduction to American Government course that I taught for many years and includes all of the same concepts, vocabulary, and history that my students learned each semester.  

7. What is Politics

8. American Citizenship and Popular Culture

9. America’s Founding

10. Writing A Constitution, Designing A Nation

11. Constitutional Rights and Freedoms

12. The US Congress

13. The Presidency of the United States

14. American Political Parties

15. Elections in the United States

16. Public Opinion in America 

Part 3 contains the book’s Conclusions and Appendices.

17. Conclusions

18. The Constitution of the United States of America (full text)

19. Glossary and Index

20. References

 

My hope is that Americans from all walks of life will buy this book to learn more about how our government works. No matter how old or young you are, I promise that you will learn something new. 

If you are tired of polarized, fact-free politics, then buy this book and let’s work together to change things. We can change the educational system for future generations, and we can also work to better our situation in the here and now. We need a revolution of truth in this country. It starts with learning about our history so that we can learn from it. 

 

Why I Need Help

Excerpts from chapters 7-13 of the book are already available on my website www.citizenship101.info.

The proceeds from book royalties will be used to transform this website into an interactive online course that will be called the Citizenship 101 Digital Learning Experience. This plan is explained in more detail in the book.

To accomplish this, I will need to maintain exclusive rights and control of all of my content. The book also communicates a sense of urgency. I believe that it will have the greatest impact if released now, given current events, not in a year or two when a traditional publisher finally gets around to releasing it. This is why I have chosen to self-publish The Political Miseducation of America. This is not an ideal choice for many authors, but I have evaluated the alternatives and determined that it is the best choice for me.

Self-publishing a book that looks as professional as a traditional publisher is not an easy task. To accomplish it, I will need to pay out of pocket for the following services:

  • Editing and Formatting
  • Design and Cover Art
  • E-Book Publishing
  • Paperback Manufacturing
  • Shipping and Handling
  • Marketing and Distribution
  • Website Renovation

I hope to raise $10,000 with this Pre-Sale to help cover these expenses. 

 

What YOU Will Get

Since I can not afford to pay for self-publishing completely out of pocket, I am using this Pre-Sale to help cover the costs. That means that by pre-ordering my book, YOU are helping me to accomplish my goal of transforming political education!

With that in mind, I am offering a few exclusive benefits to reward EVERYONE who pre-orders The Political Miseducation of America for their early support:

  1. Everyone who pre-orders a Paperback will get the E-Book as well!
  2. Every purchaser will be listed in the Acknowledgments that will appear BOTH in the book and on my website! Don’t miss this opportunity to have a permanent record of your early support! 
  3. On March 1st, my website www.citizenship101.info will become a paid membership site where users are charged a fee to access enhanced content from the book. That is, unless they participate in this Pre-Sale. Every pre-order will come with a Free Access Pass for a single website user!

Are you a part of a family, book club, social group, or organization that is interested in learning more about transforming political education? Take advantage of the Virtual Discussion 10-Book Bundle. I will connect with your group for 30-45 minutes via Zoom, Skype, or a similar program to discuss the book and answer your questions. Your group’s name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book and website, and you will get 10 Paperbacks, 10 E-Books, and 10 website Free Access Passes. 

Are you an educator or program director that is interested in a politics-themed guest speaker? Take advantage of the Virtual Seminar 25-Book Bundle. I will prepare a 2 hour interactive seminar to present to your class, company, or organization via Zoom, Skype, or a similar program. I am happy to tailor the subject matter and timing to suit your specific needs. Your organization’s name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book and website, and you will get 25 Paperbacks, 25 E-Books, and 25 website Free Access Passes. 

 

About the Author

Although neither of my parents were able to finish college, they worked hard to become small business owners and community leaders in our small, suburban town outside of Charleston, South Carolina. I was born in 1983 and developed a fascination with politics at an early age. I graduated from high school with honors, earned my Bachelor’s Degree in International Studies from Emory University, and earned my Master’s Degree in Political Science from The Ohio State University.  I taught Political Science and African American Studies at the College of Charleston for six years.  I served as an Elections Official in Charleston County, South Carolina in 2016 and 2018, and in Saginaw County, Michigan in 2020.  I have established an organization called Citizenship 101 to advocate for improving political education, and I am the author of The Political Miseducation of America.

For more information, feel free to connect with me:

Email me at professorneka@citizenship101.info.

Follow ProfessorNeka on Twitter.

Subscribe to ProfessorNeka on YouTube. 

Like Professor Neka on Facebook.

Connect with Roneka Matheny on LinkedIn.  

 

Shipping and Handling

Now that my manuscript is complete, I will use the next few months to overcome my editing, designing, and publishing challenges. 

The biggest challenge that I am likely to face is getting the finished product delivered to all of my early supporters on time and on budget. You guys are my highest priority because YOU are the ones who are helping me to accomplish my goals! That is why, as an additional Thank You, I am committing to deliver all of the Paperbacks pre-ordered in the US and Canada with NO additional delivery fee.

For my other supporters worldwide, you guys are amazing! Thank you so much for your support, but I will have to charge you an additional delivery fee to make sure that I stay on budget. There will be no price difference for international delivery of the E-Book, of course.   

Once my final publishing decisions have all been made, I will post updates on my website www.citizenship101.info and on this Pre-Sale page. My early supporters will be the first ones to see the official cover art and learn how to order additional copies of the book after the Pre-Sale ends. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to support my efforts, but can not afford to pre-order the book right now, I still need your help!

  • I guarantee that you know at least 5 people who would benefit from reading The Political Miseducation of America. You can help me by sharing this Pre-Sale campaign with those people and others through word of mouth, email, and social media. 
  • You may not be able to pre-order the book right now, but you can still plan to purchase it in the future—either for yourself or as gifts for your family and friends. My personal pro tip would be to use the book to spark some inter-generational dialogue between your teenagers and their grandparents. Society could use a lot more of that these days.
  • If you or someone you know has technical expertise in either publishing or website design, I would welcome an in-kind donation of time and services. Please contact me directly at professorneka@citizenship101.info to discuss the specific services that you are able to provide. 

I appreciate all of the support that my early supporters are providing, but I need to make it clear that this project is about much more than a paycheck for me. Political education has been my lifelong passion, and I sincerely believe that it offers solutions to many of our nation’s current problems. Unfortunately, electing a new President will not be enough to fix the mess that America is in. Change will not come from the top down. It must come from the bottom up. We, as Americans, must take responsibility for educating ourselves and make a collective decision to head in a different direction.  

 

Thank You in Advance for Your Support!

 

Roneka Matheny, “Professor Neka”

Author, The Political Miseducation of America

Founder, Citizenship 101

story:
WHAT IS IT?

The Absolutely Amazing Adventures of the League of Ordinary Old Dogs is a children’s chapter book that introduces us to a top secret group of old dogs who go on covert missions to rescue other old dogs who are in trouble. It is intended for readers aged 8+.


WHO ARE YOU?

I am Erik. Hope (my wife) and I have been running Little Old Dog Sanctuary, a hospice for old dogs, for many years. We run it out of our home located on four acres in the Colorado Rocky Mountains. The dogs get care 24/7 and we tend to their every need.

We only take in animals from county shelters. Older dogs have little to no chance of being adopted from a county shelter, and county shelters aren’t equipped to deal with any medical needs they may have. Since we’re a hospice, we can. So we do.


WHY IS THIS BOOK NECESSARY?

We are always at full capacity. Every single day we have to turn away dogs that are perfectly healthy who are going to be euthanized because they committed the crime of being old. We could easily have 500 dogs at the Sanctuary within a week and even more the week after that. We are doing as much as we can, and it’s not nearly enough. There is an overwhelming need for saving old dogs who have plenty of life and love to share.

Unfortunately, at shelters, eight to ten years of age is officially considered “old” in dogs. Several breeds, like Chihuahuas and terriers, live to be an average of 16-18. Norman, a terrier mix of ours from years ago, lived to be 23. Unless they come to the shelter with their vet records, which some do, nobody really knows how old they are. If you look old, you’re old. And you’re the first to be put down. It’s a raw deal.

Since we can’t personally save all of them, community outreach has become an important part of our mission. We blog and write articles about solutions to old dog issues on various social media and by simply talking to people we meet. But there is one demographic that we aren’t reaching with those avenues. And it’s probably the most important group for us to communicate with. It’s the demographic that has the most power to change the future.

Children.


WHAT IS IT ABOUT?

It’s about 150 pages and 25,000 words.


NO, REALLY, WHAT’S THIS ALL ABOUT?

Essentially, the book is an awesome tool for us to use to help save old dogs by influencing children about what “old” really means, as well as teaching the lessons of friendship, loyalty, commitment, teamwork and social consciousness. It also promotes literacy.


WHAT’S THE BOOK ABOUT?

The Absolutely Amazing Adventures of The League of Ordinary Old Dogs is the story of a mysterious society of like-minded old dogs whose only mission is to rescue other old dogs who are in danger.  They work in secret, usually under the cover of night, operating from the basement of the home of Jane Newcomb. Jane is a fiercely independent 103-year-old semi-retired librarian. Jane believes that she “just has a few dogs in the house.” She is wrong.

Because she isn’t able to navigate stairs, Jane hasn’t been down to her basement for decades. If she were to go down to the basement, she’d be shocked. Instead of spider webs and dust bunnies, the basement is an active command station, full of computers and gadgets. It’s also the epicenter of a network of tunnels beneath the city that allow the dogs to have stealthy access to nearly anywhere they need to go. They even have a car (of sorts) that uses toenail clippings for fuel.

The League of Ordinary Old Dogs has hundreds of members and is run by The Council, consisting of Sampson, Walter and Stanley. They are the “oldest of the old.” They are very wise and also very insane. They have seniority, so they call the shots…when they are awake. But they don’t do any actual rescues or any of the dirty work. Instead, they send H.E.L.P., the Heroic Escape and Liberation Platoon. HELP is a rotating squad of previously rescued dogs, each with a unique skill set. Davy is the “tech” guy. Hamlet has the strategic mind of MacGyver. Pinky is the muscle. Claude is a hoarder, and he’s the “go to” guy for all sorts of “stuff.” Leo is the inventor. Ilsa thinks she is a master of disguise, but no matter what she does to change her appearance, everyone just points at her and says “Oh, look! A pug!” and they squish her face and kiss her. Wilkie and Estelle are so much in love that they have become conjoined. Peanut is the doctor. Chester Von Wee Wee is the lookout, and he’s a little high-strung. Penelope is psychic (or at least says she is). Clementine spends half her time rolling around like a tumbleweed. And, of course, there is a snarky and sarcastic cat named Spring.

To make money to run the organization, the dogs have a very successful earthworm farm (The Worms R Us Worm Farm) and they sell the worms to people over the internet. They are able to do everything online, from purchasing supplies to marketing to shipping, so nobody knows that the business is actually run by dogs. According to their website, the worm farm is owned and operated by Larry Lobo – his biography on the web site indicating that he is a retired schoolteacher from Waukegan turned Professional Worm Whelper. And there is a picture of Larry on every carton of worms. But it’s really just a photo of Champ, an already strange looking spaniel/terrier mix, wearing an Albert Einstein wig and sunglasses. And the photo was taken as Champ was sneaking a mouthful of earthworms. The worm part wasn’t supposed to be a part of the photo. Sadly, it just happened. But happily, somehow, the photo became an internet sensation. Champ is known as “Einstein Worm Dog” and business is booming. College students all over the country are wearing t-shirts sporting Champ’s image and he’s become sort of a mystic folk hero. Nobody knows exactly why.

The League is fully self-contained and self-sustaining and can operate without anyone knowing about them. Or, at least that’s their plan. But the rescues aren’t easy and there is plenty of drama, action and excitement.

Oh. And the dogs constantly battle an evil squirrel who wants to steal the toenail fuel recipe and take over the world. So that's a problem.


WHO ARE THESE DOGS?

They are our dogs. You can see our dogs, past and present, on our website. And on Facebook. And Instagram. They are omnipotent…


WHERE IS THE PROJECT NOW?

I have the characters. I have the story. Now I need backer participation to finish the story and money to get it proofed, have an awesome cover created (with the input of the backers, see below) and print it all up so I can get it out there.


PERKS!

It makes me feel good that our dogs are characters in the book. And you should feel good, too. So this is what I’m gonna’ do…

As a backer, you will have the opportunity to

- Get a sticker with the cover art

- Donate a book to a school or organization

- Choose a name for a street sign, museum, flower shop, etc. (remember that this is a children’s book!)

- Have your dog be a Hero

- Have your dog be a Villain

- Promote your business

- Plus many other options!

You will see that stickers are included in pretty much every perk and that the stickers are the cover art. The t-shirt is also the cover art. See below...


SO WHAT'S UP WITH THE COVER ART?

The cover art has not been designed. Yet. You may ask, "Why not? It's the first impression. First impressions, with books at least, are extremely important." I totally agree. But they are only important if the book comes to life. No book = No cover. So, as a backer at ANY level, you will help select the cover. I will be holding four votes (three during the campaign and one after the campaign) to determine the parameters of what the cover will look like. Choose wisely. We're all counting on you.


WHAT ARE THE BOOK DETAILS?

Softcover Length – About 150 pages

Softcover Size – 6 x 9

Softcover Paper – 70# bright white

Softcover Cover Paper – 12pt coated

Cover – Color

Interior – Black and White

Formats – Hardcover, Softcover, MOBI, ePUB, PDF

Release – September, 2016


OKAY. GREAT. WHY DO YOU THINK YOU ARE QUALIFIED TO DO THIS?
Hope has been involved in dog rescue for decades, and I got involved by default when I married her. We have published two books together, Little Old Dog Sanctuary – Happily Ever After and Old Dog 101 – Tips & Tricks for Senior Dog Care. I wrote the story for a children’s book Lil’ Robin (iBook) and several fiction stories (currently available on Amazon). I’m also a playwright.

There is a lot more about myself and Hope (as well as Little Old Dog Sanctuary) at littleolddogsanctuary.org and you can also visit our Facebook page at www.facebook.com/littleolddogsanctuary or check us out on Instagram at www.instagram.com/littleolddog.


LET’S TALK MONEY. WHERE DOES THE MONEY GO?

I’m glad you asked. I have factored in the costs for printing, formatting, fees, editing, proofreading, awesome cover design, shipping, perks and keeping Little Old Dog Sanctuary running for six to eight weeks while I complete the project.


OKAY, IT’S FUNDED. IS THAT IT?

No way. As I’ve stated earlier, the greater purpose of the book is to implement it into our outreach program for children. So my main area of focus will be schools, but this also opens us up to being able to attend more “family oriented” vs. “pet oriented” community events. And I will be writing more books. The Absolutely Amazing Adventures of The League of Ordinary Old Dogs saga will continue!

All proceeds from the sale of the books will help fund Little Old Dog Sanctuary.


STRETCH GOALS

I will update the stretch goals as needed, but I’m not going to put the cart before the horse at this point…


THE RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The two big risks, as with almost any project, are time and money. Let’s begin with time…

TIME – The September delivery date is based on the fact that this is still a “work in progress” and it will take some time to implement the perks into the book. I will have June and July to finish creating, editing, polishing and signing off on the proof. The goal is to have the final product to the printer mid-August and begin shipping in early September. Based on my other projects, this is a very realistic timetable. 

MONEY – If it is funded, it will be brought to life. If it is not funded, I will figure something else out. And you will just have to just make up your own Old Dog Adventures in the meantime…


CONCLUSION

I appreciate you taking the time to consider this campaign, and please share it with your friends, enemies, frenemies and casual acquaintances.

Thank you!

WHAT IS IT?
The Absolutely Amazing Adventures of the League of Ordinary Old Dogs
is a children’s chapter book that introduces us to a top secret group of old
dogs who go on covert missions to rescue other old dogs who are in trouble. It
is intended for readers aged 8+.
WHO ARE YOU?
I am Erik. Hope (my wife) and I have
been running Little Old Dog Sanctuary, a hospice for old dogs, for many years.
We run it out of our home located on four acres in the Colorado Rocky
Mountains. The dogs get care 24/7 and we tend to their every need.
We only take in animals from
county shelters. Older dogs have little to no chance of being adopted from a
county shelter, and county shelters aren’t equipped to deal with any medical
needs they may have. Since we’re a hospice, we can. So we do.
WHY IS THIS BOOK NECESSARY?
We are always at full capacity. Every
single day we have to turn away dogs that are perfectly healthy who are going
to be euthanized because they committed the crime of being old. We could easily
have 500 dogs at the Sanctuary within a week and even more the week after that.
We are doing as much as we can, and it’s not nearly enough. There is an
overwhelming need for saving old dogs who have plenty of life and love to
share.
Unfortunately, at shelters, eight
to ten years of age is officially considered “old” in dogs. Several breeds,
like Chihuahuas and terriers, live to be an average of 16-18. Norman, a terrier
mix of ours from years ago, lived to be 23. Unless they come to the shelter
with their vet records, which some do, nobody really knows how old they are. If
you look old, you’re old. And you’re the first to be put down. It’s a raw deal.

all of them, community outreach has become an important part of our mission. We

most power to change the future.
Children.
