story:
I'm Richard Huntly, one of four authors of the book Dark Days of Horror at Dozier Rapes, Murders, Beatings & Slavery. We endured unspeakably inhumane treatment as child slaves at Dozier during the late 50's and early 60's. Many boys did not survive their time at Dozier. As God saw fit to give us the strength and the will to survive, we each went on to live quiet family lives as adults, but the pain of our Dozier experiences never really left us.

About four years ago, the four of us got together to form the Black Boys at Dozier Reform School organization. We dictated what became our book about what Dozier Reform School did to us. Our words were transcribed, edited, and published.

Writing that book purged us of some of the pain, but the memories will flash back and haunt us as long as we live. That book is our childhood blood, sweat, and tears from working like adult slaves to make Dozier rich while the State of Florida looked the other way. Not long after publication, we discovered that the Createspace account for our book had been created in the name of the person that said she would help us by setting up our account for us. Instead, she set it up in her own name. We didn't know anything about Createspace at the time; we never agreed to her setting up the account in her name and we had no contract with her. She has repeatedly locked us out of the account such that we can't even buy our own books to sell. As if we didn't go through enough by living the childhood slave experience, now we are having to fight for control of our own book.

Life goes on regardless, but we do not want to let our childhood blood, sweat, and tears make this person money while she keep us from using our own book effectively to share our story as we see fit. This is why I started this campaign on behalf of the Black Boys at Dozier Reform School. We are not wealthy men...we need help covering the necessary legal fees so we can fight for control of our book.

We really need your help. If you can't make a donation right now, you can still help by telling your friends and social media contacts about this campaign, and please ask them to help spread the word. We don't have much to offer as Perks for your generosity, but we will gratefully acknowledge you in our next edition of the book once we gain control of it.

Thank you for caring,

Richard Huntly, President, Black Boys at Dozier Reform School

** For details and documentation on this situation, please visit the Black Boys at Dozier website:  https://www.BlackBoysAtDozierReformSchool.com

story:
About The Star Kin Chronicles:

There is a top-secret group of immortals who protect humans from the threats of their hidden 'world-behind-the-world'. They are the Erelim: half-angels with brilliant blood, pure hearts, and a vampire secret. The sunlight gives them their immortality but also reveals their true form. So they must keep their true lives secret. The kindest, purest, and most self-sacrificing of the Erelim can become bonded with fallen Stars. They then become Star Kin.

Their guardians of the Star Kin call themselves Sentinels.  The Sentinels protect the Star Kin, the Stars, and humankind, with their lives. If anything happened to the Stars or their Kin, then good and evil would become unbalanced, and humanity would suffer.

Their existence created the myths and legends we tell our children. Horror stories and folk-tales keep the Erelim hidden behind a veil of fear. No human dares hunt something that is powerful enough to kill them, or terrifying enough to give them nightmares. Fear and disbelief keep humanity from discovering the truth about ghosts, vampires, dragons, shape-shifters, and superheroes. And while a few humans know the Erelim exist, none learn about the Star Kin or their Stars. It has been that way since the Erelim bloodline began.

 

The Heart Stone Trilogy - Part 1: Star Kin (Cassie's story)

"My lifetime wish was to become extraordinary."

When shy Cassandra Stone meets gorgeous Alexander Grayson, he captivates her heart. He is gorgeous, charming and mysterious, too. She knows he is out of her league, yet her heart yearns for more than friendship. As they grow closer, strange events pull Cassie deep into the mystery surrounding him. Alex and his sister Amaia are hiding a secret—one which Cassie wants to uncover.

As their friendship transforms into love, Cassie learns she is more important to the Graysons than she ever imagined. As she discovers who the Graysons are—and who she is to them—she must try balancing her human life with her new role as Star Kin.

"But extraordinary lives come at a price."

But the Graysons' enemies want to claim Cassie and her Star. Their intentions are evil, so Alex must make a stand. Facing this threat may destroy his relationship with Cassie.  But they must sacrifice everything to protect the life of the first human Star Kin.

Will their love be enough to keep the star-crossed pair together?

 

The Star Kin and I need your help!

The Star Kin Chronicles is a Young Adult, Modern Fantasy series of novels.  I have six complete manuscripts, nine partial manuscripts, and ten drafts for further books. I am also preparing several novellas. The first trilogy in the series—The Heart Stone Trilogy—is almost ready for publication. 

The Heart Stone Trilogy is made up of Star Kin, Celestial Keeper, and Phoenix Rising. This campaign covers the first book of the trilogy, Star Kin.

I'm here because I need to make my books shine. Getting professional editing and cover design services are first on my list, but well outside my (extremely limited) budget. I also need a personalized website to sell my novels and to enroll in a marketing course provided by an Amazon best-selling author. I need to raise money for these professional services. The details of each are noted below.

I want to organize everything by mid-2018, with Star Kin to be available to buy after that.

 

What I Need:

Donations, contributions, and funds to invest in editing, cover design, website costs, and marketing processes. 
As an independent author, the success of my book sales depends on these things. Here's why: 

Editing:

Writing a best-seller is not just about being a great story-teller. To write a book that sells well, you need strong plot lines, smooth flow, great character development, active voice, and correct punctuation and grammar. I created a great story, with acceptable spelling and grammar. However, I need a professional editor to help me polish my prose and fix my flow. I started writing this series 6 years ago, and I'm likely to overlook missing or misplaced words. It's a three-step process: 

  1. Manuscript Assessment—for form, flow, storyline, and character development. 
  2. Copy-editing—for sentence structure, grammar, spelling, and punctuation. 
  3. Proofreading—to make sure all the editing has caught everything.

Expected cost? Each manuscript could cost between $1,000 - $2,200 to complete the entire process.
 

Cover Designs:

Don't believe people who say they don't judge a book by its cover. A professional cover can do wonders for a book's sales. An unprofessional cover can push buyers elsewhere. The cover is the first thing my buyers will see on my Amazon/CreateSpace/Smashwords accounts. If it doesn't look fantastic why should they click to read a sample, or buy?  A cover which meets the expectations of Fantasy, Young Adult, and Romance fans can be tricky to find. 
A professionally designed cover can hint at the story inside and attract readers who will love my books. It can make the book recognizable as part of The Star Kin Chronicles series, and as part of The Heart Stone Trilogy.  I asked the cover designer to make an artwork as a perk for this campaign. She has agreed, but this will only happen once enough funds are raised.

Expected cost? For a book cover (eBook and paperback), website and marketing artwork, I expect to pay around $950.

Website costs:  

I'm setting up a free Wix website, but soon I'll need a personalized domain name and the ability to sell books online directly to my site visitors. These options come as part of the upgrade price from Wix. To sell books, get advertising credits, use email marketing, etc. I will need to pay for a business-level hosting plan. So, once my books are ready to upload and sell, I will need the upgraded site.

Expected cost? The business-level plan will be an annual cost of $198 - $294 per year. The domain name cost gets included in the hosting plan cost for the first year. After that, I must renew the domain name at an additional $15 per year.


Marketing costs:  

I'm new to the marketing arena, so I need marketing skills (and a mentor) to help me succeed. I want to complete an online course (provided by an Amazon and Barnes & Noble best-selling independent author). The course will teach me methods to push my book sales upward, to build my fan-base, and to use the tools available for my benefit.  
Other things to cover will be advertising, print runs (for perks, giveaways, and signing on book tours), and travel expenses (once my books start selling). 
I expect that sales revenue will help me cover most of these costs. Right now, I need help to cover the costs of the marketing course.

Expected cost? $597. 

The income from Star Kin's sales will go towards costs for upcoming books. Leftover money from this campaign will help with ongoing advertising and website expenses.

 

What You Get (Perks and Rewards):

So, what's in it for you?
I've planned a step-by-step journey to get each book ready for publication. This means I must reach several funding goals to have Star Kin ready for you, my amazing donors. 

If this campaign succeeds, I'll run further campaigns as each book reaches editing stage. So, here is my plan, and rewards/perks for helping me reach my goals:

  • Get Star Kin ready for sale. I will work on the books in order of release, so the sooner I raise funds the sooner each novel in the series will come out. 
    • Goal 1: Editing
      I need $2,200 to edit Star Kin.        Once I have this amount, I'll send my manuscript to an editor. If you contribute towards my first goal, your name will go on a "Special Thanks" page within the end-pages of the novel, and you will receive a free eBook novella.
       
    • Goal 2: Cover design & artwork
      I need to raise $950 for the cover and marketing artwork for Star Kin.       If I raise $3,150 total, to cover the costs of editing and cover art, I will get the cover and marketing artwork underway. If you contribute to my second goal, I will send you a special Star Kin based artwork provided by the artist who designs my covers. Your name will appear on the "Special Thanks" page of the novel, and you will receive a free eBook novella.
       
    • Goal 3: Website 
      I need to raise $198. This will cover my first year of premium domain usage via Wix (which includes my first year of domain name usage).       If I raise $3,348 total, to cover the costs of editing, cover art, and the setup of my website, I will upgrade my website. If you contribute to my third goal, I will create a page on my website to say "Thank You" to those who helped me reach my website goal. This perk will give you the option to provide your name, and/or a photo and/or location (if you wish to provide these details). You may use a screen name or choose Anonymous Donor. Your name will appear on the "Special Thanks" page of the novel and you will receive a free eBook novella.
       
    • Goal 4: Marketing Course
      I need to raise $597 for my enrolment in the marketing course. If I raise $3,945 total, to cover everything, I will mention those who have pushed my fundraising beyond the previous $3,348 goal on the dedication page of my novel. This means your name will appear on my personal dedication page between the title and the start of the novel. Your name will also appear on the "Special Thanks" page and webpage. You will also receive a free eBook novella and a Star Kin artwork. 
       
    • Goal 5: $4,500.00
      If my goal exceeds $3,945+ (I'm aiming for $4,500 to cover fees of running this campaign) I will provide all donors with a free Advanced Reader Copy of the eBook version of Star Kin (once editing and cover artwork is complete).
       
    • Large donation perks are in the sidebar of my campaign. Check them out. Some perks are unlimited while others have limited claims available.
       

Other Ways You Can Help

I know that not everyone can help me out with funding. That's OK! There are other things you can do:

  • Share, share, share! Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word about my campaign with your friends, family, colleagues or anyone else who might be interested.
     
  • Visit my Facebook Author Page and leave me a like or a  comment.  Invite your friends, too. I'll be posting updates about this campaign, so you can follow my progress there. The link  is: www.facebook.com/StarKinChronicles 
     
  • Follow me on Twitter and send me a tweet! I love hearing from my fans, and if you mention #Indiegogo in your tweet, I'll give you a shout-out!  My tag is: @EvieAsterwyn.
     
  • Visit my webpage:  https://evieasterwyn.wixsite.com/welcome

My fans and donors are important to me, and I look forward to hearing from you.

story:
"Escaped?! What do you mean escaped?! How is this possible?!" Christian shouted at his meeting with the Chieftains.

            "We don't know, my lord," one of the chieftains said quietly, evading his gaze.

            "Then find me someone who knows!" Christian was still yelling, though he rarely did, "And someone explain to me how Kodran managed to escape the most well-guarded dungeon in Everdark! How could this have happened?! I want answers! At once!" he hit the table with his first so hard that his wine goblet spilled all over the oak surface.

              "Gnolids!" someone's voice sounded from the back. The chieftains looked about themselves in puzzlement. No one knew where that voice had come from. It was from the back of the hall, an unlit part of it.

            "Who said that?" Christian looked into the dark and when the figure stepped out he sighed in relief, "Elesar! We did not hear you when you came in. Come!" he called him.

            As he approached the table, the blue eyes of the Half-Elf shone with an unusual blue glow. His steps made no sound. He was draped in a cape. The wide hood fell over his face and almost completely covered him.

            "You know something of these creatures?" Christian asked him. There was silence in the hall. Most of the gathered had an unpleasant memory connected to these dark beings.

            Elesar stood wordlessly. He threw off his hood and with a look towards Christian indicated he should end the meeting. The king did so at once. He knew what Elesar had to say were not good news, nor for everyone's ears....

 

 

 

Intrigued? Want to read more?

My name is Leon and I come from Zagreb, Croatia.  Ever since I was young, I was introduced to fantasy worlds by my father and since then I couldn't get enough of it, even to that point that I created my own fantasy world - "Sillwith". It's an imaginary island full of mythical creatures: from elves, wizards, humans and orcs, to dragons, trolls and even the undead! 

Now you are wondering, what is so special about Sillwith that separates it from any other fantasy world?

Well, I guess you will have to find out by yourself. And to do so, help me raise enough money to publish it! 

If you want to know more about the book, you can see it here - http://legendesillwitha.com/english-2/

Originally, the novel s on Croatian but it was also translated to English. And since the English market is worldwide and much bigger than just Croatian, I decided to publish the English version first.

story:
(English Version)

(you can saw some images in the gallery section)

The "Warriors of Rupertern" saga is:

The book "Warriors of Rupertern Volume 1. The book of demons" is the first of a long series characterized by its main title "Warriors of Rupertern". The book series is about a new world called Rupertern, in which living with rules, species of animals, humans and all kinds of different or similar creatures of the planet earth, as well as beings with powers of all kinds.


Creation time before the first book:

In this first book I wanted to be very thorough in every aspect, so it took me four years for the creation. Before I start writing Volume 1, I started for the detailed creation of the world Rupertern, every continent, every kind of new animal that exists. Also detail its history, its creation, the academies that were created and the cities that exist there.

In case you're wondering, academies of Rupertern are sites of learning for each type of being, from elementary to humans with intelligence, sorcerers, magicians, musicians and even demons, which is what this first book treat, Academy of demons . I also detailed the council, who imposes rules and forces them to comply. I detail enemies of various books, some are just a single volume, but others will be there bothering for quite some time. Finally, I detail the military academy, the greatest of all; I detailed each of the fighters and in the top step are the powerful zodiacals, 12 beings of great power, one for each sign of the chinese zodiac.


The summary of the first book:

After being detailing every aspect, such as transportation, various weapons such as swords, scythes and guns, animals and all kinds of living beings in Rupertern, now I went to the creation of this first book, where we have Vind, our protagonist, a normal human, which is brought to that world. I took the idea to take someone normal to that world in this first book, to give us a detailed explanation. That is, if I already started fights and everyone knew how it worked that world, the reader would be confused. That's why I put our normal protagonist so that from his point of view, we can begin to understand this wonderful world and will be the other characters who will explain to him, or rather, to us, on the functioning of that world.

This first book has about 400 pages and over 130 thousand words. Despite that, I can take a paragraph of the text to see if you like:

"Unfortunately this meeting must end and not the way one would expect, 172 spears tied steel chains out of the water and fell on the beach, three of these through the body of the girl, his blood spreads across the sand, even some blood falls on Vind, who was shocked and motionless at what happened. the body of the woman falls on the sand and is quickly swept into the sea at high speed, as if someone had hunted from within. "

Feelings in the story and what is to come:

This story holds many pleasant, cheerful, desperate, intense, terrifying and special moments, which make the reader feel joy, fear, anger, fun, calm, love and sadness, in each of its volumes. For now I just created this first volume and I'm in creating the second, entitled "Warriors of Rupertern Volume 2. The Book of ignorance" where we no longer have a normal spectator, for know we will know another academies outside of the demons academy. The explanation of the world recedes into the background, showing new characters and new enemies, solving and raising new doubts. In this first book I inspire me enough to not let readers get bored with long and extensive talks, although it had to be very explicit in explaining of the world Rupertern.

Rewards:

Thanks to your support, I can meet this first dream I have, that's why it would be very inconsiderate of me to not give you something equivalent to the time and money you contributed, it is why some examples of rewards are:
  1. For those who can help me with small amounts of money, I prepared some chapters of this first book, so they can dive a bit in this wonderful story.
  2. I want to treat everyone equally, it is why the shipping is free anywhere in the world, so that everyone can enjoy the same way this wonderful story.
  3. The book that will be released in Spanish and English will be "Warriors of Rupertern Volume 1. The book of demons", but apart from it and those who support me, I will send the book in digital format and/or physical, as well as I will send the digital and/or physical of exclusive books of weapons and animals of Rupertern, which harbor a part of what makes up the great world Rupertern and will not be in the near future sale (you can see development and illustration of various weapons and animals in social networks like ... instagram: https://www.instagram.com/manuelfelipesalazarrojas twitter: @librosmanu  facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Guerreros-de-Rupertern-129489207444798/).
  4. You can have the world map of Rupertern, being able to identify the exact place where the protagonists of each volume are, for that I have taken the time to create each continent (you can see some pictures of it on instagram: https://www.instagram.com/manuelfelipesalazarrojas and facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Guerreros-de-Rupertern-129489207444798/)
  5. I wanted to design each weapon on my own, although it is difficult, it's something I want to do, besides writer, I'm a multimedia engineer, so I'm taking care of modeling each weapon, so that images will be stunning and not only that, but some will be fortunate to have them physically in your hands. It will be smaller in size than the one described in the book, but they can touch them.
  6. Many of these books will be printed, is why that I will make some donations, even for my part, to help planting and forest conservation.
  7. Imagine being able to enter in one of your books, to be someone with impressive skills that exist only in the imagination. The reward of greater monetary value, it is also for me, the greatest reward of all, because you belong to a series of books and be that someone who can die heroically, can fight impressively or can even change a bit the way of story, imagine for a moment that you changed the end of one of your favorite books that you read, here I am giving you a chance to be that someone impressive, in a story like no other.

Petition:

I come here to indiegogo to ask for your help, to give life to this story, as this first book in the series is over, still nobody knowing it, I come here for that support I need at this time to continue this great history. Thank you very much.

Why do I need your support?

Because with the money I can get here, I can do things that I have currently limited, such as:

  1. The translation of the book into English.
  2. The full edition of the book in English and Spanish version.
  3. The global publication of online and physical book in both languages.
  4. Publicize the book, so that more people know about this wonderful story.
  5. Color illustrations of animals and weapons of Rupertern world.
  6. Donations for environmental conservation.
  7. Than just me, the only one interested in continuing this story.

If money is exceeded, all this amount will be for several things, such as:

  1. Give more publicity to the book, in social networks and other media.
  2. Greater amount of donations to the environment.
  3. A help for the second book has a base that sustained and so on each new volume.
  4. More artworks, for this first book and for the second.
  5. It will help lessen the impact of any problems when delivering packages around the world.

Other aid and Thank you, thank you very much:

Remember that you can help me not only with money but also sharing and echoing in social networks, thank you very much for the support you are giving me, every bit helps me, really, thank you so much, even for taking the time to read the story of this campaign.

(Versión en español)

(Se pueden ver algunas imágenes en la sección de la galería)

La saga "Guerreros de Rupertern" trata de:

El libro “Guerreros de Rupertern Tomo 1. El libro de los demonios” es el primero de una larga saga caracterizada por su título principal “Guerreros de Rupertern”. La serie de libros trata sobre un mundo nuevo llamado Rupertern, en el cual se viven con reglas, especies de animales, humanos y todo tipo de criaturas distintas o similares a las del planeta tierra, así como seres con poderes de todo tipo.


Tiempo de creación antes del primer libro:

En este primer libro quise ser muy detallista en cada aspecto, por eso me tomó cuatro años su creación. Antes de empezar a escribir el Tomo 1, comencé por la creación detallada del mundo Rupertern, cada continente, cada especie de animal nuevo que existe. Igualmente detalle su historia, su creación, las academias que se crearon y las ciudades que existen allí.


Por si te estás preguntando, las academias de Rupertern son recintos de aprendizaje para cada tipo de ser, desde elementales hasta humanos con inteligencia, hechiceros, magos, músicos e incluso demonios, que es de lo que trata este primer libro, la academia de demonios. También detallé el consejo, aquel que impone las reglas y las obliga a cumplir. Detalle los enemigos de los distintos libros, algunos son solo de un solo volumen, pero otros estarán allí molestando por bastante tiempo. Por último, detalle la academia militar, la más grande de todas; en ella se detalla cada uno de los luchadores y en el escalón más alto están los poderosos Zodiacales, 12 seres de gran poder, uno por cada signo del zodiaco chino.


El resumen del primer libro:

Después de estar detallando cada aspecto, como los medios de transporte, las distintas armas como espadas, guadañas y pistolas, los animales y todo tipo de seres que viven en Rupertern, pasé ahora a la creación de este primer libro, donde tenemos a Vind, nuestro protagonista, un humano normal, el cual es llevado a ese mundo. Adopté la idea de llevar a alguien normal a dicho mundo en este primer libro, para que nos dieran una explicación detallada. Es decir, si comenzaba ya con las peleas y que todos supieran cómo funcionaba dicho mundo, el lector se confundiría. Es por eso que coloque a nuestro normal protagonista para que desde su punto de vista, podamos ir entendiendo este maravilloso mundo y que sean los otros personajes quienes le expliquen a él, o mejor dicho, a nosotros, sobre el funcionamiento de ese mundo. 

Este primer libro tiene aproximadamente 400 páginas y más de 130 mil palabras. A pesar de eso, puedo sacar un párrafo del texto a ver si les gusta:

"Lastimosamente este encuentro debe acabar y no de la forma que uno esperaría, 172 lanzas atadas a cadenas de acero salieron del agua y cayeron sobre la playa, tres de estas atraviesan el cuerpo de la muchacha, su sangre se desparrama por toda la arena, incluso algo de sangre cae encima de Vind, quien quedó impactado e inmóvil ante lo sucedido. El cuerpo de la mujer cae sobre la arena y es rápidamente arrastrada dentro del mar a gran velocidad, como si alguien la hubiera cazado desde dentro."


Sentimientos en la historia y lo que esta por venir:

Esta historia alberga muchos gratos, alegres, desesperantes, intensos, terroríficos y especiales momentos, los cuales harán sentir al lector alegría, miedo, ira, diversión, calma, amor y tristeza, en cada uno de sus volúmenes. Por ahora solo he creado este primer volumen y ya estoy en la creación del segundo, titulado “Guerreros de Rupertern Tomo 2. El libro de la ignorancia”, donde ya no tendremos un espectador normal, sino que conoceremos otras academias ajenas a la de demonios y ya la explicación del mundo pasa a segundo plano, mostrando nuevos personajes y nuevos enemigos, resolviendo y planteando nuevas dudas. En este primer libro me inspire bastante en no dejar que los lectores se aburrieran con largas y extensas charlas, a pesar de que tenía que ser muy explícito en la explicación del mundo Rupertern.


Recompensas:

Gracias a tu apoyo, puedo llegar a cumplir este primer sueño que tengo, es por eso que sería muy desconsiderado de mi parte, no darte algo equivalente al tiempo y dinero aportado por ti, es por eso que algunos ejemplos de recompensas son:


  1. Para aquellos quienes me puedan ayudar con pequeñas cantidades de dinero, les tengo preparados algunos capítulos de este primer libro, para que puedan sumergirse un poco en esta maravillosa historia.
  2. Quiero tratar a todos por igual, es por eso que el envío es gratis a cualquier parte del mundo, para que todos puedan disfrutar de la misma forma esta maravillosa historia.
  3. El libro que saldrá a la venta en español e ingles será "Guerreros de Rupertern Tomo 1. El libro de los demonios", pero aparte de él y para aquellas personas que me apoyen, les enviare dicho libro en formato digital y/o físico, así como también el envío digital y/o físico de los libros exclusivos de las armas y los animales de Rupertern, los cuales albergan una parte de lo que compone el grandioso mundo Rupertern y que no estarán en un futuro cercano a la venta (puedes ver el desarrollo e ilustración de las distintas armas y animales en las redes sociales como... instagram: https://www.instagram.com/manuelfelipesalazarrojas twitter: @librosmanu  facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Guerreros-de-Rupertern-129489207444798/).
  4. Podrás tener el mapamundi de Rupertern, siendo capaz de identificar el lugar exacto donde están los protagonistas de cada tomo, para ello me he tomado el tiempo en crear cada continente (puedes ver algunas imágenes de ello en instagram: https://www.instagram.com/manuelfelipesalazarrojas y facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Guerreros-de-Rupertern-129489207444798/)
  5. Quise diseñar cada arma por mi cuenta, aunque sea algo difícil, es algo que quiero hacer, a parte de escritor, soy ingeniero multimedia, así que me estoy encargando de modelar cada arma, para que las imágenes sean impresionantes y no solo eso, sino que algunos serán los afortunados en tenerlas físicamente en sus manos. Estarán a un menor tamaño que el descrito en el libro, pero podrán tocarlas.
  6. Muchos de estos libros serán impresos, es por eso que algunas donaciones, incluso por mi parte, será la de ayudar a la siembra y conservación de bosques.
  7. Imagínate poder entrar en uno de tus libros, poder ser alguien con habilidades impresionantes que solo existen en la imaginación. La recompensa de mayor valor monetario, es igualmente para mi, la mayor recompensa de todas, porque puedes pertenecer a una saga de libros y ser ese alguien que puede morir heroicamente, puede pelear de forma impresionante o incluso puede cambiar un poco el camino de la historia, imagínate por un momento haber cambiado el final de uno de tus libros favoritos que leíste, aquí te estoy dando la oportunidad de ser ese alguien impresionante, en una historia como ninguna otra.


Petición:

Vengo aquí a indiegogo a pedir tu ayuda, para poder darle vida a esta historia, ya que este primer libro de la saga está terminado, pero aún siguen sin conocerlo, vengo aquí por ese apoyo que necesito en este momento, para poder continuar esta grandiosa historia. Muchas gracias.

¿Por qué necesito de tú apoyo?

Porque con el dinero que puedo obtener aquí, puedo hacer cosas que actualmente tengo limitado, tales como:

  1. La traducción del libro al idioma inglés.
  2. La edición total del libro en versión inglés y español.
  3. La publicación a nivel mundial tanto online como físico del libro en los dos idiomas.
  4. Dar publicidad al libro, de modo que más gente conozca esta maravillosa historia.
  5. Ilustraciones a color de los animales y las armas del mundo Rupertern.
  6. Donaciones para la conservación del medio ambiente.
  7. Que no sea solo yo, el único interesado en continuar la historia.
Si se excede el dinero, toda esa cantidad será para varias cosas, tales como:
  1. Dar más publicidad al libro, tanto en redes sociales como en otros medios de comunicación.
  2. Mayor cantidad de donaciones al medio ambiente.
  3. Una ayuda para que el segundo libro tenga una base en que sostenerse y así sucesivamente cada nuevo tomo.
  4. Más ilustraciones, tanto para este primer libro como para el segundo.
  5. Ayudará a disminuir el impacto de algún problema al momento de entregar paquetes alrededor del mundo.

Otras ayudas y Gracias, muchas gracias:

Recuerda que puedes ayudarme no solo con dinero, sino también compartiendo y haciendo eco en las redes sociales, muchas gracias por el apoyo que me estas dando, cada ayuda cuenta, en serio, muchísimas gracias, incluso por haberte tomado el tiempo de leer la historia de esta campaña.



In "website" I put the instagram. / En "sitio web" coloqué el instagram.

La saga "Guerreros de Rupertern" trata de:El libro “Guerreros de Rupertern Tomo 1. El libro de los demonios” es el primero de una larga saga caracterizada por su título principal “Guerreros de Rupertern”. La serie de libros trata sobre un mundo nuevo llamado Rupertern, en el cual se viven con reglas, especies de animales, humanos y todo tipo de criaturas distintas o similares a las del planeta tierra, así como seres con poderes de todo tipo. Tiempo de creación antes del primer libro:En este primer libro quise ser muy detallista en cada aspecto, por eso me tomó cuatro años su creación. Antes de empezar a escribir el Tomo 1, comencé por la creación detallada del mundo Rupertern, cada continente, cada especie de animal nuevo que existe. Igualmente detalle su historia, su creación, las academias que se crearon y las ciudades que existen allí.Por si te estás preguntando, las academias de Rupertern son recintos de aprendizaje para cada tipo de ser, desde elementales hasta humanos con inteligencia, hechiceros, magos, músicos e incluso demonios, que es de lo que trata este primer libro, la academia de demonios. También detallé el consejo, aquel que impone las reglas y las obliga a cumplir. Detalle los enemigos de los distintos libros, algunos son solo de un solo volumen, pero otros estarán allí molestando por bastante tiempo. Por último, detalle la academia militar, la más grande de todas; en ella se detalla cada uno de los luchadores y en el escalón más alto están los poderosos Zodiacales, 12 seres de gran poder, uno por cada signo del zodiaco chino.El resumen del primer libro:Después de estar detallando cada aspecto, como los medios de transporte, las distintas armas como espadas, guadañas y pistolas, los animales y todo tipo de seres que viven en Rupertern, pasé ahora a la creación de este primer libro, donde tenemos a Vind, nuestro protagonista, un humano normal, el cual es llevado a ese mundo. Adopté la idea de llevar a alguien normal a dicho mundo en este primer libro, para que nos dieran una explicación detallada. Es decir, si comenzaba ya con las peleas y que todos supieran cómo funcionaba dicho mundo, el lector se confundiría. Es por eso que coloque a nuestro normal protagonista para que desde su punto de vista, podamos ir entendiendo este maravilloso mundo y que sean los otros personajes quienes le expliquen a él, o mejor dicho, a nosotros, sobre el funcionamiento de ese mundo. Este primer libro tiene aproximadamente 400 páginas y más de 130 mil palabras. A pesar de eso, puedo sacar un párrafo del texto a ver si les gusta:
"Lastimosamente
este encuentro debe acabar y no de la forma que uno esperaría, 172 lanzas
atadas a cadenas de acero salieron del agua y cayeron sobre la playa, tres de
estas atraviesan el cuerpo de la muchacha, su sangre se desparrama por toda la
arena, incluso algo de sangre cae encima de Vind, quien quedó impactado e
inmóvil ante lo sucedido. El cuerpo de la mujer cae sobre la arena y es
rápidamente arrastrada dentro del mar a gran velocidad, como si alguien la
hubiera cazado desde dentro."

Sentimientos en la historia y lo que esta por venir:Esta historia alberga muchos gratos, alegres, desesperantes, intensos, terroríficos y especiales momentos, los cuales harán sentir al lector alegría, miedo, ira, diversión, calma, amor y tristeza, en cada uno de sus volúmenes. Por ahora solo he creado este primer volumen y ya estoy en la creación del segundo, titulado “Guerreros de Rupertern Tomo 2. El libro de la ignorancia”, donde ya no tendremos un espectador normal, sino que conoceremos otras academias ajenas a la de demonios y ya la explicación del mundo pasa a segundo plano, mostrando nuevos personajes y nuevos enemigos, resolviendo y planteando nuevas dudas. En este primer libro me inspire bastante en no dejar que los lectores se aburrieran con largas y extensas charlas, a pesar de que tenía que ser muy explícito en la explicación del mundo Rupertern. Recompensas:Gracias a tu apoyo, puedo llegar a cumplir este primer sueño que tengo, es por eso que sería muy desconsiderado de mi parte, no darte algo equivalente al tiempo y dinero aportado por ti, es por eso que algunos ejemplos de recompensas son:

Para aquellos quienes me puedan ayudar con pequeñas cantidades de dinero, les tengo preparados algunos capítulos de este primer libro, para que puedan sumergirse un poco en esta maravillosa historia.


Quiero tratar a todos por igual, es por eso que el envío es gratis a cualquier parte del mundo, para que todos puedan disfrutar de la misma forma esta maravillosa historia.


El libro que saldrá a la venta en español e ingles será "Guerreros de Rupertern Tomo 1. El libro de los demonios", pero aparte de él y para aquellas personas que me apoyen, les enviare dicho libro en formato digital y/o físico, así como también el envío digital y/o físico de los libros exclusivos de las armas y los animales de Rupertern, los cuales albergan una parte de lo que compone el grandioso mundo Rupertern y que no estarán en un futuro cercano a la venta (puedes ver el desarrollo e ilustración de las distintas armas y animales en las redes sociales como... instagram: https://www.instagram.com/manuelfelipesalazarrojas twitter: @librosmanu  facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Guerreros-de-Rupertern-129489207444798/).


Podrás tener el mapamundi de Rupertern, siendo capaz de identificar el lugar exacto donde están los protagonistas de cada tomo, para ello me he tomado el tiempo en crear cada continente (puedes ver algunas imágenes de ello en instagram: https://www.instagram.com/manuelfelipesalazarrojas y facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Guerreros-de-Rupertern-129489207444798/)


Quise diseñar cada arma por mi cuenta, aunque sea algo difícil, es algo que quiero hacer, a parte de escritor, soy ingeniero multimedia, así que me estoy encargando de modelar cada arma, para que las imágenes sean impresionantes y no solo eso, sino que algunos serán los afortunados en tenerlas físicamente en sus manos. Estarán a un menor tamaño que el descrito en el libro, pero podrán tocarlas.


Muchos de estos libros serán impresos, es por eso que algunas donaciones, incluso por mi parte, será la de ayudar a la siembra y conservación de bosques.


Imagínate poder entrar en uno de tus libros, poder ser alguien con habilidades impresionantes que solo existen en la imaginación. La recompensa de mayor valor monetario, es igualmente para mi, la mayor recompensa de todas, porque puedes pertenecer a una saga de libros y ser ese alguien que puede morir heroicamente, puede pelear de forma impresionante o incluso puede cambiar un poco el camino de la historia, imagínate por un momento haber cambiado el final de uno de tus libros favoritos que leíste, aquí te estoy dando la oportunidad de ser ese alguien impresionante, en una historia como ninguna otra.

Petición:Vengo aquí a indiegogo a pedir tu ayuda, para poder darle vida a esta historia, ya que este primer libro de la saga está terminado, pero aún siguen sin conocerlo, vengo aquí por ese apoyo que necesito en este momento, para poder continuar esta grandiosa historia. Muchas gracias.¿Por qué necesito de tú apoyo?Porque con el dinero que puedo obtener aquí, puedo hacer cosas que actualmente tengo limitado, tales como:

La traducción del libro al idioma inglés.

La edición total del libro en versión inglés y español.

La publicación a nivel mundial tanto online como físico del libro en los dos idiomas.


Dar publicidad al libro, de modo que más gente conozca esta maravillosa historia.


Ilustraciones a color de los animales y las armas del mundo Rupertern.


Donaciones para la conservación del medio ambiente.


Que no sea solo yo, el único interesado en continuar la historia.

Si se excede el dinero, toda esa cantidad será para varias cosas, tales como:


Dar más publicidad al libro, tanto en redes sociales como en otros medios de comunicación.


Mayor cantidad de donaciones al medio ambiente.


Una ayuda para que el segundo libro tenga una base en que sostenerse y así sucesivamente cada nuevo tomo.


Más ilustraciones, tanto para este primer libro como para el segundo.

Ayudará a disminuir el impacto de algún problema al momento de entregar paquetes alrededor del mundo.

Otras ayudas y Gracias, muchas gracias:
Recuerda que puedes ayudarme no solo con dinero, sino también compartiendo y haciendo eco en las redes sociales, muchas gracias por el apoyo que me estas dando, cada ayuda cuenta, en serio, muchísimas gracias, incluso por haberte tomado el tiempo de leer la historia de esta campaña.


In "website" I put the instagram. / En "sitio web" coloqué el instagram.

story:
According to The Veterinary Cancer Society, cancer is the leading cause of death in 47% of dogs.

There is exciting research that the Ketogenic Diet can have significant benefit to the lives of dogs diagnosed with cancer.  Promising studies and practical experiences shows cancer can be prevented, stopped, or even reversed.

As far back as 1921 Dr. R.M. Wilder theorized that the Ketogenic Diet was a way of starving cancer cells.

The Keto Pet Sanctuary is a rescue center for dogs with cancer and is producing outstanding results. They put these cancer stricken dogs on the Keto diet and when they are healed, place them for adoption.

They have 3 years of research saying the Keto diet works for dogs.

Just this weekend Dr. Mercola published an interview with Dr. Ian Billingham who pointed out the connection between a dog's diet and cancer.

"We vets are a very conservative profession. We are the most conservative profession I know. We are so tied up in our beliefs about nutrition. Our belief about nutrition is that processed pet food is the only way to feed pets.

Isn't it terrible that we have this belief? This is how our profession works. It believes that processed pet food is the only way to feed pets. Yet, processed pet food, based as it is on carbohydrates, actually drives cancer."

"All our veterinary schools are funded by the major pet food companies," he continues. "Our vets come out fully believing in processed pet food as the only way to feed pets."

The Cancer Cure is the ONLY book showing dog owners how to stop or reverse cancer in dogs.

This book offers real solutions to dog owners whose furry friends have been diagnosed with the dreaded "C" word.

We ask you to be our angels so we can stop more dogs from dying due to cancer.

If you are a dog lover, look into your dogs eyes and see how dependent they are on you. Now go over to our rewards and choose the highest level you are comfortable with.

Your dog depends on you, looks up to you and trusts you to provide not just for his basic needs of food and water, but for everything.

Your dog wants direction from you - even if half the time he doesn’t seem to listen.

Your dog wants to comfort you when you’re down.

Your dog is always ready for what you want and is willing to walk excitedly, eyes glued to your every move, when you’re on the go.

Your dog tells you all she can by following you everywhere, wagging her long tail (or short stump!), and looking up at you with those irresistible puppy dog eyes.

But there are some things your dog may hide from you, and no, it’s not just their favorite bone in the sofa cushions!

When our precious best friends are in pain, they often hide it from us.

Our dogs literally can’t stand up on their hind legs, wave a paw to get our attention and say, “Hey Lady (or Dude), I’m in pain.”

Did you know that 40% of domesticated dogs in the United States of America alone, are diagnosed with cancer each year?

That’s a staggeringly high number and perhaps a number you are already an unfortunate member of (more on how we can help in just a moment).

Let’s put that number into perspective. Say you’re at your local dog park playing fetch with your four-legged friend.

You might be there with some of your other doggy-loving-friends, who’ve also brought their besties.

If you look around and see nine other dogs in that park, as your dog chases after the ball you’ve just thrown for him - again, you can bet that with 99% certainty that four out of those ten dogs will experience the big C word in their lifetime. And yes, the C word is cancer.

In fact, veterinarians are seeing an alarming increase in early-age cancer in dogs that, by all rights, should scare you.

But don’t worry. The Dogington Post is writing this book for a reason:

  • You either have a cancer diagnosis for your dog.
  • Or you want to know what to do in the event you and your canine friend are hit with the news in the coming years.
  • Or you want to take preventative steps now so your faithful companion can live a long and healthy life, cancer-free.

Well, my doggy loving friend, you are in the right place and here’s why:

Our motivation is simple. We love dogs. We want our own dogs to be healthy, active, playful and live long lives.

And we want the same for you and your bestie.

So, we’ve researched:

  • What Causes Canine Cancer?
  • What Cures Canine Cancer?
  • Why This Works
  • How This Works

And found stories that prove that what you will read in our book works.

We’ve broken the book down into some easy to reference sections so you can immediately go to the area you need to best suit your current situation.

  • What To Do When You Get A C-Diagnosis From Your Vet?
  • What Is The Ketogenic Diet For Dogs and The History of the Ketogenic Diet.
  • The Connection Between Nutrition and Diet to an Increased Cancer Risk in Dogs
  • Additional Causes and Risks of Animals Contracting Cancer
  • The Keto For Your Dog Shopping List
  • How To Easily Prepare Your Dog’s New Diet.
  • Finding The Time To Go Keto Doesn’t Have To Be Hard
  • Things To Avoid To Prevent the C-Word
  • Our List of The Best Places To Get Your Keto Diet Supplies
  • Pets on the Ketogenic Diet Success Stories
  • Further Evidence into the Ketogenic Diet's Success.

While there are more sections, and a full breakdown can be found in the table of contents, we’ve made this book an informative, easy-to-read reference manual that you can refer back to again and again as needed.

Why?

Because we care.

Because we want to see the number of C-diagnoses in our beloved fur-friends drop drastically.

Because they can drop.

Because dogs with cancer should not become the norm.

Because, with a little bit of knowledge, we can help heal our four-legged, best friends and enjoy their loyalty, love and companionship for as long as possible.

Your dog relies on you for everything.

And that’s a lot of pressure, especially when you have a sick dog to care for.

Now you can rely on us to help you find answers.

Don’t wait for the dreaded diagnosis. Get educated now.

We are here for you and the health of your canine friend.

We are seeking funding to help cover the editing, printing, shipping, and promotional costs for The Cancer Cure Diet for Dogs. With your help, we can get this book into the hands of the people who need it most - dog parents who are facing a scary diagnosis.

The money collected will pay for the researchers, writer, graphic designers and publishing costs.

We want to change the C-word to cured.

We designed this Canine Cancer Awareness Ribbon. It's available as a lapel pin along with two copies of The Cancer Cure Diet for Dogs with your pledge of $75 or more or by itself with your pledge of $5 or more:

Risks and challenges

We are right on schedule and hope to ship the book to backers and have it ready for sale to the public before the end of the year.

story:
Hello, I am Dr. Sunday Agbonika, I’m a veterinary Doctor, pet enthusiast and Executive Director, Collars & Paws Ltd.. I have had five years professional experience as a private practicing Veterinary Doctor, dog trainer and offering pet boarding services to clients in my city.

From my professional experience, I have noticed the knowledge gap in many Africans who own pets thus; I have had to board pets that became unruly due to poor pet parenting, to rehome them with people who are better pet parents. Few have had the misfortune of having to be euthanized and some dog training requests I get, have come from people who want to control the pet in ways that they can avoid social contact with a pet that was for instance, acquired to guard the premises or acquired because their child requested for a dog. These led to the birth of the registered brand, Dogalov, in 2016.

With your contribution, we will spread the awareness of responsible pet guardianship across Africa, beginning with our country, Nigeria, letting people know that pet ownership is a careful, deliberate decision that affects an entire family thus, choosing the right pet for the family profile and each member of the family, contributing to the growth and discipline of the pet.

With your contribution, we would develop a secured online platform for sales of subsequent editions, increase our online/ offline marketing and print hard copy for circulation nationwide (Nigeria only), till we gain leverage for large scale advertisement and sales revenue.

It is often heard in different parts of Nigeria (and maybe, Africa), how a dog bit the owner, owner’s child, family or friend. Many times, the training or other factors surrounding the development of such a dog for example, vaccination was neglected, turning such a pet into a beast.

Beyond the magazine, we have set up Dogalov school club, in a Montessori school in Abuja, Nigeria, where we teach children aged 5 – 11, the basic care of animals, pro bono. We are hoping to replicate the club in some more schools.

If Africans can successfully inculcate the awareness of responsible pet guardianship, we would have a continent with fewer human or animal lives being lost due to poor pet parenting.

The maiden edition was due by January 10th 2017 but is now in production, due to limited funding. We hope to raise the required funds through this crowdfunding campaign to make the process less burdensome. Else, we would keep pushing our baby steps till we achieve this dream.

If you’re disposed to help us fund this campaign, great!!! We appreciate. If you are not, the next best tool available, is your network. Help us get this message out to your network by sharing our campaign, using the Indiegogo share tools, and together, we can ensure the safety of human lives and animals in Africa while helping us fulfill our vision: enriching human lives through pets.

story:
Enlace Arquitectura: la revista de arquitectura en América Latina

Enlace Arquitectura es un medio impreso que expone las obras arquitectónicas más importantes de nuestra región. Con más de 30 años de historia hemos visto crecer generaciones de arquitectos a nuestro lado, que han encontrado inspiración en nuestras páginas para ser parte de su formación académica, profesional y personal. 

Decidimos crear esta campaña de crowdfunding para nuestra comunidad de lectores parte esencial de la publicación, no sólo como lectores sino como creadores de este proyecto .

Por lo anterior, la edición del cuarto trimestre de 2018 será una publicación de colección, con una sección especial para los benefactores, imprimiremos 100 números personalizados y de manera significativa la oportunidad de participar en las decisiones del contenido del Consejo Editorial. 

Somos fieles en los medios impresos como una herramienta inmortal, que pasa de generación en generación, heredando el conocimiento, que permite acceder y formar parte de una comunidad que conserva el amor por la arquitectura y las publicaciones impresas.

 

Nuestra historia: 28 años de periodicidad y experiencia.

Proceso de producción

Nuestros lectores y amigos

A lo largo de casi tres años hemos tenido la fortuna de colaboración con millas de arquitectos de todo el continente, lo que nos ha dejado una larga lista de amigos.

¿Cómo participar?

A través de seis recompensas, que van a escalar en orden de importancia, se puede obtener este número de edición especial:

  • Creador

En esta recompensa de tiempo limitado, adquirirás este número a un precio especial, que sólo será válido hasta el 30 de octubre. El envío es gratis a cualquier parte de México.

  • Proyectista

A partir del 30 de octubre y hasta que termine la campaña, podremos adquirir esta recompensa a un precio regular, con un envío gratuito a cualquier parte de México.

  • Asociado

Con esta recompensa podrás inmortalizar tu nombre en la primera página de la revista, en donde sólo aparecerán las personas que participan de este proyecto. ¡Felicidades!

  • Patrocinador Especial

Los primeros 100 ejemplares de la tirada general, se decantan del resto, incorporando una portada especial. Estos libros tienen un número de impresión exclusivo y se incluye el nombre del socio benefactor en la portada con tipografía metálica dorada. 

Así mismo hace referencia a la primera página interior de la revista reconociendo y manifestando su apoyo a la manera especial. 

Sólo hay 80 números disponibles ¡Felicidades! 

  • Colegas

Enlace Arquitectura: la revista de arquitectura en América Latina
Enlace Arquitectura es un medio impreso que expone las obras arquitectónicas más importantes de nuestra región. Con más de 30 años de historia hemos visto crecer generaciones de arquitectos a nuestro lado, que han encontrado inspiración en nuestras páginas para ser parte de su formación académica, profesional y personal. 
Decidimos crear esta campaña de crowdfunding para nuestra comunidad de lectores parte esencial de la publicación, no sólo como lectores sino como creadores de este proyecto .
Por lo anterior, la edición del cuarto trimestre de 2018 será una publicación de colección, con una sección especial para los benefactores, imprimiremos 100 números personalizados y de manera significativa la oportunidad de participar en las decisiones del contenido del Consejo Editorial. 
Somos fieles en los medios impresos como una herramienta inmortal, que pasa de generación en generación, heredando el conocimiento, que permite acceder y formar parte de una comunidad que conserva el amor por la arquitectura y las publicaciones impresas.

 
Nuestra historia: 28 años de periodicidad y experiencia.


Proceso de producción

Nuestros lectores y amigos
A lo largo de casi tres años hemos tenido la fortuna de colaboración con millas de arquitectos de todo el continente, lo que nos ha dejado una larga lista de amigos.

¿Cómo participar?
A través de seis recompensas, que van a escalar en orden de importancia, se puede obtener este número de edición especial:
Creador
En esta recompensa de tiempo limitado, adquirirás este número a un precio especial, que sólo será válido hasta el 30 de octubre. El envío es gratis a cualquier parte de México.

Proyectista
A partir del 30 de octubre y hasta que termine la campaña, podremos adquirir esta recompensa a un precio regular, con un envío gratuito a cualquier parte de México.

Asociado
Con esta recompensa podrás inmortalizar tu nombre en la primera página de la revista, en donde sólo aparecerán las personas que participan de este proyecto. ¡Felicidades!

Patrocinador Especial
Los primeros 100 ejemplares de la tirada general, se decantan del resto, incorporando una portada especial. Estos libros tienen un número de impresión exclusivo y se incluye el nombre del socio benefactor en la portada con tipografía metálica dorada. 
Así mismo hace referencia a la primera página interior de la revista reconociendo y manifestando su apoyo a la manera especial. 
Sólo hay 80 números disponibles ¡Felicidades!

story:
Let's Take Light into Dark Places together.

From a young age, I knew that I would be an author. However, it wasn’t until my early twenties that I published a book (“My love is not afraid” https://www.amazon.com/love-afraid-Roxanna-Aliba-Kazibwe/dp/1522819819 ).

I will say this: getting published is hard!

Getting your published book into the hands of millions of readers is even harder.

If you are a published or yet-to-be-published author, what drives you is the ache to share your stories with the world, to take light to dark places, to use books as a courier of hope and transformation. You believe in the power of words to not just touch the mind for a moment but the soul forever. These are the beliefs that drive me too.

If you are like me, you desire to speak to millions and reach the one and to reach the one who will change millions.

I want to grow my craft. I desire excellence, impact, global reach. I want to change the world doing the things that I love; the things that I am gifted at. 

I want to be able to write under the occupation section of my bio "Author" with a straight face.

I want to look my son in the eyes when he wants to pursue his dreams and tell him with confidence that "You can make money doing the things you love." 

I want to make a path for a rising generation of writers in my country and hopefully around the world. 

This is why I am (even though my heart quivers and runs off to hide as I do so) fundraising for money to attend Chandler Bolt's Self-Publishing School. This course is meant to equip me with book writing and marketing skills as well as opening a gateway to global  networks. 

So, I have made the bold and ballsy decision of joining Self-Publishing School.com. A feat which is going to cost me $4997. Yep.

https://self-publishingschool.com/products/

I didn’t have all the $4997  but "the million dreams" about what is possible "are keeping me awake". In the words of Abigail, “I can’t sleep but wake, I can’t wake but dream.”

I am eager to join the course by mid-December, before the Christmas break. The course includes sessions of working through book outlines, book writing and the one I am really looking forward to...book marketing. I have a work in progress that I am ready to work through during the course.  

Your help will be pivotal in my life. I will highly appreciate any monetary support that you are able to give. 

Guess What? If you donate $10 and share this with your friend, who will also donate $10, who will then share it with their friend who will donate $10…well, you get the picture. #DonateAndShare is all you need to do to give me a leg up.

I am asking you in particular because you and I care about the same things; covering the world with good news – with hope, life and love, with wisdom and understanding. You want to take light to dark places as do I. I have chosen books as my medium for travel. Will you support me in this pursuit?

Click on the thank-you perks to find out all the special gifts that go with each offering, including customized poems, an autographed copy of my book, and more. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not in to make a monetary contribution at this time, you can still make an impact by sharing this campaign with your friends both offline and online. 

With boatloads of gratitude,

Roxie.

Thank you for investing in me and in the creative arts!

story:
CHECK OUT TDC'S OFFICIAL TUMBLR HERE FOR ALL NEW UPDATES!


Hello! I'm Shairina Brown, and I'm the author of The Divine Chronicles. I am currently a student studying English Literature and Storytelling; I’ve written tons of stories in the past, and I’ve been published in various anthologies and literary magazines. I started writing The Divine Chronicles three years ago, and it's easily my biggest project. I've spent months fleshing out the world it takes place in, and putting my school assignments off 'til the last minute so I could create something I was proud of. I'm happy to say that I've finally reached that point, and thus I present The Divine Chronicles to you.

The Divine Chronicles is my take on a YA urban-fantasy series and it is focused on queer and racial minorities as major characters. This series aims to be representation for readers of colour, queer readers, and those who intersect between the two. This series is for those who are forced to consume media without seeing themselves reflected in the story and live with the idea that they aren't worth telling stories about. Growing up, all I wanted was stories that I could see myself in and for this reason I’ve created a world inspired from our very own where POC aren’t a dime a dozen; where not all POC are struggling with racism or prejudice; where not all coming out stories are met with intolerance, fear, and ignorance. The Divine Chronicles serves as a story where minorities are represented together in a story filled with wonder, magic, and action.

While this crowdfunding campaign is in support of The Divine Chronicles in general, I am trying to start out rather slow with introductions to the characters. If this project gets fully funded, the first physical book received by supporters will be The Sentinel Chronicles Volume A: Crownes. 

This book is an anthology filled with three-thousand to four-thousand word stories about the eight main characters who are all reborn gods. These stories take place when the characters are around ten to fourteen years of age, and they show us some of the life changing and important events that went on in the casts lives prior to the very first novel.


  • Soft cover
  • Anthology of short stories following the eight main characters
  • 160+ pages
  • 5" x 8" 
  • Bonus content after the last short story
Current progress: All short stories are finished and are currently going through the editing and revising process. Once they're done, I'll be prepping them for print, and then send off to the printer I've been in contact with! The bonus content will be worked on while I'm in the editing and revising process for the main content. 

Things needed to be done: front cover illustration / design


    Read the rest of the character biographies here

    The official art for The Divine Chronicles is drawn Bunpurr on Devianart. We've been working together since Fall 2014, and  you can find some of the work she's done for the project down below.



    PLEASE NOTE THAT IF YOU CHOSE A RUSHED/QUICK SHIP PACKAGE YOU CANNOT PURCHASE ANY ADD-ONS, SO PLEASE BE AWARE OF THE BACKER DEALS YOU'VE CHOSEN! THANK YOU <3


    Unfortunately, some of the things I wanted to showcase are still in their development stages, but when the design process is finished they will all go up here! For now, I hope you'll all enjoy what is posted so far, and I hope you're interested in what's shown! This section will be updated over time!

    THE BOOKMARKS

    LIMITED EDITION CHALLENGE COIN & LAPEL PIN

    *Please note that the design coins are currently in design development and this is a rough version of what it should look like in the end!

    DIVINE ORDER OF SANCTITY WOODEN CELLPHONE CHARMS
    *Some come with a pearl up top in the colours pink, cream, and gold*

    SENTINEL FAMILY CARDS
    *Currently in production; will be something similar to collectible cards embellished with foil and a nice design on the back*
    STICKERS
    One finished, and a few more to come!



    Sadly, the fact is that this is my first crowdfunding campaign and some things could go horribly wrong. I'm hoping this will go as smoothly as possible in case this does get funded. And if this project doesn't get funded, I have made it a fixed funding donation type, meaning if the original goal isn't met you'll all get your money back!

    A big thank you to all my friends and family for the amazing support. I definitely wouldn't have made it this far without them, and I am so grateful to have their constant encouragement and cheerleading as I chugged along with this project. 

    Thank you to Bunpurr, who you can find on deviantart. She's been so great to work with, and she's been extremely helpful as well! I look forward to working with her some more, and I hope she's just as excited to work with me. I hope that all my supporters appreciate the hard work she's put into this project!

    I also just wanted to say thank you to Bensound.com for the royalty free music, as I think the song added the perfect tone to the trailer. 

    Lastly, thank you to those of you who donated to the cause! Without YOU, I definitely wouldn't be here at all, and I'm so grateful even for the smallest donations and the smallest amounts of support. I created TDC to inspire people who look like me, and even to inspire those who don't! This series means a lot to me, and I'm very happy that I could share this world I've created with all of you on my own terms!

And if this project doesn't get funded, I have made it a fixed funding donation type, meaning if the original goal isn't met you'll all get your money back!

A big thank you to all my friends and family for the amazing support. I definitely wouldn't have made it this far without them, and I am so grateful to have their constant encouragement and cheerleading as I chugged along with this project. 
Thank you to Bunpurr, who you can find on deviantart. She's been so great to work with, and she's been extremely helpful as well! I look forward to working with her some more, and I hope she's just as excited to work with me. I hope that all my supporters appreciate the hard work she's put into this project!
I also just wanted to say thank you to Bensound.com for the royalty free music, as I think the song added the perfect tone to the trailer. 
Lastly, thank you to those of you who donated to the cause! Without YOU, I definitely wouldn't be here at all, and I'm so grateful even for the smallest donations and the smallest amounts of support. This series means a lot to me, and I'm very happy that I could share this world I've created with all of you on my own terms!

story:
HEY ALL GODS AND GODDESSES OUT THERE!!!!!!

What an exciting time this is, I wrote a book and it has been accepted for publishing and promotion!!! YAY!!!! SUPER EXCITING!!!!! 

My real name is Sarah Strong, yep! That's right, Sarah Strong! Most people ask me if it's my real name, so just to clarify!!! As a child I enjoyed writing poetry, prose and songs and I'm a distant relative of Andrew Barton "Banjo" Paterson who was a famous poet and playwright dating back to the pioneering times of Australia. Writing has always played a big part in my life. Recently I have launched my business as an Intuitive Life Coach and the writing of "Book of Mantras Bible of Ascension" presents in tandem with my strong desire to assist all who desire a spiritual awakening, and to prepare our minds, bodies and souls for the ascension process which has begun and will continue for approximately the next 10 years.

Book of Mantras Bible of Ascension

This campaign will fund the publishing process including the building of a website, printing, promotion of the book on all platforms digital and hard copy.

This project is very dear to my heart and SUPER important to humanity's spiritual evolution!!! It is a simple and effective way to assist in the awakening of all of you who choose to be awoken now and who desire to evolve spiritually. This book is a handbook for ascension and a super easy way to start no matter where you are in your journey!!! YEAH BABY!!!!!!

The Goal

The financial goal is $6000 which will cover the cost of production for print and digital format, promotion, social media promo package, promo video trailer, author web page, print distribution, publicity and press releases, author interview, specialised promotional package and all other associated production costs!!!! WOOO HOOO!!!!!!

Unique perks will be offered including a copy of the book, intuitive life coaching sessions, oracle card sessions depending on your level of contribution:

$25 and above will receive a copy of "Book of Mantras Bible of Ascension"

$50 and above will receive a copy of "Book of Mantras Bible of Ascension" and a 15 min coaching session

$100 and  above will receive a copy of "Book of Mantras Bible of Ascension" and a 30 min coaching session 

There are more perks in the "perk" section, check it out!!!

All the funds will go towards the publishing of this book regardless if I reach the goal or not!!!! AMAZING!!!!

The Impact

This book will have a profound impact on all who read it and in turn on humanity as a whole!!!! It  will shift major energy and assist in the creation of a new world that we are now creating. Are you sick of the greed based society that we now live in? Would you like to be a pioneer in the creation of a world based on TRUTH, love, compassion, kindness and LOVE? This is the channel that you can make a huge difference in your life and those around you!!!!! DIVE IN BABY!!!!!

Challenges We May Face

The biggest challenge that we are all facing right now is fear. Fear of the unknown, fear that the world might break, that everything has changed and that we have no idea what is going to happen. These are real fears and a very real situation. The benefit of this book is that it inspires huge amounts of positivity in the reader and can overcome these fears through reading and meditating on these words!!! WOW!!!! CAN THIS BE TRUE???? YES!!!!!

Personally, I have overcome huge amounts of adversity in the past 7 years so when things get tough I get meditating and praying!!!! That mighty Spirit of Love always comes through for me and can work for you too!!!!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're not in a position to contribute financially, may I ask that you share the sh*t out of this link please?

Can you please share it on all your social media outlets, with friends and family, even your dog!!! Lol!! If you feel pulled to create videos, they are super fun and have a great reach, I would be bouncing off rainbows with joy to see that!!!! Lol!! YEAH!!!!!!! 

Remember to use the Indigogo sharing tools too (they asked me to say that)!!!!! 

Let's make this HUGE!!!!! Who would you like to help today? Send them the link and let's watch magic happen before our eyes!!!!!!!!!! OMG, YES!!!!!!!

story:
Hello everybody.

My name is, Phil Newton, author of fan favorite If You Give a Guy a Beer…it’s a parody. I’m also author of the soon to be published If You Give a Guy a Fishing Rod. 

But wait, you see this all begins with a story. 

6 years ago I was out of work for several months.  
I know unemployment is sad…I got better.

As I looked for employment, I thought I should keep myself busy with a creative endeavor.
That creative endeavor was a humor book, a parody of the popular children’s book If You Give a Mouse a Cookie. It's called, If You Give A Guy a Beer.

Well I found a job, but the funny thing is the book has continued to sell. Only one or two copies a day, but that’s been enough to push it past the 1000 copies sold mark! And I kinda' made a deal with myself. If it sells more than 1000 copies then I will write another and see how it goes.

So, I went on a quest to find a great artist worthy of illustrating my next masterpiece…lexicon…volume…ok Bathroom Reader. 

It serves an important function!

Anyway, I found a great artist, Tom Heyerman.

Now, this is where you enter the story. 

My artist deserves to be paid for his excellent work. I’m sure you agree. 

My goal of $6,000 will go to paying him. The rest will go to fulfillment of If You Give a Guy A Fishing Rod. Anything that is left will go toward buying me a ham sandwich. I do love ham sandwiches. I hope I get more than one.

I Have Included Several Perks.

You have the option of receiving:

  • My eternal thanks and a Desktop Background featuring art from If You Give a Guy A Fishing Rod.
  • If You Give a Guy a Fishing rod eBook (plus the above).
  • A signed physical copy of If You Give a Guy a Fishing Rod and eBook.
  • Signed physical copies of If You Give a Guy a Fishing Rod, my previous book: If You Give Guy A Beer, and eBook.
  • Signed physical copies of If You Give a Guy a Fishing Rod, my previous book: If You Give Guy A Beer (Regular cover and variant cover), eBook, and limited edition poster of guy and his friends. Limited to 25 copies! eBook and my previous book, If You Give Guy A Beer (both signed).

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that some of you just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign. (Use the Indiegogo share tools). 

And that's all there is to it.

Join me. Let’s make this happen. It’s going to be fun!

story:
I am writing a book. Not just any book. Not a fictional book. Not a self-help book--but a book to help people revolt against the cultural and societal strains that self-help books and culture in general create and overcome their fear that they're not good enough, can't overcome their situation, or aren't able to be loved. They can throw out all the garbage that rains down daily on us all and overcome the stress and self esteem issues that plague them, once they realize that they can truly move forward and that there is a Creator who has a purpose for them.

     Here's where you come in! I would love for this book to be published by big name, like Thomas Nelson or Baker, but unfortunately, when that happens, the price of the books become astronomical and the readers are only those who can afford to purchase the books. But, if I self-publish, I maintain the rights to the book and am able to do with it what  I choose. So if I want to sell it on Amazon for a penny or give it away/sell it for charity, I can do all of those things. However, self-publishing isn't cheap. The only way to get the book out to the right places is to go with a larger publishing house, like Westbow Press. To do so, effectively, costs an author anywhere from $3,200-$17,000, up front, with no guaranteed return on that investment. However, the return isn't my issue, it's the initial cost. I could care less about actually making money, I just want to help people. 

      What I am asking: please give what you can, every dollar that you give will go toward the cost to publish. The more I can raise, the more exposure the book will have in book stores and electronically.

       MY PROMISE: If I end up raising more than I need to publish and market, I will give the money to another charity here locally or one that you designate, such as a church and/or pregnancy crisis center, dependent on the total amount left over. Either way, if we get enough funding I hope to be able to hand sign with a unique message a book for every contributor here who indicates, when asked, that they would like one. I think that would be a nice thank you. Either way, I appreciate your time in just reading this and hope you the best!


*NOTE*: As with all publishing, the dates are fluid, the book will be completed in fall of 2016, however, dependent on editorial review and printer issues, we have given lead time on all perks. We hope it won't take as long as it notes in each of the perks. Thanks so much for your support!
