story:
Encouraging Future Gearheads

We are Brian & Clint, a pair of buddies who met because of a shared hobby that has been the source of ours and many other lifelong friendships.  This book is our attempt to help that hobby reach more people for whom it might be the key to a fun, supportive community that isn't based on race or politics and where the only "religious arguments" are about drivetrains. 

  • We want kids to learn about motorsports as a hobby.
  • We want to tell stories from both real motorsports and amateur tuners.
  • We want to raise money for charities that matter to us.
  • We want a fun story to read with the kids in our lives!

 

You're Into Cars? So Are We!

It's fun to share your passion with your kids!  Here's a great way to start that early.

  • Real racing terminology.
  • Genuine stories about real car culture.
  • Storytellers who love the subject as much as you do and strive to do right by the topic.

 

Not A Gearhead?  Still Fun To Read!

This isn't a technical manual, and you might even learn something you can save for trivia night.

  • Fun, cute characters that your kids will want to hear about.
  • An uplifting message about virtues such as determination and friendship.
  • A vivid, full-color hard-cover picture book you can be proud to own or give as a gift.

 

A Charity Impact In Every Copy!

One of the things that really motivates us is a chance to give back to the kids our communities.  Since the beginning of this project it's been our goal to contribute as much of it to charity as we could.  There's not a lot of profit in the self-publishing book industry but we are determined to always carve out a significant share to donate to valuable children's health causes from the sale of every story book and sticker pack. 

  1. From every book sale, $2 of the $10 is set aside for charity
  2. From every sticker sale, $1 of the $3 is set aside
  3. From a combo book+sticker sale, $3 is set aside

We are doing this because it's important to us, even if it means sometimes we lose money on a sale.  That's part of being a "social venture" business, where supporting our community (not profit) is our primary aim.

 

We Need Your Help Self-Publishing!

As you can imagine, children's book publishing is highly competitive and our approach and desire to donate a significant share to charity meant the only way to release these books is to publish them ourselves, at our own cost.

  • When you pre-order a copy, you help us fund our initial print run!
  • When you pre-order a copy, we make a donation to a fantastic nonprofit supporting children and their families with bleeding disorders!

If we don't reach our goal on Indiegogo we have to find some other way.  Bake sales at track days, maybe?  Does anyone want to buy a brownie that's lightly dusted in shredded tire rubber for 5 dollars... ?

 

Not Our First Rodeo

You can trust that we know how to publish and distribute a high-quality book in a timely manner.  We've done this before!

  • One of us is a professional graphic designer who has done digital-to-print work for clients all over the US, who dreams in Adobe Illustrator, and who can name more fonts than your kids can name Pokemon!
  • The other one of us is an efficiency nutjob who has run several car clubs, chaired several nonprofit boards, managed many complex corporate projects, and has a wifi-connected egg tray in his fridge because finding he's out of eggs on Sunday morning is just inefficient.
  • This is our second book in this series and we're using the same publisher, so the process is known and proven and we can set clear expectations.

 

Risks & Challenges

Risk are pretty low since we've done all the hard work already! But there are always a few.

  • The digital book is already created and converted to be ready for printing.
  • We're using the same 8"x5" hardcover format as before so layout delays with the printer should be minimal
  • We've got a workable system for shipping books out to you that has worked OK in the past.  If you overwhelm us with your support, well... that's what all those great car-club friends are for! 

Protip: always make friends with the 4x4 and SUV clubs just in case your book goes viral and you need help transporting them by the ton!

 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Don't have kids?  You can still help support this project!

    • Order one as a gift for a kid in your life!
    • Order one for your local children's library, children's hospital, day care, or orphanage!
    • Order some stickers or other merch - we donate to charity for those, too!

    Thanks so very much for reading this far and for supporting our crazy little project!

story:
Canada's main artery, The Trans Canada Highway, stretches from the Atlantic to the Pacific and features some of the most diverse scenery on the planet.

My experience as a driver is significant, not least in North America.  I have driven long distance in Canada and in the southwest part of the USA, often covering 5,000 miles on a 14 day holiday.  The often quiet but easy roads and the huge skies make driving in this part of the world quite rewarding.

To drive the entire Trans Canada Highway (and back again) means 26 days on the road, with two ferries thrown in as well. I start in St John's, Newfoundland and after reaching Victoria, British Columbia, I'll be heading back east again.

Whilst the trip has personal motivations behind it, being a graphic designer and author/photographer of books locally available at my home on the Isle of Arran (west coast of Scotland), it makes sense to write, photograph and video as I go.

There have been very few books written on the Trans Canada Highway, probably due to its immense length and the cost & time of taking it on. With this extra incentive, I am hoping that the book I end up with will become the latest and most updated journal of the trip. And I've many things to see and do en route.

 

A donation of £3 from every book sale will go to Alzheimer Scotland.

The project is expensive and yet I am very keen to ensure that you get something worthy of a donation. Any funds received will go into the trip costs and the publication of the book.

I have no real target - this is a trip that will happen regardless - but I will be producing a limited quantity of books by the end of 2018. This is your chance to reserve one of the first copies.

You have the option to simply pre-order a book and this supports the trip and my favourite charity. That's just £20 (plus any postage). Furthermore you can choose additional perks by having a "thank you" printed inside the book or even dedicate a page in the book itself - perhaps to friends or family who live in Canada, perhaps just as a memento of a trip you've had out there.

There is a lot of information on my website at www.drivecanada.co.uk and you can even track me as I go, using a very unique GPS device I will be carrying with me. Details are on that link.
 

Lastly, if you've friends who may be interested, please don't forget to share this funding page!

Many thanks for popping by,

 

Graham Chappell, Isle of Arran.

story:
The Hustings

Think of https://thehustings.news as a social media site that operates with traditional newspaper values, designed to compete with the politics components of Facebook, Twitter, Reddit, etc. Split into three easy-to-read columns, The Hustings runs non-partisan political news and analysis in the center-column, with commentary on this news from our liberal contributing pundits in the left column and from our conservative contributing pundits in the right column.

It is an easy way for politically minded readers of all stripes to get both sides of a story without falling into echo-chambers and without the trolling and vitriol, and twisted facts often found on mainstream websites. 

Writers and editors come from various backgrounds. Most of us are career journalists, working on both coasts or in the states between. None are currently employed by a political party. The Hustings is dedicated to building on its diversity of voices for all three columns.

The Hustings seeks contributions from people like you in order to pay its editors and contributing pundits for their work. Our goal is to build sufficient readership in order to monetize the site with advertising from known entities, including American political organizations and candidates. We do not intend to charge membership fees or install paywalls that will build up readers' lists of $5-per-month expenses.

The Hustings seeks $30,000 in funds in order to pay our current lineup of editors and contributors, and to draw additional contributing writers for the conservative and liberal columns. Today The Hustings typically runs three posts per week. This expansion would allow us to run five posts per week, Monday through Friday. 

Achieving the funding goal would allow The Hustings to pay contributing pundits $50 per column, through March 2021. It would also help pay for development, updates and adding features for readers of the WordPress-based website, thehustings.news, and for development of an advertising sales system. 

Funds raised via Indiegogo would pay for the above expenditures first, whether or not the $30,000-goal is achieved. 

The long-term goal of The Hustings is to provide an honest, fair, easy-to-read outlet with diverse opinions to stem, and even reverse, the widening political divide, and to get Americans of all political persuasions to talk to each other. The Hustings can become an alternative to social media giants while operating independently of such journalism-crushing monopolies as Google. 

Please consider contributing to The Hustings' fundraising campaign today.

Please visit https://thehustings.news often, and bring along your friends, colleagues, neighbors and family, whether or not you agree with them politically. You all will be on the same page.

Todd Lassa

Editor-in-Chief and founder, The Hustings

story:
LinkedIn has become Geodemographic database marketers' paradise

In a plain language, database marketing is a marketing technique that utilizes customer databases.

Before the advent of social media platforms like LinkedIn, database marketing was a form of one-to-one direct marketing in which databases of customers (or potential customers) are used to generate personalized communications in promoting products or services to them by targeting geographic locations with their highest concentrations.

Windhoek, Namibia.

B2B database marketing method that will be discussed in this eBook will allow you to leverage BIG databases like LinkedIn to be reaching B2B companies ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD with personalized and targeted campaigns. In the long run, this should cut down your cost of B2B lead acquisitions for example, list of CEOs of B2B companies from +$10 per lead to almost ZERO AND/OR FREE.

Why LinkedIn?

LinkedIn has grown into a community of +500 million of B2B owners, professionals, academic experts, young university graduates, coaches and trainers, network marketers, authors, publishers, etc, who have identified themselves by their basic Geodemographic characteristics: - who they are, where they stay (Geography), where they work (company), what they do (job function), job entry and current positions, what interests them, what skills they have, their experience, what education they have received, their voluntary experience, etc.

Whether you love or hate the platform, it has become a "paradise" for job seekers, recruiters, network marketers, coaches and trainers, motivational speakers, etc. People are making connections by the seconds on the platform. 80% of B2B social media leads now comes from LinkedIn. The average LinkedIn user spends 17 minutes on the site per month.

If you are not looking for job directly, but you want to find new customers or opportunities for your products and services, a huge LinkedIn connections of B2B owners is a must; more so, if you have automated software that you can be using to segment people in your connections into different niche markets by their Geodemographic characteristics ( case studies of how to be doing this are explained inside the eBook with real life examples - get the eBook if you can).

Need for an eBook on Geodemographic Database Marketing using LinkedIn

The business concept of LinkedIn is very simple.

If you are going to get a job or sell anything or ask for funding from LinkedIn members (using LinkedIn platform and its communication tools), you should bring your own list of potential clientele in the profession(s) or field(s) of your interests; and use their LinkedIn business tools to be showcasing what you have to offer; and /or how your expertise can help professionals on the platform grow their businesses and make profits. This is what modern Database Marketing is all about.

When you segment and target potential customers on a database by some Geodemographic characteristics such as country, region/province, city, zip code, email, telephone, age, sex, position, occupation, industry, interest, etc., then it is called Geodemographic database marketing.

If you do not have your own Geodemographic database of your clients, you can use LinkedIn’s infrastructure and their existing database of employers, decision makers, managers and businesses owners in your niche market to locate them, and start conversations with them (using email, blog, and other messaging tools available on the platform).
 

Such conversations can initially centered on why they should employ you because of your skills; or why they should fund your idea, innovation, businesses or causes.

 

Challenges faced by many LinkedIn members

Finding the right employers or people of the same interest to help to raise funding for anything however, is a big challenge for many LinkedIn members simply because they are not trained on how to be using the platform for fund raising. If you already have Geodemographic database from your niche market that you want to be targeting, and you have good skills to be bringing them into LinkedIn as contacts of potential fund raisers, you can use LinkedIn tools to find them faster than when you have nothing before you joined LinkedIn to start fund raising. 

This is called Bring You Own Data (BYOD) a principle upon which modern social media like Facebook uses to store millions and even billions of records of people.

To succeed on LinkedIn therefore, initially you must forget about posting or blogging about your skills or fund raising projects, but concentrate on bringing your own database of potential clients, employers or fund raisers to join your network.   

A great deal of the eBook is focused on how to be acquiring Big (millions) of unstructured databases of B2b owners from WHOIS RECORDS as primary source of potential clients to be invited to join your LinkedIn network. You will learn how to be working with raw and unstructured WHOIS records, cleaning and verifying them, before bringing them into LinkedIn platform for  a one-on-one business engagements as shown below.

 

The eBook will help to solve many challenges faced by LinkedIn members

99% of people signing up for LinkedIn account do not have their own databases of potential employers or buyers or fund raisers; and/or the skills to use LinkedIn infrastructure to find the right employers, buyers or fund raisers in their niche markets. Statistics released by Statista in 2016, shows that only 1% of LinkedIn members have on average +10,000 connections or followers.

Most people on LinkedIn make the following excuses as to why the number of their LinkedIn connections don't grow.

1. I don't know how.
2. I don't have the time.
3. I don't have the money.
4. I don't have a mentor.
5. I don't even know where to start.
6. I don't see value in +500 connection

Thus, having a published eBook and accompanying resource web site that teaches people how to leverage LinkedIn for fund raising for example, will be a hit, and a relief for millions of LinkedIn members who comes to  LinkedIn searching for new job openings, or new opportunities or partners to help them to raise funding for anything.

The eBook will cover the following broad areas:

  • Introduction to using LinkedIn to raise funding for anything;
  • Optimization of LinkedIn Profile page to raise funding;
  • Geodemographic database marketing using LinkedIn;
  • Marketing your crowd funding project to your niche B2B owners on LinkedIn;
  • Automating LinkedIn business process with 678LinkedIn-GeoMiner software;
  • Email marketing targeting your 1st, 2nd and 3rd LinkedIn connections;
  • Best ways to blog and publish about your crowd funding ideas on LinkedIn;
  • Case studies of using LinkedIn and Geodemographic segmentation for crowd funding;

Whether you already have a LinkedIn account or need to set up a new one, based on my experience in both Geodemographic database marketing and in growing my LinkedIn connections to +16,000, the eBook will teach you the best LinkedIn database marketing practices to be deploying in order to effectively target the right people who are already using the platform for B2B networking.

In today’s life of social media “your net worth isn't what you own but who you know, and how many people you know that can help you realize your dream.” The more people you know that can help you in whatever you are doing, the more easily for you to reaching your goal. It is a number's game.

 

About myself and experience in using LinkedIn -

 

I am among the 1% Supper connector on LinkedIn

I have been using B2B Geodemographic email databases to build my LinkedIn connections for more the ten months now since September of 2016. By applying my skills in Geodemographic database marketing, my LinkedIn connections has skyrocketed to  over +16,000. This was how I become part of the 1% super connectors of LinkedIn. This was done relatively in a short period since building such huge list of B2B owners and professionals has taken many people years and huge amount of money to complete.

My success lies in my ability to fuse in Big Geodemographic Data Mining tactics into my LinkedIn invitation to connect process.

For Geo-targeting or marketing of anything, LinkedIn is an amazing platform/tool if you know what you are doing, especially if you know how to use it correctly, not just for job searching for employers or hiring prospective employees, but for fund raising too. It has potential to open doors to multiple opportunities and prospective clientele that you can be engaging to do crowd funding for different causes.

This is why I decided to write the eBook about how this can be done primarily for the benefits of those who have great skills or innovative ideas but are finding it difficult to get hired or raise enough money to promote their ideas to the right people (Geodemographic groups) on LinkedIn.

This  unique method of crowd funding using Geodemographic database marketing that I will discussed inside the eBook are not well known in general among online marketers, and particularly, among LinkedIn users. This is simply because, it involves first acquisitions of huge email databases of B2B owners/decision-makers who are already on LinkedIn, and are interested in new opportunities including new ways to source funding for their businesses or ideas. This is then followed by inviting them to join your LinkedIn network in order for them to learn how you are using LinkedIn to do crowd funding for yourself or for other people; and how you can help them to raise funding for their own projects or needs.

......effect of weak job market around the world makes the eBook a must have for those using LinkedIn to search for new opportunities or new sources of funding.

Due to weak job markets across the world, many people rushing to LinkedIn to seek for new opportunities or decent jobs often get easily frustrated and give up too quickly, not because their skills are not in demand, but because many of them are not trained on how to leverage LinkedIn to find their dream jobs or new opportunities, or find the right people that can helped them raise funding for their innovative ideas.

....the truth is that 80% of B2B professionals in the world, and people that matters who can take decision about whether to employ you, or help you to source funding from other people for your project(s) or business or innovation  are on LinkedIn.

Therefore, if you have innovative business idea or product you want to crowd fund, do not be too shy or timid to ask LinkedIn members to help you out. This is because most of them are successful professionals from various fields, some are business owners, CEOs, managers, etc. Many people that I have come in contact with on LinkedIn are very kind and ready to offer help to those who asked.  Many of them too can easily path with few couple of dollars to even 1000s of dollars to support your fund raising drives if you have good business concept provided you are able to pitch them to fund you. 

Benefits of the eBook

The eBook will be of benefits to many people.

  • Anyone in need of funding for anything and want to be targeting 80% of B2B owners that are already on LinkedIn;
  • Unemployed youths looking to attract the right B2B owners on LinkedIn to partner with to raise funding for their innovative startup ideas.
  • Pensioners, retiring seniors, CEOs, MDs, and anyone nearing the age of retirement but will need funding to start self-employment project.
  • Students and parents who will want to pay off their study loans or school fees before they graduate from colleges and universities
  • Digital marketers who takes on roles and responsibilities of marketing fund raising projects on behalf of their clients

Cost of bringing the entire project to life

After many days of careful planning on how to deliver the eBook and organize various resources that readers of the eBook might need, I am now nearing completion of it, and before long the eBook will be ready for consumption (estimated time for delivery is November/December 2017).

I have decided to be in total control of the project, self-publish eBook, page-turning eBook, pdf and epub format for public download and available via:

  • online landing pages for a small fee if they want only the eBook , or
  • pay monthly subscription fee if they want to be trained and have access to use tons of associated resources that I will make available via a protected member only site including my +16k LinkedIn connections to start with;
  • millions of B2B contacts who are likely to be on LinkedIn to connect with,
  • automated Geodemographic data miner software for LinkedIn and
  • video tutorials on how to use the eBook, tools and software discussed inside.

Members can use the resources over and over again for different crowd funding projects once they gain access to my protected area.

I have the knowledge of how to acquire and market to Big Email Databases of B2B. I also have the ability to write clearly, and as well as the drive to make this an amazing "how-to-raise funding on LinkedIn" eBook for use by anyone that joins my LinkedIn connections.

Inside the eBook, I will teach readers all my tricks and help them grow their LinkedIn connections to +15,000 like a pro within matters of months.  

Throughout the eBook, I will divulge the tricks of how to be legally asking millions of B2B owners to fund your projects while at the same time you are inviting them to connect with you on LinkedIn. You will not learn this simple secret from anywhere except from me.

You will also have one of the best third party LinkedIn business automating tool, which will enable you to be asking  2nd and 3rd degree connections to be raising fund for your projects, businesses, innovative idea or even to paying off your study loan.

 

What I need & what you get

I will be fronting all the costs, eBook design, stunning online web page (Landing Page), hosting, and affiliate software. I need your help with this part. It will cost about $15,000 to bring the entire project to life, I need some upfront capital to make this happen.

You can order the eBook  upfront as a perk. You will also be able to pay for a 1 year access to download all the associated resources like +20million database of B2B owners that are likely to be on LinkedIn and will be interested in funding your projects.

Other levels of involvement that will be available  include re-seller links to only those who initially contributed in helping me to reach my funding goal. They will be able to resell the eBook or have access to resources attached to the eBook and earn 50% on resales.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In the event the funding goal is not reached by the end of November, backers will still have access to their bonuses and I will continue to market the project via my LinkedIn profile page. Therefore, I invite you to join me on LinkedIn and help to share the promotion of the eBook to your connections as well, My LinkedIn address is at: https://www.linkedin.com/in/doherein/

Having been 5 years in development, this book is set to be released by Hertfordshire Press, a small British publishing house dedicated to the 'Stans. Pre-order your copy here!

If you would like to donate more -- and receive more -- than what's offered here, please contact Hertfordshire Press' office: publisher@ocamagazine.com

 

The Land Drenched in Tears: East Turkestan Tragedy

 

The Land Drenched in Tears is a moving history of the tumultuous years of modern China under Mao’s rule, witnessed, experienced, and told through the personal lens of an ethnic minority woman, who endured nearly 20 years imprisonment and surveillance regime as a result of her political activism in Xinjiang, or East Turkistan, located in the far west of China.

 

Writing her autobiography as an extraordinary melange of diary and memoir, which oscillates between first-hand narrative and flashback, the author, Söyüngül Chanisheff, traces her unfortunate youth from her university years, when she founded the East Turkistan People’s Party as a result of her anger and frustration with communist China’s devastating mishandling of the socio-economic life of the people of her native land, through her subsequent imprisonment in China’s notorious labour camps as well as under the surveillance regime, to her emigration to Australia.

 

Chanisheff’s autobiography is a rare, detailed, and authentic account of one of the most poignant and most fascinating periods of modern China. It is a microcosmic reflection of the communist regime’s tragic realities presented through the suffering and hope of a young woman who tied her fate to that of her beloved homeland. By boldly exploring hidden territories of modern Chinese history, it not only invites the reader to contemplate the universal topics, such as the relationship between citizen and state as well as between ethnic minority and majority, but also encourages similar stories to be told from our troubled contemporary world. This book is highly recommended for anyone who seeks to gain a deeper understanding of the many issues contemporary China faces.

 

*The Land Drenched in Tears was translated from Uyghur by London-based Uyghur translator and singer Rahima Mahmut. Having received English PEN Translates grant in May 2017, it will be published by Hertfordshire Press at the end of the same year.

story:
Un sito dove la poesia prende voce, suono e immagini

"Sono Roberta. Da sempre sono appassionata di poesia ma solo da poco tempo mi sono anche permessa di scriverne alcune. Quella che vedete sopra è l'immagine di copertina del mio primo libro di poesie, che è stato per me una conquista, un misto purissimo e coinvolgente di sollievo e felicità.

Avvicinandomi finalmente alla poesia, mi sono però presto resa conto che, di questi tempi, fatti di social media e audiovideo, la poesia è rimasta come la conoscevo dalla mia scuola: per lo più scritta nero su bianco, relegata alla sola carta stampata.

Da questa considerazione è nato il progetto Poetiamo: voglio creare un sito di poesie recitate e dotate di commento sonoro e visivo."


Di cosa abbiamo bisogno

Quelle di prima erano mie parole, che venivano dal cuore, veniamo ora alle questioni tecniche. È giusto precisare fin da subito che Poetiamo è già un’associazione culturale senza fini di lucro: crediamo e vogliamo che la cultura sia per tutti. Tutti gli eventuali guadagni derivanti dalla gestione del sito verranno reinvestiti nel sito stesso o devoluti a cause da definirsi.

Ora però si tratta di raccogliere i fondi per creare la struttura profonda del sito Poetiamo, stringere accordi di collaborazione con speaker e sale di registrazione, abbonarsi a database di immagini, audio e video.

Il nostro obiettivo è di raccogliere 10mila euro, per consentire la creazione del sito e garantirci almeno il primo anno della sua gestione completa.


Come potete contribuire

Con una donazione di 10 euro avrete il vostro nome nella pagina Sostenitori di Poetiamo, per sempre.

Con una donazione di 100 euro avrete per sempre il vostro nome nella pagina Sostenitori di Poetiamo, inoltre sceglierete una breve poesia o parte di una più lunga e Poetiamo le darà voce e la illustrerà in audio e video per voi, mettendola fra le prime che verranno pubblicate sul sito.

Con una donazione di 1.000 euro avrete il vostro nome o il marchio della vostra azienda nella pagina Sponsor di Poetiamo, insieme a una qualificante presenza pubblicitaria sul sito stesso, in posizioni e durate ancora da definirsi.


Cosa faremo coi vostri contributi

Nel sito Poetiamo verrà data voce alle poesie, le si registrerà e si aggiungerà un commento audio o musicale, di video o immagini.

La parola scritta lascerà il foglio bianco di stampa per essere recitata da voci amatoriali o professionali.

Commenti sonori e musicali, insieme a immagini o scene video, aumenteranno la profondità dei significati dei testi poetici e la densità delle emozioni che si possono provare con la loro sola lettura.


Come funzionerà Poetiamo

Su Poetiamo chiunque potrà pubblicare una poesia, o leggerla, o commentarla con immagini e video, suoni e musica.

Tutto questo potrà essere fatto in completa autonomia ma sempre autorizzato alla pubblicazione da un competente staff direttivo.

A pieno regime, il sito offrirà anche la possibilità di vedere le proprie poesie, o quelle dei nostri autori preferiti, speakerate e “illustrate” in audio e video con il contributo di doppiatori, montatori e registi amatoriali o professionisti, il tutto con formule di costo molto sostenibili e alla portata, che andranno dal meramente simbolico al molto contenuto.


Cosa si otterrà con Poetiamo

La poesia prenderà voce, suono e immagini.

Amanti e appassionati della poesia troveranno un luogo a loro dedicato.

Si aumenterà la diffusione, la conoscenza, l’apprezzamento e la sensibilità nei confronti della poesia, con immagini e musiche, video e commenti sonori, le si farà incontrare la modernità.


Un altro modo per aiutarci

E se non potete contribuire con denaro? Va bene lo stesso! Se volete proporvi per speakerare o montare in audiovideo od offrire un commento sonoro originale per una o più poesie, fatevi sotto! Resteremo in contatto, sarete aggiornati come tutti qui su Indiegogo dello sviluppo del progetto e ci risentiremo quando saremo operativi, per mettervi alla prova e magari aggiungervi ai nostri contributori volontari. Insomma, se sapete "mettere le mani in pasta", con Poetiamo le metterete anche in poesia...

story:
WHO AM I ? My name is Keith Leon S., and I am a multiple bestselling author, speaker, and book publisher. On Aug 20th my book ,Walking With My Angels: A True Story, will launch and I will officially be out of the angel closet! I will embark on a year-long book/media/speaking tour, and I would love YOU to be one of our tour supporters!

WHY NOW ? If ever there was a time that we needed to hear some GOOD NEWS, it's now. If ever there was a time to be guided by our inner knowing (guardian angels), it's NOW. More people believe in angels than ever before on this planet. I will teach you how to get direct access to your angels.  

WHAT'S THE BOOK ABOUT ? 

Thirty years ago, Keith Leon S. received a message from angels. He was told that he would write a book that would change lives. Anyone who held this book in their hands would be raised to their next level of vibration. Finally, here it is.

This is the true story of a man whose life was spared over and over again with the help of his angels. He has witnessed miracles. He has witnessed time reverse. The stories of his adventures with his angels are thrilling, as well as being full of humor and wonder.

Now, Keith is on a mission to introduce you to your heavenly helpers in this, a pivotal time in history.

In this book, you will:

  • Discover That There Are Earthbound Angels Among Us
  • Get Tools to Communicate With Your Own Angels and Guides
  • Learn How to Open Your Heart and Create Miracles in Your Life
  • Read About the Author’s Unconventional Path to Living His Purpose
  • Receive Insights to Reveal Your Life’s Path and Purpose

WHERE DOES THE MONEY GO? 

The $200,000 raised in this campaign will allow us to...

  • Hire a PR agent to book TV & Radio Spots Nationwide (Press Releases, etc.) 
  • Hire Road (Tour) Manager
  • Hire a Full Time Driver / Personal Assistant
  • Shoot a documentary film while on the tour  
  • Post-production for the documentary film (shot during the tour) 
  • Rent an RV or SUV (and pay gasoline)
  • Run an International Bestselling Book Campaign!

HOW CAN YOU HELP? Have a look at the perks, decide which level of contribution you’d like to participate at… and, know that I appreciate your support no matter which level you choose. CLICK EACH PERK TO SEE ITS FULL DESCRIPTION ---->

  • You can order just the book! 
  • You can get the book + other great books.
  • You can get a mention in the acknowledgement section of the book.
  • Or, even get an Executive Producer Credit in the film. 
  • There are so many great ways to participate and make a difference in the lives of others with your contribution.

Going on the road for a year is quite a commitment, and it takes money! 

THE IMPACT:

I've been writing books, speaking, publishing other peoples books, and making a difference in the lives of others for over 15 years. Our publishing company is well established and trusted in the industry. I've done short tours and spoken all over the world. Never have I got to go out for a full year. I cannot tell you how excited I am! I may run into challenges and hurdles I know nothing about (being on the road for a year), and I am ready to meet those hurdles and get through them. 

The timing could not be more perfect for this book, as fear and hopelessness are running rampant in our culture. There is a constant presence of uncertainty. People feel more alone now than ever before.  This is a pivotal time in history. Fear is sold to us daily through the media, TV commercials, the news and politics. 

I am on a mission to bring joy and hope into the lives of everyone I meet, and everyone who reads this book. My books and live events will bring people together, and provide tools to get access to the answers that lie within. 

Your participation in this campaign will help me to make a difference in hundreds of thousands (potentially millions) of lives! You will make a difference, while supporting me making a difference. 

What others are saying about this book: 

“This book will inspire you to open your heart to all possibilities. If you don’t believe in angels now, you may before you complete this book. If you do believe in angels, miracles might happen with the knowledge you’ll gain. Who knows?” —Jack Canfield, co-author of the Chicken Soup for the Soul Series 

“Angels? I was skeptical at first, but this book is GREAT! I admit, I have angels too, and so do you!” —Joe Vitale, Bestselling Author, Musician, and Featured Teacher from The Secret

“How refreshing to see a successful businessman, and an all-around regular guy, sharing something that the average person might see as whimsical fantasy.” —Jill Lublin, 4 x Bestselling Author, International Speaker, and Radical Influence Expert

How else can you help?

  • Share this campaign with your Facebook/Twitter/Instagram/LinkedIn tribe. 
  • Tell friends and family members about it, and ask them to pre-purchase the book.
  • Gift a perk to someone you care about, who might not otherwise buy an angel book.
  • Use the Indigogo share tools to help us spread the word. 
  • Contact us if you have an RV you would like to donate for the tour, or for part of the tour.
  • Introduce us to companies you think might like to sponsor a tour like this one.
  • Purchase the soft cover book on Amazon, August 20th (launch day), and help the book become a NY Times Bestseller.

Thank you in advance for your support of this launch. I look forward to meeting you, and signing your book at one of our events. I will leave you with these important words...

You make a difference in this world! It would not be the same without you. People often forget to tell us how we've made a difference in their lives. Every smile, hug, or even a simple hello makes a difference. Your hello may have saved a life, because the person you said it to didn't think anyone saw them. For all the people who have forgotten to tell you... let me tell you now. You make a difference. Thank you for being the gift of you. 

Blessings,

Keith Leon S.

WHERE DOES THE MONEY GO? The $200,000 raised in this campaign will allow us to...
Hire a PR agent to book TV & Radio Spots Nationwide (Press Releases, etc.) 
Hire Road (Tour) Manager
Hire a Full Time Driver / Personal Assistant
Shoot a documentary film while on the tour  
Post-production for the documentary film (shot during the tour) 
Rent an RV or SUV (and pay gasoline)
Run an International Bestselling Book Campaign!
HOW CAN YOU HELP? Have a look at the perks, decide which level of contribution you’d like to participate at… and, know that I appreciate your support no matter which level you choose. CLICK EACH PERK TO SEE ITS FULL DESCRIPTION ---->
You can order just the book! 
You can get the book + other great books.
You can get a mention in the acknowledgement section of the book.
Or, even get an Executive Producer Credit in the film. 
There are so many great ways to participate and make a difference in the lives of others with your contribution.
Going on the road for a year is quite a commitment, and it takes money! THE IMPACT: I've been writing books, speaking, publishing other peoples books, and making a difference in the lives of others for over 15 years. Our publishing company is well established and trusted in the industry. I've done short tours and spoken all over the world. Never have I got to go out for a full year. I cannot tell you how excited I am! I may run into challenges and hurdles I know nothing about (being on the road for a year), and I am ready to meet those hurdles and get through them. The timing could not be more perfect for this book, as fear and hopelessness are running rampant in our culture. There is a constant presence of uncertainty. People feel more alone now than ever before.  This is a pivotal time in history. Fear is sold to us daily through the media, TV commercials, the news and politics. I am on a mission to bring joy and hope into the lives of everyone I meet, and everyone who reads this book. My books and live events will bring people together, and provide tools to get access to the answers that lie within. Your participation in this campaign will help me to make a difference in hundreds of thousands (potentially millions) of lives! You will make a difference, while supporting me making a difference. What others are saying about this book: “This book will inspire you to open your heart to all possibilities. If you don’t believe in angels now, you may before you complete this book. If you do believe in angels, miracles might happen with the knowledge you’ll gain. Who knows?” —Jack Canfield, co-author of the Chicken Soup for the Soul Series “Angels? I was skeptical at first, but this book is GREAT! I admit, I have angels too, and so do you!” —Joe Vitale, Bestselling Author, Musician, and Featured Teacher from The Secret“How refreshing to see a successful businessman, and an all-around regular guy, sharing something that the average person might see as whimsical fantasy.” —Jill Lublin, 4 x Bestselling Author, International Speaker, and Radical Influence ExpertHow else can you help?
Share this campaign with your Facebook/Twitter/Instagram/LinkedIn tribe. 
Tell friends and family members about it, and ask them to pre-purchase the book.
Gift a perk to someone you care about, who might not otherwise buy an angel book.
Use the Indigogo share tools to help us spread the word. 
Contact us if you have an RV you would like to donate for the tour, or for part of the tour.
Introduce us to companies you think might like to sponsor a tour like this one.
Purchase the soft cover book on Amazon, August 20th (launch day), and help the book become a NY Times Bestseller.
Thank you in advance for your support of this launch. I look forward to meeting you, and signing your book at one of our events. I will leave you with these important words...You make a difference in this world! It would not be the same without you. People often forget to tell us how we've made a difference in their lives. Every smile, hug, or even a simple hello makes a difference. Your hello may have saved a life, because the person you said it to didn't think anyone saw them. For all the people who have forgotten to tell you... let me tell you now. You make a difference. Thank you for being the gift of you. Blessings,Keith Leon S.

story:
Short Summary

WINTER WINDS DESCEND UPON FÓSTRA, COVERING IT IN BITTER FROST.
THE GOD OF ICE ASSERTS HIS DOMINION OVER ALL LANDS.

An orc, born a slave, rises from the snow to claim a destiny greater than anything he can possibly imagine.

The kingdoms of Fóstra are divided by prejudice and petty feuds, leaving them vulnerable to the scheming of darker powers. Children freeze in their mother’s arms, and men die fighting in countless wars. When the one artifact that could save them from this ancient evil is taken, the good races of Fóstra must band together to take it back. But the ancient beliefs are all but forgotten, leaving too few heroes to rise to the realm’s defense. Still, Ruth Ilsallar, prince of Grindall, must try for the sake of all life, for hope may be found in the most unlikely of places. Through blood and ice, every legend has a beginning…

***Chapter Sample***
Keep in mind that this is not the final edit of the chapter sample!
 https://drive.google.com/file/d/12McotWoJkwDuuh...

BEAR IN MIND THAT NONE OF THE COVER DESIGNS ARE IN THEIR FINAL STAGE YET. THE GRAPHIC DESIGN FEATURED ON COVERS/TEIRS IS NOT THE FINAL DESIGN.

Above Image is the artwork that will be used for Narbad Strongheart sticker and t-shirt.
Art by Andrey Vasilchenko 

BRING THIS EPIC DARK FANTASY BOOK FULL OF GRATUITOUS VIOLENCE, LAYERED CHARACTERS, AND CONTEMPTIBLE POLITICAL SCHEMING TO PRINTED LIFE! ONLY THROUGH YOU, IS THIS POSSIBLE!

I, S. R. Mowry, am the author of the Legends of Fóstra series. I've published one book (Saga V: The Silvan Mist) already in my book series--Though you don't have to have read that book to understand this one--so you know I will get the book done. In fact, the book already is done! The Veil of Stars is 100% complete. Having gone through over 12 rounds of editing by professionals and fans, it is a masterpiece, and the physical book quality will be nothing short of exquisite. I have poured hundreds and HUNDREDS of hours into making sure this book is the best it can be. THAT IS RIGHT! ONCE FUNDED, THERE WILL BE NO SUPER LONG WAIT TO GET YOUR PERKS LIKE SO MANY OTHER CAMPAIGNS. So help make this high school history teacher's dream of joining the ranks of authors like J. R. R. Tolkien, George R. R. Martin, and R. A. Salvatore.

By backing this project you will receive an amazing book, extra goodies like bookmarks and prints, and help bring my passions to life. The truth is, I LOVE writing fantasy and I love my characters. I love writing stories and developing these fictional people that I've become so attached to. Writing epic combat scenes, emotionally engaging conversations, and thought-provoking circumstances are SO FUN. I know it sounds cliche, but I love doing more than anything else in the world, and I want to share this epic joy with all of you! So, please back this campaign. Some perks will cost you less than a single meal at Wendy's.

Also, there will be two $25 Amazon gift cards that will be awarded to THREE RANDOM BACKERS... so yeah... you could theoretically (potentially) make money off of backing this project.

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

We need a minimum of $3,000 to fund the printing of this book (I will count any money made from our website to this number as well). Anything beyond that (up to $6,000) would help offset the illustration and formatting costs.

Perks (aka, what you get):       

***Backing this project through indiegogo guarantees access to the book weeks before official release! Some items below are exclusive to this campaign.***

GLIMPSE AT THE VISUAL COMPANION!

 

Link to the personality quiz:

https://woobox.com/aj2zz8

 

The Impact

I honestly feel that this book is a needed contribution to the Fantasy genre. My style is rather unique. It is a blend between R. A. Salvatore's combat writing, J. R. R. Tolkien's world-building and nature descriptions, and George R. R. Martin's talent for graphic violence and detailed character descriptions. I feel that I take the best of all three uniquely and put it on the page in a manner that is engaging, new yet loyal to the genre, and fun.

I have already published a book before, and the reviews are almost 100% positive. You can find it at: www.mistwoodpublishing.com for as cheap as 0.99 cents.
This is a website and company that I have built myself. I do all the design, shipping, and writing. I bring a zeal to this campaign that few others possess. I am extremely dedicated to this, and I am a proven author. I already have Saga II (and IV oddly enough) written and in the second draft phase.

Long story short, I mean business and I am here to succeed... or fail and fail till I die.

Risks & Challenges

There is the likelihood that the campaign will fail and we will not reach our goal. If that is the case, you will be refunded and I plan to try again in the winter. The hope is that it will not come to that, however.

To fight off this risk, I am giving this campaign 100%. I am increasing activity on all social media accounts, making as many youtube videos a week as I humanly can while working full time and juggling everything else with this project, sending emails, talking to people, building connections with groups like comicsgate or writingcommunity, and trying to get the word out there every day on as many platforms as I can. Exposure, exposure, exposure.

More art by Andrey Vasilchenko

Other Ways You Can Help

Look, some people simply don't have the money. I get that (I'm a teacher, remember?). If you can't back the project but you still want to help... please spread the word. You might just get us another backer or two. The importance of spreading the word cannot be understated. It is essential, for at the end of the day, I can only reach so many people. Chances are, I don't know the same people you know. Who knows, you might make the difference in this campaign by being a sharing champion!

story:
UPDATE 24 Feb 21: Now that the leather problems have been sorted out at the bindery, we've decided to do one final printing of the Talhoffer and Fiore facsimiles. That will happen after Lecküchner is finished so as not to delay this project. I've added appropriate perks; the price of the Fiore has gone up to $200 to cover the cost of smaller supply orders. (Unlike Kickstarter, there are no perk upgrades on Indiegogo, so you just order these perks in addition to the one you already chose.)

----

It's been six months since the launch of the Fiore facsimile campaign, and we plan to do another one every six months going forward.

tl;dr

We're reproducing the massive (434 page) illustrated manuscript of Hans Lecküchner. This time we're doing two different versions, both of which will have the same high-resolution scans at their original size (207 × 300 mm; ~8 × 12 in).

  • One will be a near-perfect replica of the manuscript, including a half-leather bind with authentic Medieval tooling and exposed beechwood covers, gilded edges on the pages, the exact quire structure of the original, and other such details. This costs $350.
  • The other one is a simplified version that's as inexpensive as I can make it. It will also be a half-leather bind, but without tooling and with linen covered bookboard rather than beech; the pages won't be gilded, the quire structure won't be replicated, and in general it will be a nice book rather than a replica (pretty similar to the Talhoffer we did two years ago). This costs $200.

To make this happen, we need to sell a minimum of 100 of the wooden facsimile and 150 of the linen edition (or, I guess, 250 of the wooden one).

Background

My name is Michael Chidester. I started HEMA in 2001, and for the past eleven years, I've been leading a project called Wiktenauer. Wiktenauer grew out of a desire to set the text of our fencing manuals free from the page and put it into the hands of fencers. What I'd like to do with this project is different: put the page, and the whole book, into your hands as well. We're going to produce a full facsimile of one of the most important and beautiful 15th century fencing treatises, the copy of Kunst des Messerfechtens held by the Bavarian State Library in historic München, Germany (Cgm 582).

Facsimile is a word that's thrown around a lot, and means different things to different people. What I mean when I use it is a careful reproduction of the entire physical book in detail. In other words, it's a book you can pick up and touch without endangering something priceless, but which will at least half-convince you that you're holding the original.


Comparing the Orbis Pictus facsimile of the Krakow Gladiatoria to the New Haven Gladiatoria manuscript.

At various times, I have had the privilege of handling several 15th and 16th century fencing manuscripts, as well as copies of most of the printed fencing manuals published before 1600, and I wish everyone in HEMA could have that same chance. It's a way of connecting to history that's hard to describe.

In 2019, I started producing facsimiles of fencing manuscripts to try to capture at least a small piece of that magic, and give you a sense of what the origin of our fencing reconstruction really is. Each of them is contains lessons about fencing, and also about the cultures and ideas that produced them. So far, we've done the Copenhagen Talhoffer manuscript and the Getty's Fiore manuscript.

Now we're taking on the biggest project yet: Hans Lecküchner's masterpiece.

What We Need & What You Get

The Lecküchner facsimile will be our most ambitious facsimile yet. The manuscript Cgm 582 contains the most lavish and extensive fencing treatise of the 15th century, and at 217 folia (434 pages), one of the longest treatises in the entire Liechtenauer tradition. It is also a beautiful book, with over four hundred painted illustrations, exposed wooden boards, and gilded page edges.


Cover and foreedge of Cgm 582.

We will be turning one again to Grimm Book Bindery of Madison, WI to do the actual book construction.

The covers of our facsimile will be made of riftsawn beech, which is the material used almost universally in continental Medieval manuscripts. The leather will be pigskin, which is the typical material for 15th century Germany. (It's been pointed out to me that that might result in religious or ethical problems for some people, so if you don't want to handle pig, please reach out and we'll be sure to bind yours in goat or a synthetic leather substitute.)


Sample boards in oak and beech.

Unfortunately, the cover it currently has is not original—it was rebound in the 1960s and the library has no information about what the original cover looked like, except that it was also a half-bind with exposed boards. Medieval half-binds would have blind tooling on the leather, so to replicate that I found another half-leather bind from Nuremberg in 1481, the Folger Shakespeare Library's manuscript INC P700, and we'll be basing the tooling design on that.


Cover and spine of Folger ms. INC P700.

Inside of these wooden covers we'll be printing beautiful high-resolution scans onto cotton rag paper of the correct size (207 × 300 mm; ~8 × 12 in), and built with the same quire structure as the original manuscript. The edges will be gilded like the original, though sadly, no one we've talked to seems to know how to reproduce the faint pattern etched into the gold on the edges (see above).


Folio 112v from Cgm 582.

In the world of manuscript facsimiles, the cheapest entries start at maybe $500, and the expensive ones can cost $20,000 or more. I started these projects with the question of whether they could be made much cheaper.

The Ⅰ.33 and Gladiatoria facsimiles (produced by other companies several years ago) cost $800-1500, whereas my Talhoffer facsimile was just $150. With the Fiore, we tried to make an even more exact replica that any of those three, and the price crept up to $175.

For the Lecküchner facsimile, details like wooden covers and special quires—and the plain fact that it's half again as long as Talhoffer and five times as long as Fiore—have driven the cost up much further. The facsimile I just described will cost $350.

However, the spirit of the project has always been to put facsimiles into as many hands as possible, so I've worked with the bindery to design a simplified version. This one will do the much simpler tooling seen on the current cover above (5 vertical lines), replace the wooden boards with linen-covered bookboard of the same thickness, and will not attempt to replicate the quire structure or edge gilding.

This will no longer be a replica of the original manuscript, but will still be a nice book and comparable to the Talhoffer facsimile we did two years ago (and, we could argue, is within the range of what rebound Medieval manuscripts sometimes look like). This will cost $200.

The Talhoffer project turned into an accidental two-tier scheme when we decided to offer a single parchment covered copy for an extra $200. The Fiore did as well when we added optional gold ink for $170 and edge gilding for $30.

This time we're starting with that end in mind, but in order for this project to be viable, we need to sell at least 250 copies, of which a minimum of 100 need to be the wooden book.

Other Stuff

First, we're not charging shipping up front. In the last two projects, the shipping market (and shipping costs) changed drastically between the campaign and the actual distribution. This time, we're going to wait until the books are ready and then charge shipping—ideally the postal apocalypse will have ended by then and shipping costs drop again. This will also allow us to offer you a variety of shipping speeds from different services, which Indiegogo doesn't allow.

Second, there will be another companion volume! For the Talhoffer project, we put together a book of research on topics related to Talhoffer, including contributions by seven authors. The Talhoffer companion volume was universally praised, and Bill Grandy (head of VAF's HEMA program) called it the most important HEMA book of the past few years.

For this companion volume, we have ten authors lined up and we're going to try to outdo ourselves. This time we're not going to bundle it as a perk add-on (which confused a lot of people in the Talhoffer campaign). Instead, we'll send you a link where you can purchase it directly when it's ready. Stay tuned for more updates on the contents as the campaign proceeds.

Finally, why are we doing this now, when less than half of the Fiore books have shipped? Because this is a giant, complicated logistical machine. All of these books are paid for up-front, so the bindery won't start working on the books until after I have raised the money. In addition, the wood supplier needs at least a month to produce the wooden boards (and also won't start until we have the money), so the bindery can't produce a complete test book until at least a month after the fundraiser ends.

I want to launch two facsimile projects this year, so the second project needs to start in August, and with one month needed to make the covers and about three months to produce the books once I approve the prototype, that means if we want to be done in July we need to start now. Heck, we should have started on February 1st, but working out the details of the inexpensive book delayed us a week.

Risks & Challenges

Most details of the Lecküchner facsimile are based on previous work in the Talhoffer and Fiore facsimiles, so there won't be many surprises. The part we haven't tried before is wooden covers, but the bindery assures me they know how to make it work.

The bigger risk is that we won't get enough orders for the expensive replica books. The quotes from the bindery rely on a minimum of 100 orders of the wooden book and 150 orders of the linen book. If we reach the last day of the campaign without hitting both goals, then no matter how much money we raise, I'm going to have to cancel the campaign and refund everyone's money.

And the pandemic itself remains an issue which makes business unpredictable. The shipping industry is in disarray, and the threat of shutdowns for nonessential businesses (like, say, binderies) has not passed. If the plague flares up again, all timelines are off, we probably won't be able to do a second facsimile this year, and all we can promise is that we'll do our best to get you your books as soon as we can.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute to this project, please spread the word anyway. We received about 400 orders each for the Talhoffer and Fiore facsimiles, so let's see if there are at least that many Liechtenauer enthusiasts out there!

Please share this campaign with your clubs, with your friends, and on social media!

Praise for the Talhoffer Facsimile

"The Talhoffer reconstruction that Michael Chidester has spearheaded and produced is nothing short of magnificent. Its quality is quite high and exactly what you would expect for the price, and the experience of paging through a manuscript is invaluable for researchers of fight books. I plan to purchase each edition as they come out, even if the book is outside my typical study, and recommend you do the same."

~ Jess Finley, author of Medieval Wrestling

"As the author and publisher of several translation/editions, there is something uniquely magical about holding an exact facsimile of a 600 year old book, no additions or alterations. Michael has worked hard to bring just that in an affordable edition with his recent Talhoffer, and it is a delight to behold. I am excited to build a collection of all the volumes that follow."

~ Greg Mele, co-author and editor of the Flowers of Battle series

"It's frickin' amazing. I just spent half an hour drooling over every page... and wishing I had the armor... and the carts!"

~ Jake Norwood, the guy who named Wiktenauer

"Producing a top-quality hand-bound facsimile is a challenging project, but Michael Chidester’s Talhoffer reproduction exceeded my expectations in quality and in the speed of execution, producing extraordinary book for a very low price. I’ll treasure it forever. He was also unusually efficient at keeping his backers informed of the inevitable Corona-related hitches along the way. I am 100% confident in backing his Getty Manuscript facsimile campaign, because I know he can and will deliver."

~ Guy Windsor, itinerant swordsman and author of many books about Fiore

Facsimile is a word that's thrown around a lot, and means different things to different people. What I mean when I use it is a careful reproduction of the entire physical book in detail. In other words, it's a book you can pick up and touch without endangering something priceless, but which will at least half-convince you that you're holding the original.
Comparing the Orbis Pictus facsimile of the Krakow Gladiatoria to the New Haven Gladiatoria manuscript.
At various times, I have had the privilege of handling several 15th and 16th century fencing manuscripts, as well as copies of most of the printed fencing manuals published before 1600, and I wish everyone in HEMA could have that same chance. It's a way of connecting to history that's hard to describe.
In 2019, I started producing facsimiles of fencing manuscripts to try to capture at least a small piece of that magic, and give you a sense of what the origin of our fencing reconstruction really is. Each of them is contains lessons about fencing, and also about the cultures and ideas that produced them. So far, we've done the Copenhagen Talhoffer manuscript and the Getty's Fiore manuscript.
Now we're taking on the biggest project yet: Hans Lecküchner's masterpiece.

What We Need & What You Get
The Lecküchner facsimile will be our most ambitious facsimile yet. The manuscript Cgm 582 contains the most lavish and extensive fencing treatise of the 15th century, and at 217 folia (434 pages), one of the longest treatises in the entire Liechtenauer tradition. It is also a beautiful book, with over four hundred painted illustrations, exposed wooden boards, and gilded page edges.
Cover and foreedge of Cgm 582.
We will be turning one again to Grimm Book Bindery of Madison, WI to do the actual book construction.
The covers of our facsimile will be made of riftsawn beech, which is the material used almost universally in continental Medieval manuscripts. The leather will be pigskin, which is the typical material for 15th century Germany. (It's been pointed out to me that that might result in religious or ethical problems for some people, so if you don't want to handle pig, please reach out and we'll be sure to bind yours in goat or a synthetic leather substitute.)
Sample boards in oak and beech.
Unfortunately, the cover it currently has is not original—it was rebound in the 1960s and the library has no information about what the original cover looked like, except that it was also a half-bind with exposed boards. Medieval half-binds would have blind tooling on the leather, so to replicate that I found another half-leather bind from Nuremberg in 1481, the Folger Shakespeare Library's manuscript INC P700, and we'll be basing the tooling design on that.
Cover and spine of Folger ms. INC P700.
Inside of these wooden covers we'll be printing beautiful high-resolution scans onto cotton rag paper of the correct size (207 × 300 mm; ~8 × 12 in), and built with the same quire structure as the original manuscript. The edges will be gilded like the original, though sadly, no one we've talked to seems to know how to reproduce the faint pattern etched into the gold on the edges (see above).
Folio 112v from Cgm 582.
In the world of manuscript facsimiles, the cheapest entries start at maybe $500, and the expensive ones can cost $20,000 or more. I started these projects with the question of whether they could be made much cheaper.
The Ⅰ.33 and Gladiatoria facsimiles (produced by other companies several years ago) cost $800-1500, whereas my Talhoffer facsimile was just $150. With the Fiore, we tried to make an even more exact replica that any of those three, and the price crept up to $175.
For the Lecküchner facsimile, details like wooden covers and special quires—and the plain fact that it's half again as long as Talhoffer and five times as long as Fiore—have driven the cost up much further. The facsimile I just described will cost $350.
However, the spirit of the project has always been to put facsimiles into as many hands as possible, so I've worked with the bindery to design a simplified version. This one will do the much simpler tooling seen on the current cover above (5 vertical lines), replace the wooden boards with linen-covered bookboard of the same thickness, and will not attempt to replicate the quire structure or edge gilding.
This will no longer be a replica of the original manuscript, but will still be a nice book and comparable to the Talhoffer facsimile we did two years ago (and, we could argue, is within the range of what rebound Medieval manuscripts sometimes look like). This will cost $200.
The Talhoffer project turned into an accidental two-tier scheme when we decided to offer a single parchment covered copy for an extra $200. The Fiore did as well when we added optional gold ink for $170 and edge gilding for $30.
This time we're starting with that end in mind, but in order for this project to be viable, we need to sell at least 250 copies, of which a minimum of 100 need to be the wooden book.

Other Stuff
First, we're not charging shipping up front. In the last two projects, the shipping market (and shipping costs) changed drastically between the campaign and the actual distribution. This time, we're going to wait until the books are ready and then charge shipping—ideally the postal apocalypse will have ended by then and shipping costs drop again. This will also allow us to offer you a variety of shipping speeds from different services, which Indiegogo doesn't allow.
Second, there will be another companion volume! For the Talhoffer project, we put together a book of research on topics related to Talhoffer, including contributions by seven authors. The Talhoffer companion volume was universally praised, and Bill Grandy (head of VAF's HEMA program) called it the most important HEMA book of the past few years.
For this companion volume, we have ten authors lined up and we're going to try to outdo ourselves. This time we're not going to bundle it as a perk add-on (which confused a lot of people in the Talhoffer campaign). Instead, we'll send you a link where you can purchase it directly when it's ready. Stay tuned for more updates on the contents as the campaign proceeds.

Finally, why are we doing this now, when less than half of the Fiore books have shipped? Because this is a giant, complicated logistical machine. All of these books are paid for up-front, so the bindery won't start working on the books until after I have raised the money. In addition, the wood supplier needs at least a month to produce the wooden boards (and also won't start until we have the money), so the bindery can't produce a complete test book until at least a month after the fundraiser ends.
I want to launch two facsimile projects this year, so the second project needs to start in August, and with one month needed to make the covers and about three months to produce the books once I approve the prototype, that means if we want to be done in July we need to start now. Heck, we should have started on February 1st, but working out the details of the inexpensive book delayed us a week.

Risks & Challenges
Most details of the Lecküchner facsimile are based on previous work in the Talhoffer and Fiore facsimiles, so there won't be many surprises. The part we haven't tried before is wooden covers, but the bindery assures me they know how to make it work.
The bigger risk is that we won't get enough orders for the expensive replica books. The quotes from the bindery rely on a minimum of 100 orders of the wooden book and 150 orders of the linen book. If we reach the last day of the campaign without hitting both goals, then no matter how much money we raise, I'm going to have to cancel the campaign and refund everyone's money.
And the pandemic itself remains an issue which makes business unpredictable. The shipping industry is in disarray, and the threat of shutdowns for nonessential businesses (like, say, binderies) has not passed. If the plague flares up again, all timelines are off, we probably won't be able to do a second facsimile this year, and all we can promise is that we'll do our best to get you your books as soon as we can.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can't contribute to this project, please spread the word anyway. We received about 400 orders each for the Talhoffer and Fiore facsimiles, so let's see if there are at least that many Liechtenauer enthusiasts out there!
Please share this campaign with your clubs, with your friends, and on social media!

Praise for the Talhoffer Facsimile
"The Talhoffer reconstruction that Michael Chidester has spearheaded and produced is nothing short of magnificent. Its quality is quite high and exactly what you would expect for the price, and the experience of paging through a manuscript is invaluable for researchers of fight books. I plan to purchase each edition as they come out, even if the book is outside my typical study, and recommend you do the same."
~ Jess Finley, author of Medieval Wrestling
"As the author and publisher of several translation/editions, there is something uniquely magical about holding an exact facsimile of a 600 year old book, no additions or alterations. Michael has worked hard to bring just that in an affordable edition with his recent Talhoffer, and it is a delight to behold. I am excited to build a collection of all the volumes that follow."
~ Greg Mele, co-author and editor of the Flowers of Battle series
"It's frickin' amazing. I just spent half an hour drooling over every page... and wishing I had the armor... and the carts!"
~ Jake Norwood, the guy who named Wiktenauer
"Producing a top-quality hand-bound facsimile is a challenging project, but Michael Chidester’s Talhoffer reproduction exceeded my expectations in quality and in the speed of execution, producing extraordinary book for a very low price. I’ll treasure it forever. He was also unusually efficient at keeping his backers informed of the inevitable Corona-related hitches along the way. I am 100% confident in backing his Getty Manuscript facsimile campaign, because I know he can and will deliver."
~ Guy Windsor, itinerant swordsman and author of many books about Fiore

story:
100% of target met in less than 24 hours! 
First stretch goal hit in less than 24 hours!
Second stretch goal hit in less than 24 hours!
Third stretch goal hit in less than 24 hours!
Fourth stretch goal hit in less than 24 hours!
Fifth stretch goal hit in less than 48 hours!
Sixth stretch goal has been hit! 

Because we hit the goal in under 24 hours, we're adding stretch goals which will ship to everyone who has ordered physical goods.

Stretch Goals:

£600.00 - GOAL HIT! All physical orders will also receive a newly designed Matt Shaw bookmark! 

£700.00 - GOAL HIT! All physical orders will also receive a pocket-sized short story booklet, based on the same character within A ROLL OF THE DICE

£800.00 - GOAL HIT! All physical orders will also receive a newly designed, signed postcard! 

£900.00 - GOAL HIT! All physical orders will also receive a fridge magnet! 

£1000.00 - GOAL HIT! All physical copies will come with a new Drabble postcard, signed.

£1500.00 - GOAT HIT! All physical copies will come with a standard dice with which to play the game (this is a standard dice and not the custom one which was available on some perks)

 

Are the dice on your side?

The plot of A ROLL OF THE DICE starts off simple enough; you're at work and, that night, you have a date to go on. Your bullied character has a few issues though (depending on how you roll the dice, he actually has A LOT of issues) and he is incapable of making a decision without first rolling his dice. He sets out his possible outcomes, assigning the numbers and - then - he rolls. And here is when things get interesting.

When the character rolls the dice, the reader also rolls the dice. The number rolled determines to what chapter the reader must turn and, just like that, the course of the story changes. What started as a relatively simple day soon gets awkward, dangerous, disgusting, sexual and even incredibly violent.

Multiple Paths

As you read through the book, you have to roll the dice whenever the character rolls his dice and, as explained, this takes the character on a different path. There are at least 8 different stories within this book depending on how you roll the dice. There are multiple endings to these stories. These stories could have your character as the good guy, the villain, the mentally disturbed, the unlucky in love, the victim and more. The idea behind this book being that once you have finished it, you can start again and get a different story.

What if you don't want to play again?

At the back of the book is a key. Once you've played the book through you can go straight to this key and see most of the stories listed there. It tells you the chapters to read to get the other story. It really is simple but, not all endings are listed because - I really want you to keep playing! 

So to play the game I need a dice?

You sure do! You could use an app on your phone. There are plenty of free ones. You could also get a dice from a game you have knocking about the house. Or, you could even get yourself a limited edition dice that I've released with the book...

Marble-effect, custom 6 sided dice. The actual colours may vary ever so slightly.

So what formats is the book coming in?

At just over 200 pages it is coming in both paperback and hardback. All copies of the book purchased from this campaign come signed by Matt Shaw and release this coming October.

And Kindle?

Sadly not. This book is messed up with some truly disgusting and extreme story arcs. Two particular arcs are an instant no-go for Amazon and they would put a ban on the book immediately. No stranger to being banned, Matt is worried that they'll ban all his books if he pushes them too much and this book would definitely be doing just that.

So if I miss the campaign, I miss the book?

Not necessarily. The printers we use do put the book to online retailers but we have no control over that. Just count on it being difficult to get, unless you see Matt at a convention or go to his ETSY store to grab a copy, whilst he hosts them there.

Isn't this just a "Choose your own adventure" book?

No. You choose nothing in this book. You roll the dice, as per the character, and do as the dice dictates. It is a game of luck.

Why run a campaign for it?

We're running a campaign to get the numbers together for pre-orders. It gets expensive ordering books every couple of days so we're hoping to get the numbers in and then bulk order a shipment, which will then be posted out directly to you. If people aren't interested in the book, we know not to order many and push on with other projects.

story:
Dropkicks, Demons, and DDTs!

A Vatican exorcist fighting for survival in the world of Pro-Wrestling.

 

After a potentially demonic incident at the largest wrestling event of the year, the Vatican sends exorcist Gabriel Blackwell to infiltrate the company. Blackwell has a complicated history with the wrestling business and must adapt or die while fighting for his very soul on pay-per-view.

 

The first 100% Kayfabe novel. VCW is bringing professional wrestling and pulp fiction together, a fantastic and entertaining read for both wrestling fans and readers. Back today!

 

Read the first chapter here!

 

 

What am I getting?

This book will consist of a main story by William Hastings, author of The Crimson Spark. 

It will also include a bombastic backup story by twitter legend Alex Trevino. Writing an incredible adaptation of part 1 of his legendary lore epic using original characters in the VCW universe. A mysterious masterpiece, full of androids and parallel universes! Finally in literary form.

VCW: Sirens of Agartha! 

This double edition of VCW is a limited edition Indiegogo Exclusive.

 

What does 100% Kayfabe mean?

The book will be framed as if it's a fictional storyline taking place within the world of pro-wrestling, rather than a story about the behind the scenes process of being a wrestler. Pure fiction and pure fun! This is not intended to parody or disrespect pro-wrestling in any way. We've decided to bring this book to live because we love pro-wrestling and want to bring some of its magic to people outside the arenas.

 

The Team

William Hastings: Author of the coming of age dark-fantasy novel The Crimson Spark, which has received almost universal acclaim from readers and writers alike.

Praise for The Crimson Spark

You can connect with Hastings on Twitter, Instragram, or Facebook!

He also has his own website and mailing list for specific updates.

 

Alex Trevino: Twitter legend/savant/wunderkind, architect of the Loretweet Saga, a year long epic composed entirely on social media. Seeing adaptation into print for the first time here. 

Connect with Trev on Twitter!

 

Stretch Goals!

*4,000* The back cover will be transformed, with a new piece of Ivan Tao artwork where Alex Trevino's characters take center stage.

*4,500* Digital prologue 'The Scuffle in Sumer' short story. Discover the origins of Gabriel Blackwell in the deserts of Iraq. 

*5,000* 'The Scuffle in Sumer' will be included as a 2nd backup story in the paperback.

*6,000* Four extra story chapters

*7,000* Preview Pages of VCW Book 2: Seven Wonders

*8,000* Preview Pages of VCW: Sirens Season 2

*9,000* Illustrated Character Profiles

*9,500* Sketch Gallery

*20,000* Duel Audiobook Production
